THE BATTLE OF KOREGAON WHICH IS BEING USED BY FOREIGN FORCES AND JNU NAXALS TO WEDGE AWAY DALITS EVER HAPPENED ..</span></b><br />\n<br style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; text-align: justify;\" />\n<span style=\"background-color: #cccccc; color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: 16px; text-align: justify;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2011/07/back-swing-of-john-galt-capt-ajit.html</span><br />\n<br style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; text-align: justify;\" />\n<b style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; text-align: justify;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">143- IS CAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL RIGHT WHEN HE SAYS \u2013 THE SEPOYs MUTINY OF 1857 WHERE ROTHCHILD STOPPED ALL PRETENSES OF BEING A PEPPER TRADER AND TOOK OVER AS RULER OF INDIA , WAS CREATED , CONTROLLED AND EXTINGUISHED BY JEW ROTHSCHILD ON HIS OWN TIME TABLE\u2026</span></b><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: #cccccc; color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: 16px; text-align: justify;\"><br />http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2011/02/murky-truths-of-sepoys-mutiny-1857.html</span><br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<b style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; text-align: justify;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">144- IS CAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL RIGHT WHEN HE SAYS \u2013 THIS PLANETs SECOND OLDEST MOSQUE IS THE CHERAMAN PERUMAL MOSQUE AT KODUNGALLUR OWNED BY THE CALICUT THIYYA KING CHERAMAN PERUMAL ..<br /><br />145 - IS CAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL RIGHT WHEN HE SAYS \u2013 KING CHERAMAN PERUMAL OWNED THE SHIVA TEMPLE KAABALISHWARA AT MECCA OASIS WHICH ALSO DOUBLED UP AS A SPICE FREE TRADE CUSTOMS OUTPOST ..<br /><br />146 - IS CAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL RIGHT WHEN HE SAYS \u2013 IS SANATANA DHARMA WE BUILD A TEMPLE OVER A SPOT WHERE A SHIVA LINGAM ( BLACK METEORITE DIVINE PHALLUS STONE WHICH PROVIDES THE DNA SEED ) IS FOUND, THE STONE CANNOT BE LIFTED OFF THE GROUND AND FIXED AT AN ALTERNATE SPOT..<br /><br />151 - I HAVE NOT REACHED THIS FAR IN LIFE BY GIVING EGO\nMASSAGES..</span><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><a href=\"https://www.businessgreen.com/bg/news/3067900/disgraceful-anger-grows-as-row-stops-cop24-summit-from-welcoming-ipcc-report\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">https://www.businessgreen.com/bg/news/3067900/disgraceful-anger-grows-as-row-stops-cop24-summit-from-welcoming-ipcc-report</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">NOW -- I AM MAKING A\nDECISION..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">I AM COMING BACK TO THE\nWORLD OF BLOGGING.. 238); max-width: 36px;\" /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user\" Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2019/04/repeated-blasphemy-against-hindu-gods_9.html?showComment=1555354527276#c6628391022224133580\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">April 16, 2019 at 12:25 AM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nhttps://www.youtube.com/watch?v=I3E1h0U_3Rs<br />\n<br />\nAFTER WW2 IT MOST LARGE CATHEDRALS OF EUROPE WERE BOMBED TO RUBBLE.<br />\n<br />\nWHILE REBUILDING THEY FOUND THAT ALL THESE CATHEDRALS HAD HINDU TEMPLE FOUNDATION WITH HINDU STONE IDOLS.. JUST LIKE BABRI MASID.<br />\n<br />\nhttp://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2012/11/babri-masjid-demolition-mughal-emperor.html<br />\n<br />\nEVERY CHURCH AND MOSQUE IN JERUSALME HAS HINDU TEMPLE FOUNDATIONS .<br />\n<br />\nhttp://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/12/helena-mother-of-roman-emperor.html<br />\n<br />\nNOTRE DAME CATHEDRAL WAS SPARED BY A GERMAN GENERAL..<br />\n<br />\nI HAVE INFORMATION FROM A FRENCH SOURCE THAT NOTRE DAME CATHEDRAL WAS BUILT ON TOP OF AN ANCIENT HINDU LUTETIA TEMPLE ( PAGAN JUPITER TEMPLE )..<br />\n<br />\nJUST LIKE VATICAN ST PETERS CATHEDRAL THEY HAD PROBLEMS WITH ASS FACING THE WRONG SIDE TOWARDS PULPIT.<br />\n<br />\nhttps://www.youtube.com/watch?v=OkyLhJHj2tU<br />\n<br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n</div>\n</li>\n</ol>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 115%;\">Five years\nbefore he became Benedict XVI, Joseph Ratzinger wrote that, notwithstanding\nvarious liturgical innovations, \u201cone thing has remained clear for the whole of\nChristendom: praying towards the east is a tradition that goes back to the\nbeginning.\u201d<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 115%;\">WHEN I\nVISITED THE ST PETERs CATHEDRAL IF TOLD MY GOAN CATHOLIC PURSER , THIS WAS A\nHINDU SHIVA TEMPLE BEFORE..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 115%;\">HE SAID\u2014WHAAAAA\n?<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 115%;\">I SAID \u2013 THE\nCHURCH IS ENTERED FROM THE EAST , THE ALTAR INSIDE IS AT THE WESTERN EXTREMITY ,\nTHE PRIEST FACES THE SEATED PEOPLE AND THE DOOR OF THE CATHEDRAL- &nbsp;AND THUS HIS DIVINE HOMOSEXUAL ASS FACES THE\nALTAR AT THE CELEBRATION OF EUCHARIST ( MASS )<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 115%;\">In a\nCatholic church, the altar is the structure upon which the Eucharist is\ncelebrated..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 115%;\">When the church\nis entered from the east and the altar is at the other end, is called\noccidentation<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 115%;\">St Peter\u2019s\ncathedral foundation was built by the Jewess mother of Constantine the great.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/12/helena-mother-of-roman-emperor.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/12/helena-mother-of-roman-emperor.html</a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-size: 12pt;\">An apse is a\nsemicircular recess covered with a hemispherical vault\u2014and is </span><span style=\"font-size: 12pt;\">&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-size: 12pt;\">the name given to where the altar is placed .</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n</span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 115%;\">The Vatican\nII document on the reform of the liturgy (called \u201cSacrosanctum Concilum\u201d) says\nnot a word about the position of the priest at the altar.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; IT WAS\nDANGEROUS.. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Gems and Jewelry Export\nPromotion Council (GJEPC), had revealed that more than 40 traders from Surat\ndrive down to Mumbai daily to catch a flight to Dubai for buying rough diamonds\nand return to Mumbai in the evening.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">SO THEN THEY LOBBIED TO\nHAVE A FAST BULLET TRAIN..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Dubai remains an\nimportant trade centre for pearls what with a growing portion of trade in rough\ndiamonds gradually getting shifted from Antwerp to Dubai.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Dubai is the gateway to\nAfrican countries. The De Beers sight holders \u2013 authorized bulk buyers \u2013 from Surat\ncan directly catch flights from Dubai to Botswana to attend the De Beers\u2019s\nsight sales (sales process to distribute diamonds to diamond cutters) at\nGabarone.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">With a direct\nSurat-Dubai air-link, foreign buyers can now straightway visit the diamond factories\nin Surat from Dubai. Besides UAE-based banks promising finance to merchants,\nDubai is emerging as a top-drawer diamond trading center due to its proximity\nto India, the world's largest importer of rough gemstones.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Dubai has become the\nsecond biggest market for rough diamond trading, with many Indian diamond\ncompanies and leading export houses setting up offices at the Dubai Multi\nCommodity Centre (DMCC).<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">From virtually next to\nnothing at the beginning of the century, UAE's share in diamond imports climbed\nto 8 billion &nbsp;USD compared with 18 &nbsp;billion USD for Antwerp.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Nirav Modi was born in\nPalanpur, Gujarat, and grew up in Antwerp, Belgium.. The money JEW Nirav Modi had\nbeen taken from Punjab National Bank in 1,213 grinding doses over seven years. &nbsp;&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It was the biggest bank\nfraud in India\u2019s history, and it came robed in technical jargon: letters of\nundertaking and Swift bypasses, margin money and \u201cnostro\u201d accounts, core\nbanking solutions and buyer\u2019s credit facilities.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">JEW Mehul Choksi (\nNirav baby\u2019s uncle ) took his company, Gitanjali Gems Ltd., public on the Bombay\nStock Exchange, recruiting brand ambassadors from Bollywood and opening posh\nshowrooms.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Hemant Karkare was\nposted as a RAW officer in Austria which is notorious for diamond mafia.. org\nHaider, a fearless nationalist politician of Austria was assassinated when he\nspoke of ending the Rothschild controlled JEWISH mafia control in Austria.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">WE ASK AJIT DOVAL TO\nWATCH THE SPONSORS OF THE AKSHARDHAM TEMPLE IN DUBAI.. ISTALL HIDDEN CAMS.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; COLLEGIUM JUDICIARY IS NOT ALLOWED BY THE CONSTITUTION.. INDIA IS THE ONLY NATION ON THE PLANET WHERE JUDGES ELECT JUDGES\u2026</span><br /><br /><span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif;\">THE CONSTITUTION IS ONLY TO PROTECT LAWFUL ABIDING DESH BHAKT CITIZENS, NOT FOREIGN PAYROLL DESH DROHIS ...</span><br /><br /><span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif;\">WHAT DO YOU MEAN BY \"TALKING TO ALL STAKE HOLDERS\u201d AFTER MUSLIMS HAVE ETHNICALLY CLEANSED KASHMIRI HINDUS WITH DEEP STATE TOOL UN AND COLLEGIUM JUDICIARY SUPPORT?..</span><br /><br /><span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif;\">IN INDIA WE DEMAND PATRIOTISM TO THE WATAN -- NOT THE CONSTITUTION.. THE WAY THE KOSHER DEEP STATE WANTS ..</span><br /><br /><span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif;\">CONSTITUTIONAL PATRIOTISM IS AKIN TO PATRIOTISM TO \"MAOs RED BOOK\" OR THE \"KORAN\"..</span><br /><span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif;\">THIS IS WHY INDIAN COMMIES SUPPORTED CHINA DURING THE 1962 WAR\u2026</span><br /><br /><span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif;\">ANYBODY BODY RUNNING DOWN THE WATAN MUST BE SLAPPED WITH SEDITION CHARGES..</span><br /><br /><span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif;\">STARE DECISIS IS NOT ALLOWED --WHERE PAST RULINGS OF STUPID JUDGES UNDER THE MINDLESS SYSTEM OF \"JUSTICE IS BLIND SANS CONTEXT \" IS ATTACHED AS AN ADDENDUM-- NAY-- LANGOT TO THE CONSTITUTION..</span><br /><br /><span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif;\">THE EGO LADEN CJI OF INDIA GOGOI HAS \u201cBROKEN THE SYSTEM\u201d BY HUMILIATING THE CBI BOSS LIKE A KINDERGARTEN SCHOOL BOY WHO HAS TO KNEEL IN A CORNER OF THE CLASS WEARING A DUNCE CAP..</span><br /><br /><span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif;\">WHEN A KASHMIRI TERRORIST BOMBS OUR JAWANS WITH PAKISTANI ISI PROVIDED RDX, THE FIRST QUESTION ASKED BY JUDGES IS WHY THE TERRORIST WAS DRIVEN TO THIS EXTENT.. BAAAD HINDUS \u2026&nbsp;</span><br /><br /><span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif;\">THE JUDICIAL BRANCH HAS EFFECTIVELY BECOME THE EXECUTIVE AND LEGISLATIVE BRANCH IN INDIA TODAY..&nbsp;</span><br /><br /><span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif;\">AT COURT THE ATTORNEY GENERAL TOLD CJI GOGOI THAT THE EVIDENCE PRESENTED BY COMMIE N RAM IS A STOLEN MILITARY SECRET -- AND IS A CRIME WHICH ENTAILS 14 YEARS OF JAIL..</span><br /><br /><span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif;\">BUT HEY WHAT DOOES CJI GOGOI AND JUSTICE KM JOSEPH TELL THE ATTORNEY GENERAL ? font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">No wonder Savita Bhabhi\nfor me is iconic. <span style=\"color: red;\">She\u2019s the woman who can take all her sexual decisions on her\nown </span>without fretting over them.</span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;Over 60 million fans flock to her site every\nmonth, no mean achievement <span style=\"color: red;\">for a sari clad desi nari,</span> her long dark tresses parted\ndutifully in the middle where the<span style=\"color: red;\"> bright red sindoor flames, while a\nmangalsutra dangles between her ample breasts.</span><o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Savita Bhabhi is a\nsymbol of freedom, of empowerment, of the sexuality our women can wield if they\nare allowed to escape the sham world we Indian men trap them in because of our\nown fears of sexual inadequacy masquerading as machismo.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">We feel inadequate when\nit comes to having sex with an equal partner. So we want sex slaves as wives,\nmaids, friends, work colleagues, even underage kids. Savita Bhabhi challenges\nthis mindset.&nbsp; The more virgin and demure\nshe looks, the more powerful she is as a symbol of defiance against male\nchauvinism.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">Get your goons off\nSavita Bhabhi; set her free. Remember what Woody Allen said. Assassination is\njust an extreme form of censorship and I\u2019m sure you don\u2019t want to kill off\n<span style=\"color: red;\">India\u2019s first symbol of the sexually liberated woman.</span> \u2013 UNQUOTE </span><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; padding: 0px !important; position: absolute !important; width: 1px !important;\">\nSonam Mahajan Retweeted Sunil</div>\n<div class=\"js-tweet-text-container\" style=\"color: #14171a; font-family: &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 14px;\">\n<div class=\"TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--jumbo js-tweet-text tweet-text\" data-aria-label-part=\"4\" lang=\"en\" style=\"font-size: 27px; letter-spacing: 0.01em; line-height: 32px; overflow-wrap: break-word; white-space: pre-wrap;\">\nDefine credibility. None of the media houses or representatives who you find credible cuz they support the party you support, chose to report my story cuz it involved a BJP MP\u2019s office.\n\nIf someone who hates the BJP reports it, will you start doubting me? What\u2019s my fault?</div>\n</div>\n<span style=\"line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><b style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, serif; font-size: 12pt;\"></b></span></span>\n<span style=\"line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><b style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><br /></b></span></span>\n<span style=\"line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><b style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><br /></b></span></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">If you go a LIBERTARIAN\njudge and ask him , who was the first LIBERTARIAN on his planet\u2014 I know which\norifice he will scratch and then smell.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The first Libertarian\non the planet was a Greek student named Epicurus who was kicked out of\nKodungallur University for lack of respect to Indian culture.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;It must be known that every important ancient\nGreek scholar ( except Aristotle ) studied in Kodungallur University which was\nthe main stay of the Danava civilization. &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Danava civilization of\nNorth Kerala preceded the much touted Vedic civilization by several millenniums.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<span style=\"line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><b style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, serif; font-size: 12pt;\">\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n</b></span></span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Epicurus , who was just\n20 when Aristotle died, went back to Greece and took over from where Aristotle\nleft off. Epicurus was the planet\u2019s first hedonist. He denied the existence of\nthe soul and thus laws of karma.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Epicurus wrote -\n\u2018Pleasure is the beginning and end of the blessed life\u2019.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Epicurus was cunning\nenough to lift Kanada Muni\u2019s atomic theory and patent it in his name with half\nbacked understanding.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2011/02/daltons-atomic-theory-sage-kashyapa-and.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2011/02/daltons-atomic-theory-sage-kashyapa-and.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Epicureanism argued\nthat pleasure was the chief good in life. Hence, Epicurus advocated living in\nsuch a way as to derive the greatest amount of pleasure possible during one's\nlifetime..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In 306 BCE, Epicurus\nestablished his school at Athens in his garden, from which it came to be known\nas The Garden. Epicurus looked to the animal kingdom for his answer. He\nconcluded that the chief end is pleasure. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">He distinguished two\nkinds\u2014 a \u201ckinetic\u201d pleasure of sense and a \u201cstatic\u201d pleasure, consisting in the\nabsence of pain\u2014and taught that the pleasure of sense is good, though it is not\ngood merely as motion but rather as a motion favourable to the nature of the\nreceiving sense organ.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In essence, pleasure is the equilibrium of the being\nwith itself, existing wherever there is no pain.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">EPICURUS COULD GO NO\nHIGHER THAN HIS MOOLADHARA CHAKRA<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In popular parlance,\nEpicureanism thus means devotion to pleasure<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">AYN RAND JUST LIFTED EPICUREANISM\nFOR HER BOOK &nbsp;ATLAS SHRUGGED..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2011/07/back-swing-of-john-galt-capt-ajit.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2011/07/back-swing-of-john-galt-capt-ajit.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">THE KOSHER DEEP STATE\nHAS AGENTS IN THEIR PAYROLL ( LIKE NCW ) TO FOOL INDIANS INTO BELIEVING THAT\nPLEASURE IS HAPPINESS.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<span style=\"line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><b style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, serif; font-size: 12pt;\">\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n</b></span></span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2010/12/happiness-from-within-capt-ajit.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2010/12/happiness-from-within-capt-ajit.html</a><o:p></o:p></div>\n<span style=\"line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><b style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><br /></b></span></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Most of us spend our\nenergy seeking pleasure and avoiding pain. We hope that by doing this, we will\nfeel happy. Yet deep, abiding happiness elude so many people. You cant chase\nhappiness \u2013 for happiness has to alight on you.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Pleasure is a momentary\nfeeling that comes from something external- it has to do with the positive\nexperiences of our senses..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Pleasurable experiences\ncan give us momentary feelings of happiness. Some pathetic gym addicted Chutney\nMarys flash their twats to beggars on the roadside \u2013 it makes their moment.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Happiness is that\ngrandfather of pleasure.. Happiness comes from within. It\u2019s a state you create\nby choice.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Pleasure is visceral\nwhile happiness is ethereal.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Pleasure can be\nachieved with substances; happiness cannot be achieved with substances.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">For the HCD , pleasure\nis tied to dopamine while happiness is tied to serotonin \u2013 both are neurotransmitters.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Serotonin keeps moods\nstable &nbsp;which is why serotonin deficiency\nis associated with depression.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Dopamine&nbsp; is connected with the brain's \"pleasure\ncenter,\" and can drive our behavior towards things that bring a spike to\nthat center of the brain.. Dopamine brings feelings of pleasure and provides a\nhappiness boost based on a certain action, while serotonin is more of a\nstabilizer than a booster.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-00rG4wVV3As/XLtmSnbk3TI/AAAAAAABgxs/-mORhxkhcRga01-L2YMzGLEvybEAE3b6gCLcBGAs/s1600/5Saa30c2f90bed868078b4668-750-376.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"376\" data-original-width=\"750\" height=\"320\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-00rG4wVV3As/XLtmSnbk3TI/AAAAAAABgxs/-mORhxkhcRga01-L2YMzGLEvybEAE3b6gCLcBGAs/s640/5Saa30c2f90bed868078b4668-750-376.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Excess dopamine can\nlead to addiction, which erodes both present and future happiness. In simple\nneuroscience terms, dopamine down regulates serotonin.&nbsp;&nbsp; The paradox ?&nbsp; The more pleasure we seek, the more unhappy\nwe get..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Dopamine, controls the\nbrain\u2019s reward and pleasure centers, which can be triggered by Whatsup/ Facebook,\nsugar and alcohol.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Dopamine hits feel good\nin the moment, but it suppresses the serotonin in our brains, the chemical\nresponsible for feelings of calm and satisfaction.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Dopamine and serotonin\ndo not overlap. The key to this lies in the fact that dopamine and serotonin\nare two different bio-chemicals, two different neuro-transmitters, in two\ndifferent areas of the brain.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Dopamine is an\nexcitatory neurotransmitter.&nbsp;&nbsp; Neurons\nlike to be tickled, not bludgeoned. Chronic over-stimulation of a neuron causes\nneuronal cell death.&nbsp; As a consequence,\nthe neuron next to a dead one will trigger a self-defence mechanism to\ndown-regulate the receptors for dopamine, so that it too won\u2019t die.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When the neurons start to die, its called\naddiction<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">You get a pleasure rush,\nthe receptors go down and next time, because there are fewer receptors, you\nneed a bigger hit to get the same rush..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Serotonin does not behave\nthis way because it is an inhibitor. Serotonin does not cause the next nerve to\nfire,-&nbsp; it causes the next neuron to stay\nsilent. You can\u2019t overdose on happiness.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">However, there is one\nthing that can down-regulate serotonin \u2013 dopamine.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; So the more pleasure you seek, the more\nunhappy you get<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">That\u2019s why addiction\nand depression are different sides of the same coin.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Addiction is from too\nmuch dopamine driving down the receptor and then the neurons die. Whereas\ndepression is serotonin deficiency \u2013 too little serotonin, which has been\ndriven by the dopamine<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The more a product\ngives you a dopamine rush, the more addictive it is \u2013 think Facebook or\nWhatsup.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Tryptophan is the amino\nacid building block for serotonin. Tryptophan is not produced by the body, so\nit must be taken in through diet.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Fortunately, tryptophan\ncan be found in food whereas serotonin cannot.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Serotonin-boosting\ndrugs used as antidepressants can have serious side effects and don\u2019t work for\n65%&nbsp; of those who try them. &nbsp;Paradoxically, protein blocks serotonin\nformation.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Levels of both\ntryptophan and serotonin drop after eating a meal that contains protein! <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">THIS IS WHY INDIAN VEGANS\nDON\u2019T CARE FOR MEAT PROTEIN.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Most of the serotonin\n(over 90%) is actually made, stored, and released by the gut. Serotonin made in\nthe gut cannot cross the blood-brain barrier. That is why brain cells must\nproduce their own serotonin.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The main idea of doing\nSurya Namaskar is to do sun gazing, which causes the secretion of &nbsp;serotonin<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2011/10/surya-namaskar-11000-year-old-vedic-sun.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2011/10/surya-namaskar-11000-year-old-vedic-sun.html</a><o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Pleasure is when you\nget a shot of dopamine. Pleasurable experiences can give us momentary feelings\nof happiness, but this happiness does not last long.. Chasing pleasure gives us\nan illusion of happiness<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A chemical in the gut\nneeded to make serotonin \u2013 tryptophan \u2013 is not found in processed food. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">People eating a high\nprocessed food diet probably are not even getting the precursor to make the\nserotonin in the first place, so that is a great reason for unhappiness.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Tryptophan is the least\nplentiful of all 22 amino acids and an essential amino acid in humans (provided\nby food),<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Tryptophan is converted\nto 5-hydroxy-tryptophan (5-HTP), converted in turn to serotonin, a neurotransmitter\nessential in regulating appetite, sleep, mood, and pain. <o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-vXWz-GVJX3Q/XLtlkKZEx5I/AAAAAAABgxk/iAX7fEhaneYQdF_5YNeaT5mK0KYCVvd1ACLcBGAs/s1600/600px-Trp-5hIt-pathway.svg.png\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"116\" data-original-width=\"600\" height=\"123\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-vXWz-GVJX3Q/XLtlkKZEx5I/AAAAAAABgxk/iAX7fEhaneYQdF_5YNeaT5mK0KYCVvd1ACLcBGAs/s640/600px-Trp-5hIt-pathway.svg.png\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Tryptophan is found in\norganic brown rice , moringa leaves , nendran bananas, fresh turmeric ,\ncoconut,&nbsp; A2 ghee etc. Eating foods that\ncontain tryptophan can help the body to produce more serotonin. People cannot\nmake tryptophan in their bodies, so must obtain it from their diet.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Vedic chants music can\nincrease neurotransmitters serotonin.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Happiness leaves no bad\nafter-taste, it is followed by no depressing reaction; it brings no regret,\nentails no remorse.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">You don\u2019t get addicted\nto serotonin, even though it feels incredible,.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Happiness is more of a\nstate of mind--at ease with reality.&nbsp; A\nhappy person will feel less desire to engage in risky pleasure-seeking\nbehaviors, because their need for inner peace is already being met.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The distinction between\npleasure and happiness is the former relates to the senses and the latter to a\nstate of mind.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Happiness is a state of\ninner fulfillment, not the gratification of inexhaustible desires for outward\nthings\u2026 Genuine happiness may be influenced by circumstance, but it isn\u2019t\ndependent on it.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Pleasure is externally\nmotivated and fleeting, while happiness is internally generated and constant.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">There are behaviors and\nactions like generosity, kindness, love, gratitude, etc. The more we live in\nthese states, the more we act in line with them, the happier we become.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">You will not find\nhappiness in a pleasure prison. Pleasure is an event -- a moment in time. You\ncan't find happiness through seeking only pleasure.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">True happiness relates\nmore to the mind and heart. . Pleasure is an experience; happiness is a chosen\npath of a lifetime<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Happiness is a state of\ninner fulfillment, not the gratification of desires for outward things.</span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">CHUTNEY MARYs WHO SHOW\nTHEIR CAMEL TOE BY WEARING TIGHT LEOTARDS KNOW\u2014HOW MISERABLE THEY FEEL LATER..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; I'm sure none of your readers would have expected that all this would come to an end so soon.<br />\n<br />\nWe are grateful for your invaluable contribution in bringing light to darkness and for guiding and awaking Indians from their deep slumber.<br />\n<br />\nDespite many good ideas and repeated advice and warnings from your blog posts on matters of importance, Unfortunately the government and other institutions of power is not willing to listen or bring any positive changes in the existing system which is weak, corrupt and built on lies and deceit. Government and Institutions that were setup for and meant to serve the people are actually working against the interest of the people.<br />\n<br />\nMany of your readers expected and hoped for major positive and progressive changes politically, bureaucratically, economically, constitutionally, historically, culturally and socially. But unfortunately none of that happened. Your blogs were intentionally ignored by powers that be.<br />\n<br />\nPoliticians and bureaucrats are well accustomed to the way things are and doesn't want to change the existing corrupt system of governance and they just won't care for the people or try to change the system when they can easily become filthy rich and their family can lead a comfortable life at the expense of the well being of the people or the development of the nation.<br />\n<br />\nIf Indians and those who rule India were not selfish, then we wouldn't have to still be talking about bringing good education, decent healthcare and good governance even after 72 years of independence.<br />\n<br />\nIf none of the government can bring about good changes and meet even the basic needs, wants and requirements of people like clean air, good drinking water, food, housing and shelter even after so many decades after independence, then there is no use in gaining independence or calling us an independent nation.<br />\n<br />\nUnless there is a basic, fundamental and foundational change (which is highly unlikely to happen) in the way the government, institutions, bureaucrats, judiciary, media and people think, act and behave it is extremely difficult to bring about any positive change to the country and the society as a whole. People's in positions of power are just happy and satisfied with the way things are since they benefit a lot from this corrupt system as long as business are as usual.<br />\n<br />\nPoor genes and slave mentality due to hundreds of years slavery has indeed ruined our way of life and thinking else the people would stand up for their rights and wouldn't be accepting these unjust rulers (pre and post independence) who does nothing for the people to rule us again and again.<br />\n<br />\nIt is very hard to disagree on what's rightly mentioned in the blog post like, Indians are selfish, ungrateful and self loathing. Yes, it is indeed very easy to convert indians into other religions or into traitors against their own motherland just by throwing a few pieces of silver. May be we just don't deserve 100% revelations in your blogs.<br />\n<br />\nWhile ancient India was a super power and have had a glorious past (thanks to you captain for bringing light on these matters), only god knows how many centuries it will take for India to achieve that glorious past.<br />\n<br />\nWhile your blogs are invaluable treasure which is like a powerful brahmastra, we are not sure if we even deserve this when we don't even know how to effectively and efficiently make use of this god's gift.<br />\n<br />\nCaptain, You know what to do with your blogs (past, present &amp; future) and we will support whatever decisions you make.</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" style=\"margin-left: 36px; margin-top: 1em;\">\n<div class=\"comment-thread inline-thread\" id=\"c7969686433936965886-rt\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; margin: 8px 0px; padding: 0.5em 1em;\">\n<ol class=\"thread-chrome thread-expanded\" id=\"c7969686433936965886-ra\" style=\"list-style-type: none; padding: 0px;\">\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"c7593212724626147882\" style=\"border-bottom: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 16px 0px 0px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n<img alt=\"\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-QSnd-Z8F7Kc/XFtPudWdwlI/AAAAAAABfq4/vxrkFOO7Iu8Mf6-OaPgw6FPpRDSmMgLdgCK4BGAYYCw/s35/capt%25252BajitC%25252Bvadakayil.JPG\" style=\"border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); max-width: 36px;\" /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888;\">Capt. Had Chanakya quit in 10 years, what would be the condition of Bharat today? Captain, it was those shastras and 24 years of mentoring to maurya empire and people which protected Bharat from the initial 1200 years of kaliyug.<br />\n<br />\nChanakya period was different because Indians were never slaves before that time period. Yours is completely different.<br />\n<br />\nCaptain, all i am saying is \"HAVE PATIENCE AND MENTOR US TILL INDIA BECOME SUPERPOWER IN 2033\".</div>\n<span class=\"comment-actions secondary-text\"><br /><span class=\"item-control blog-admin blog-admin pid-823045964\" style=\"display: inline;\"></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" style=\"margin-left: 36px; margin-top: 1em;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replybox-single\" id=\"c6120150363021244235-ce\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; margin-top: 5px;\">\n</div>\n</li>\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"c6686976977907934647\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 0.25em 0px 8px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/15119734244220747322\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888;\">Ravi</a></cite><span class=\"icon user \" style=\"font-weight: bold;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2019/04/repeated-blasphemy-against-hindu-gods_9.html?showComment=1555248758876#c6686976977907934647\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888;\">April 14, 2019 at 7:02 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nSir, This blog gives me hope and solace. Pranam Guruji.</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" style=\"margin-left: 36px; margin-top: 1em;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replybox-single\" id=\"c2407176836823077853-ce\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; margin-top: 5px;\">\n</div>\n</li>\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"c3296047661615270569\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 0.25em 0px 8px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/03709540651252739258\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888;\">rakesh</a></cite><span class=\"icon user \" style=\"font-weight: bold;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2019/04/time-for-capt-ajit-vadakayil-to-big.html?showComment=1555223524880#c3296047661615270569\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888;\">April 14, 2019 at 12:02 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nDear Captain, please don't take down this blogsite. position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/06377431601384474457\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888;\">Unknown</a></cite><span class=\"icon user \" style=\"font-weight: bold;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2019/04/time-for-capt-ajit-vadakayil-to-big.html?showComment=1555223875458#c3562118372366141683\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888;\">April 14, 2019 at 12:07 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nPlease sir don't do this we can bring back bharat mata back to her glory we can bring a change we can do this it will take time but is bound to happen the kalki will arrive</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" style=\"margin-left: 36px; margin-top: 1em;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replybox-single\" id=\"c3562118372366141683-ce\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; margin-top: 5px;\">\n</div>\n</li>\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"c1887752010789961751\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 0.25em 0px 8px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/11037753711070498355\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888;\">DharmaParipalakan</a></cite><span class=\"icon user \" style=\"font-weight: bold;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2019/04/time-for-capt-ajit-vadakayil-to-big.html?showComment=1555224288308#c1887752010789961751\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888;\">April 14, 2019 at 12:14 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nHi Captain,<br />\nI did create an account and complain to Quora about the post insulting you. But knew in advance Quora wouldnt care. That insult and other posts denigrating Hinduism deserve a lawsuit and incarceration of every employee of Quora.<br />\nFrustrations similar to what you face are experienced by all people trying to walk the path of Dharma. Moral values in Indian society have degraded rapidly in the past few years. This is something I have personally observed in my ~40 years of this life. My grandparents were wonderful human beings who never betrayed anyone, they didnt have jealousy, hatred or held grudges except in minute part somewhere. They helped others without expecting anything in return. They had what we call in Malayalam Shuddha manas. My parents/siblings thankfully are on a similar path though not of the same caliber as my grand parents. The current generation is an antithesis of these qualities.<br />\nLooking at the state of society, I used to wonder whether it deserved any help. Almost everyone lacks gratitude, many will backstab if the opportunity presents itself, a mans word means nothing. In Kadanathanad/North Kerala, untill recent times a mans word was more valuable than his life. I have personally experienced ingratitude at the hands of multiple acquaintances and relatives. Though I have been lucky enough to see a few (very few) people who have some sense of gratitude. Because I have learnt to not expect gratitude, it doesnt bother me any more.<br />\nDharma means nothing to a vast majority of Indians. Look at the previous elections held under the cloud of multiple scams and clearcut attempts to destroy the country from within. BJP won a majority, but the fact which is overlooked is that a vast majority voted against them. This vast majority was willing to sell national interest for narrow selfish gains (which would come back to bite them in their cashewnuts later) and/or ignorance. Either way, they didnt have a sense of fighting against injustice. I have been to ashrams in Himalayas only to see selfish, egotistical, greedy, ignorant people who had at best mugged up some of our shastras (there was one exception who had good knowledge) wearing saffron robes and claiming to be sanyasis. Sanyasi in control of the kitchen operations was very particular about selecting paneer pieces from his curry keeping out other less savoury veggies which speaks about how much control of desires they have. Their pathetic discources on shastras is something which will turn this post too long. I am not talking about the western leaning, money making yoga monkey schools in Rishikesh or the Jaggi, SSR, Silken robed baba types (people I interacted with were better then them).<br />\nWhen I inquired with a local RSS/BJP man about joining Vanvasi Kalyan Ashram to help simple minded tribals whose lands and culture face attacks from settlers and evangelists, he went back to discuss with local \"leaders/advisors\" and came back to tell me these were \"fundamentalist\" organizations. The level of brainwashing is that bad within the Sangh Parivar itself. All my attempts to sponsor a class for teaching people from my village lessons from Bhagavad Gita etc were blocked with fear that this might radicalize youth. Bhagavad Gita teaches Dharma, a follower of which though he will call a spade a spade will never be a blind irrational fundamentalist. A follower of Dharma will uphold the principle of natural justice.<br />\nHow many people care about upholding Dharma? How many people are without malice, jealousy, hatred? How many have gratitude? The numbers are not promising. But I continue to fight. Why?<br />\nI fight for the sake of Dharma, for our civilization, to show respect to the sacrifice of our (Dharma following) ancestors and most importantly because that is part of Karma Yoga.<br />\nWhats the benefit? I dont look forward to get material benefits but am working to decrease my Karmic baggage and out of gratitude to our Gods, Rishis and ancestors.<br />\n... contd into next post</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" style=\"margin-left: 36px; margin-top: 1em;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replybox-single\" id=\"c1887752010789961751-ce\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; margin-top: 5px;\">\n</div>\n</li>\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"c492063534290048533\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 0.25em 0px 8px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/11037753711070498355\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888;\">DharmaParipalakan</a></cite><span class=\"icon user \" style=\"font-weight: bold;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2019/04/time-for-capt-ajit-vadakayil-to-big.html?showComment=1555224311826#c492063534290048533\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888;\">April 14, 2019 at 12:15 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nA single undeserving assurance which slipped out of my tongue to an acquaintance some years ago continues to harm me financially to this date. I could have adjusted the terms since I foresaw that he would betray me. But I stuck to my word and so my conscience is clear. I will punish him at the time and place of my choosing in a way which does not make me loose focus from spirituality and doesnt make be obsessed with punishing him. Karma catches up but we also need to punish Adharmis. There have been many other incidents of ingratitude and attempted backstabbing where I hit back real hard and crushed such people using fair means.<br />\nWe need to fight against Adharma as a solemn duty. Our Jivan Mukt Rishis taught/penned down the Veda and Upanishads just out of compassion for the coming generations. They were free of Karmic baggage but still guided generations spreading over thousands of years. We owe it to them to fight against Adharma, NOT to the ungrateful billions on this planet. I fight for Dharma and the people who follow Dharma and hope to do Nishkama karma. Those who dedicate all their work to God and do so without any expectation in return always receive guidance and help at the appropriate time.<br />\nThis is Kali Yug, our scriptures have painted a vivid picture of the state of society in this age of degeneration in morals. Its quite accurate and for the few who have Vivekam, its entirely accurate. Burning up Karmic baggage in the midst of this Adharma filled world works quickly for the few who follow Dharma against all odds.<br />\nCaptain, you have done a lot through your blogs. It doesnt mean you have to stop writing, I would suggest you stop caring about peoples response and continue writing if circumstances permit. At your age, you and you wife deserve every right to spend the rest of your lives seeking solace in spirituality. If writing this blog is a hindrance in that path, by all means stop writing.<br />\nThanks for pointing out so many facts through your blogs. It has definitely helped me.<br />\n<br />\nP.S: The only thing I would like you to edit in your blogs is to delete a blasphemy about Sri Rama and Lakshaman relating to Suparnakha (\"cutting of the nose is just a \u201cfigure of speech\u201d. http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2013/09/king-ravana-of-ramayana-hero-or-villian.html\") and in a comment by a person which you allowed to be published which was in another post interpreting it as R. Aspersions should not be case on Marayada Purushottam even indirectly. Comments you allow to be published does not mean you endorse them, but for a person who is fighting against denigration of our Gods, there should be no place for such comments in your blogs. Killing of Vali was against the rules of war and the by upholding the rules of Karma (though He is not bound by it), Vali reborn a a hunter neutralized this act in the next Avtaar. Vali incident was the only act people hold against Sri Ram though IMO since it was the only way to kill Vali, Bhishma like exception applied in that case too (Vali was not opposed to or fighting against Sri Ram. Some would have preferred that Vali came to know about the new friend of Sugriva and turned antagonistic towards Sri Ram, but in the scheme of things Jara the hunter too needed some reason to shoot that arrow). Trying to explain things beyond this would go into dangerous territory which would result in people using excuses to violate rules of Dharma or would turn inactive because of the subtle reasons behind every act in the universe. Those subtle reasons are to be realized and not told.</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" style=\"margin-left: 36px; margin-top: 1em;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replybox-single\" id=\"c492063534290048533-ce\" style=\"margin-left: 48px;
