margin-top: 5px;\">\n</div>\n</li>\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"c7349154259004189665\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 0.25em 0px 8px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/04177296018307800610\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888;\">RN Murthy</a></cite><span class=\"icon user \" style=\"font-weight: bold;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2019/04/time-for-capt-ajit-vadakayil-to-big.html?showComment=1555348459927#c7349154259004189665\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888;\">April 15, 2019 at 10:44 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nDear Capt Ajit sir,<br />\nThanks a lot to you fir the kshob.,you gave created in each of us...to get extra enthused and face challenges to make India#1 sooner by 2025 !!! Let's look at the roots if Indian self loathing as the story via FB below :<br />\nJallianwala Bagh - Why Indians fired on Indians<br />\n<br />\nI lived in Hong Kong for some years. One of the facts I observed was that Hong Kongers by and large do not like Indians and many of them even hate us. Whether an Indian goes on to look for a home or on the streets to buy groceries, the feeling is palpable. Many Indians I talked to said they feel it rather strongly. I had asked several people but got no satisfactory answer.<br />\n<br />\nFinally, I asked a local friend about the reason. He was a historian at one of Hong Kong\u2019s University. At first he tried to deny that this exists but then later said the roots of it are historical. \u201cDo you know,\u201d he said, \u201cthe British came to Hong Kong in 1841 and when they tried to build the first police force with the help of locals, they realized that the loyalty of the locals cannot be trusted to follow their orders or shoot and kill if their fellow brethren revolted or were a rebellion. But they realized they didn\u2019t have the same experience in India. So they brought the Indians. The first batch of Indians who came brutalized and tortured the people here. The memory still lives in the mind of every person here and we haven\u2019t forgiven you for it and will never do,\u201d he said in a deeply emotional voice. \u201cYou Indians followed orders and didn\u2019t show any mercy towards us which we expected you would do.\u201d<br />\n<br />\nI could only apologize to him and said it was an injustice. But what he had said left me perturbed. In social sciences \u2018the other\u2019 is a term that denotes how human beings divide, create walls with other groups whom they perceive as not similar to them and even inferior. For the American \u2018the other\u2019 is everyone who is outside America. For the British everyone who is not White and outside the country is \u2018the other\u2019. For the man from Pakistan it has become the Indian. Same can be said of the Chinese. But the curious thing for Indians is that for many an Indians \u2018the other\u2019 is not an outsider but another Indian only with whom his deepest chasm lies. He is someone whom we make into an enemy.<br />\n<br />\n\u201cYou Indians, you have done it with your own people, like in Jallianwala Bagh. That is how the British controlled your nation for two centuries, isn\u2019t it?\u201d The historian\u2019s words have stayed with me since then.<br />\n<br />\nIn one of his books, Amitav Ghosh, the author, writes that the British believed that the Indians can always be relied upon to ruthlessly put down any one whether their own in India or anywhere else on their orders, something they could never imagine doing with anyone else. Would a Japanese be ever trusted to fire on its own people on the orders of a foreign General? Would a Chinese army have done so when asked? I believe the answer is a big no.<br />\n<br />\nAs one ex-General from the former British Indian army said, \u201cThe British were masters in making the Indian people believe that they were fighting on the side of the truth and so when the Indians fought a fellow Indian they saw him as evil and felt little or no guilt killing him.\u201d<br />\n<br />\nIs that why even today we are deeply divided, can torture a fellow Indian and feel little empathy, even shoot at him or beat him to death?<br />\n<br />\nWhy did we Indians create \u2018the other\u2019 amongst each other and not outside like other nations do?<br />\nOnce, a British historian, on the mention of Jallianwala Bagh, said that a British police force or army would never shoot at its own people if asked to do so.<br />\n<br />\nWhy did we Indians did it then? I believe it is worth finding an answer to this dilemma.<br />\n<br />\nWhy didn\u2019t the police force refuse to follow Michael Dyer\u2019s orders and not shoot at their own people? This maybe is one of the most poignant and perplexing questions in understanding why British could rule India.<br />\n<br />\n...contd</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" style=\"margin-left: 36px; margin-top: 1em;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replybox-single\" id=\"c7349154259004189665-ce\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; margin-top: 5px;\">\n</div>\n</li>\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"c6429065597049569854\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 0.25em 0px 8px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/01522332763927620533\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888;\">Divyanshu Tiwari</a></cite><span class=\"icon user \" style=\"font-weight: bold;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2019/04/time-for-capt-ajit-vadakayil-to-big.html?showComment=1555349023205#c6429065597049569854\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888;\">April 15, 2019 at 10:53 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nSir, you must not delete this blogsite as per my view...The work you are doing and the aim we have in our mind requires much more efforts for us to achieve it... When people encounter greatness, beauty, grace,kindness,compassion, originality the first emotion they react with is fear which seals off all rationality.the backbone of us Indians have been broken so much that even when noble warriors like you appear to battle for our sake we fear you. Our cowardice has gotten to a despicable point.<br />\n<br />\nMy external identity is that of an indian, soon to be dad, a scientist, a cell biologist with a PhD from Cornell (batch of 2017) pretending to understand the boundlessness of your wisdom, the unmatched originality of your insights and the unimaginable powers of perception that you have.. Internally today iam someone ashamed of my existence. For having letting you due to my incompetence, for having let down down a person whom I idolized, a guru the likes of which i can never dream to find.<br />\n<br />\nFrom my limited experience, I have learnt that pioneers, creators, people who challenge the existing paradigm with solid logic are always feared by others. For the pioneers, they share their insights, discoveries to sustain and experience the intense spark of brilliance that came about due to their extraordinary effort. However, the sad aspect which appears to keep repeating itself is that the rest of humanity today cowers when it sees anything too bright be it lightning, fire , electricity, intelligence etc . Only by curtailing it, encompassibg them in a shell does humanity of today find itself in peace.<br />\nYou have given so much to us and we failed you.<br />\nMy heart is ripped when I see you experiencing this pain. You dont have rights to close this blog it is for us hindus.</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" style=\"margin-left: 36px; margin-top: 1em;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replybox-single\" id=\"c8199146377598112869-ce\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; margin-top: 5px;\">\n</div>\n</li>\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"c9213125775169991497\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 0.25em 0px 8px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/12510754116837111317\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888;\">Prashant.uchil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user \" style=\"font-weight: bold;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2019/04/time-for-capt-ajit-vadakayil-to-big.html?showComment=1555475871574#c9213125775169991497\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888;\">April 17, 2019 at 10:07 AM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nJallianwala Bagh - Why Indians fired on Indians - A painful but important message to us Indians.<br />\n<br />\nI lived in Hong Kong for some years. One of the facts I observed was that Hong Kongers by and large do not like Indians and many of them even hate us. Whether an Indian goes on to look for a home or on the streets to buy groceries, the feeling is palpable. Many Indians I talked to said they feel it rather strongly. I had asked several people but got no satisfactory answer.<br />\n<br />\nFinally, I asked a local friend about the reason. He was a historian at one of Hong Kong\u2019s University. At first he tried to deny that this exists but then later said the roots of it are historical. \u201cDo you know,\u201d he said, \u201cthe British came to Hong Kong in 1841 and when they tried to build the first police force with the help of locals, they realized that the loyalty of the locals cannot be trusted to follow their orders or shoot and kill if their fellow brethren revolted or were a rebellion. But they realized they didn\u2019t have the same experience in India. So they brought the Indians. The first batch of Indians who came brutalized and tortured the people here. The memory still lives in the mind of every person here and we haven\u2019t forgiven you for it and will never do,\u201d he said in a deeply emotional voice. \u201cYou Indians followed orders and didn\u2019t show any mercy towards us which we expected you would do.\u201d<br />\n<br />\nI could only apologize to him and said it was an injustice. But what he had said left me perturbed. In social sciences \u2018the other\u2019 is a term that denotes how human beings divide, create walls with other groups whom they perceive as not similar to them and even inferior. For the American \u2018the other\u2019 is everyone who is outside America. For the British everyone who is not White and outside the country is \u2018the other\u2019. For the man from Pakistan it has become the Indian. Same can be said of the Chinese. But the curious thing for Indians is that for many an Indians \u2018the other\u2019 is not an outsider but another Indian only with whom his deepest chasm lies. He is someone whom we make into an enemy.<br />\n<br />\n\u201cYou Indians, you have done it with your own people, like in Jallianwala Bagh. That is how the British controlled your nation for two centuries, isn\u2019t it?\u201d The historian\u2019s words have stayed with me since then.<br />\n<br />\nIn one of his books, Amitav Ghosh, the author, writes that the British believed that the Indians can always be relied upon to ruthlessly put down any one whether their own in India or anywhere else on their orders, something they could never imagine doing with anyone else. Would a Japanese be ever trusted to fire on its own people on the orders of a foreign General? Would a Chinese army have done so when asked? I believe the answer is a big no.<br />\n<br />\nAs one ex-General from the former British Indian army said, \u201cThe British were masters in making the Indian people believe that they were fighting on the side of the truth and so when the Indians fought a fellow Indian they saw him as evil and felt little or no guilt killing him.\u201d<br />\n<br />\nIs that why even today we are deeply divided, can torture a fellow Indian and feel little empathy, even shoot at him or beat him to death?</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" style=\"margin-left: 36px; margin-top: 1em;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replybox-single\" id=\"c9213125775169991497-ce\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; margin-top: 5px;\">\n</div>\n</li>\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"c7443624306792549679\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 0.25em 0px 8px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/12510754116837111317\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888;\">Prashant.uchil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user \" style=\"font-weight: bold;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2019/04/time-for-capt-ajit-vadakayil-to-big.html?showComment=1555475882756#c7443624306792549679\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888;\">April 17, 2019 at 10:08 AM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nWhy did we Indians create \u2018the other\u2019 amongst each other and not outside like other nations do?<br />\nOnce, a British historian, on the mention of Jallianwala Bagh, said that a British police force or army would never shoot at its own people if asked to do so.<br />\n<br />\nWhy did we Indians did it then? I believe it is worth finding an answer to this dilemma.<br />\n<br />\nWhy didn\u2019t the police force refuse to follow Michael Dyer\u2019s orders and not shoot at their own people? This maybe is one of the most poignant and perplexing questions in understanding why British could rule India.<br />\n<br />\nHas the notion of \u2018the other\u2019 as one we can hate and eliminate always existed amongst us in our history and as one that the British only perfected when they came in contact with us? I wish to ask this on the 100th anniversary of the tragedy of Jallianwala Bagh if we as a society created a gap within that can cause fissures and we can again be ordered into maniacal behavior on the orders of a white man or woman.<br />\n<br />\nJallianwala Bagh to me appears to be not the action of a deranged, crazy lunatic General but of a psychopath who knew this weakness of Indians only too well, who understood this mindset in us. He knew that when ordered to fire, the men wouldn\u2019t stop because the cries of their own country men would have no effect on them. This philosophy, sick and dangerous, may need to be addressed and understood that may lead us to kill each other or destroy. Will it ever lead us to become a united cohesive nation and not hold us back?<br />\n<br />\nCreating \u2018the other\u2019 and making him into an enemy is dehumanizing which has just not only been symbolic, making us slaves but also making us lose what is the most precious, our freedom. It delineated us from the power that rightfully belonged to us as a nation.<br />\n<br />\nLast year we visited the Jallianwala Bagh. There were hundreds of people laughing, talking and taking pictures. No single face looked solemn. Only some seemed curious looking at the Well or the Bullet marks on the wall. Where does this detachment from our history comes from?<br />\n<br />\nSlavery dehumanized us Indians. As we know from history, no group cedes its privileges over others out of altruism but is forced to do so when the privileges they enjoy begin to threaten their survival. Gandhi could never do that to the British. Only once during the INA Trials and the Naval Revolt, it happened when the idea of one Indian being separate from \u2018the other\u2019 got erased terrifying the British into thinking it might bring their annihilation in India.<br />\n<br />\nWill the present generation erase this blot? In it perhaps lies the safety that will make our future generations safe from the contradictions that pushed our ancestors into slavery and annihilating each other.<br />\n<br />\nRajat Mitra<br />\nPsychologist and Author of \u2018The Infidel Next Door\u2019</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" style=\"margin-left: 36px; margin-top: 1em;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replybox-single\" id=\"c7443624306792549679-ce\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; margin-top: 5px;\">\n</div>\n</li>\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"c7965330049889247152\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 0.25em 0px 8px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/03076594364120407820\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888;\">C Prabhu</a></cite><span class=\"icon user \" style=\"font-weight: bold;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2019/04/time-for-capt-ajit-vadakayil-to-big.html?showComment=1555476334376#c7965330049889247152\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888;\">April 17, 2019 at 10:15 AM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nCaptain Saab,<br />\n<br />\nIt is heart wrenching to read your comments and thinking about your state of mind. Don't burn it.<br />\n<br />\nIndia will be a Super Power with Honor and Respect!!!<br />\n<br />\nI dedicate this song to everyone!<br />\n<br />\nhttps://www.youtube.com/watch?v=U8NRbcYFo_0<br />\n<br />\nRuk jana nahin tu kahin haar ke<br />\nKaanton pe chalke<br />\nMilenge saaye bahaar ke<br />\nRuk jana nahin tu kahin haar ke<br />\nKaanton pe chalke<br />\nMilenge saaye bahaar ke<br />\nO raahi, o raahi x 4<br />\n<br />\nSooraj dekh ruk gaya hai<br />\nTere aage jhuk gaya hai<br />\nSooraj dekh ruk gaya hai<br />\nTere aage jhuk gaya hai<br />\nJab kabhi aise koi mastana<br />\nNikle hai apni dhun mein deewana<br />\nShaam suhani ban jaate hain<br />\nDin intezar ke<br />\nO raahi, o raahi x 2<br />\n<br />\nRuk jana nahin tu kahin haar ke<br />\nKaanton pe chalke<br />\nMilenge saaye bahaar ke<br />\nO raahi, o raahi x 4<br />\n<br />\nSathi na karvan hai<br />\nYeh tera imtihaan hai<br />\nSathi na karvan hai<br />\nYeh tera imtihaan hai<br />\nYoon hi chala chal dil ke sahare<br />\nKarti hai manzil tujhko ishare<br />\nDekh kahin koi rok nahin le<br />\nTujhko pukaar ke<br />\nO raahi, o raahi x 2<br />\n<br />\nRuk jana nahin tu kahin haar ke<br />\nKaanton pe chalke<br />\nMilenge saaye bahaar ke<br />\nO raahi, o raahi x 4<br />\n<br />\nNain aansu jo liye hain<br />\nYeh raahon ke diye hain<br />\nNain aansu jo liye hain<br />\nYeh raahon ke diye hain<br />\nLogon ko unka sab kuchh deke<br />\nTu to chala tha sapne hi leke<br />\nKoi nahin to tere apne hain<br />\nSapne yeh pyaar ke<br />\nO raahi, o raahi<br />\n<br />\nRuk jana nahin tu kahin haar ke<br />\nKaanton pe chalke<br />\nMilenge saaye bahaar ke<br />\nO raahi, o raahi x 4</div>\n</div>\n</li>\n</ol>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 32px;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; You yourself said this in different form(s), as Muthu Swamynathan pointed it out in various comments. You are being too impatient. In any case, perhaps I am an idiot unable to understand bhagavad gita, but, with all due respect, if you have actually decided to delete your blog, you are going against the teachings of bhagavad gita.<br />\n<br />\nLord krishna through gita, teaches us to work with maximum effort without caring about result. He teaches that human has right over effort only, but not result, only god has the right over result.<br />\n<br />\nI doubt lord krishna ever asked to stop doing because positive results are not being seen. He asked everyone to do their duty or the purpose with which they have been sent toeartg. You said everyone is born in this planet with a purpose. God has not blessed you with immense knowledge intelligence and perception so that you stop your work half way through. Your post on mahabharata and gita states that \u201cWhat binds a man is not action but his attachment to the fruit of the action\u201d.<br />\n<br />\nAnd as a matter of fact, not paying heed to bhagavad gita is the reason we were slaves for 800 years. Whatever improvement did happen, will be completely ruined if you delete the entire blog. Deletion of your blog does not help in any way!!<br />\n<br />\nOf course following gita is WAY EASIER said than done, moreover we can never feel your pain and struggle, but you are the ONLY one capable of leading us!!It does NOT fit you to quit!! You must rise up one way or other!! Please work on your blog in whatever little time you have after family!! That would be ENOUGH!!<br />\n<br />\nPlease don\u2019t think I am disacknowledging the IMMENSE struggle and personal sacrifice and terrible heart ache you have to go through for running this blog, but you are the ONLY one capable of leading us!! Please work on your blog in whatever little time you have after family!! That would be ENOUGH!!<br />\n<br />\nI request you to re-read the comments of your readers!!<br />\n<br />\nAnd I request you to prove reader \u201cnami\u201d wrong!! and to not let detractors and drohis win!!<br />\n<br />\nPlease be the leader of the tiny army of lions!!<br />\n<br />\nMaybe my knowledge or understanding of gita is very poor, but I believe it has not been right to delete the blog. I sincerely and wholeheartedly apologize if I am being too audacious and/or stupid. Just my two scents, unsolicited pearls of my perception.<br />\n<br />\nEverything written above is not applicable if you are doing all this to wake up all the sleeping and/or lazy readers or if you are planning to start over or start a new blog or revive the deleted posts or something or anything like that.<br />\n<br />\nI have been a reader of your blog for a long time.<br />\n<br />\nOnce again I sincerely and wholeheartedly apologize if I have been too audacious and/or stupid. The facts tell nothing to him. A billion people is in this state of demoralization, showered with lies and twisted facts again and again right from the time when their education starts. , serif; line-height: 24px;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;; font-size: large; line-height: 37.3333px;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<div style=\"line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: red;\">The amount of bombs\nexceeded the amount this nation dropped in WW2 ( including Hiroshima/ Nagasaki/\nDresden ) by more than 1.6 million tonnnes .</span><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\"><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: medium;\"><b><br /></b></span></span></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 17.6px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\"><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: medium;\"><b>To the ALLIES / COALITION/ &nbsp;COWBOY RIDING POSSE &nbsp; bombing neutral Cambodia was justifiable on the grounds it was a supply route south for the invading North Vietnamese.</b></span></span></div>\n</div>\n<o:p><b style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, serif; font-size: large;\"><br /></b></o:p>\n<o:p></o:p>\n<span style=\"font-size: large;\"><o:p><b style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, serif;\">More than 910, 000 people were killed &nbsp;( wounded is NOT counted )..&nbsp;</b></o:p>\n</span><o:p><br /></o:p>\n<o:p><b style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, serif; font-size: large;\"><br /></b></o:p><br />\n<o:p><b style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, serif; font-size: large;\">SKULLS AND BONES ATTRIBUTED TO POL POT WAS DONE BY US BOMBERS&nbsp; AND&nbsp;<span style=\"color: red;\">SEVEN MILLION</span>&nbsp;<span style=\"color: red;\">LAND MINES&nbsp;</span>DROPPED ON THE NATION . .</b></o:p><br />\n<o:p><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><span style=\"background-color: yellow; text-decoration-line: none;\">April 10, 2019 at 12:32 AM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nWE WARN AJIT DOVAL / CBI / NIA/ RAJNATH SINGH/ PM MODI..<br />\n<br />\nDONT EVER THINK THAT ARNAB GOSWAMI IS A PATRIOT..<br />\n<br />\nTHIS SLIMY FELLOW IS A HARDCORE NAXALITE -- SITTING INSIDE A CLOSET..<br />\n<br />\nAT EVERY DEBATE YOU CANE SEE THAT COMMIE ARNAB GOSWAMI DELIBERATELY DROWNS OUT THE VOICE OF DESH BHAKTS -- BY INCREASING THE MIKE VOLUME OF TRAITORS LIKE PROF RAO/ TASLIM REHMANI / SUNEET CHOPRA / DINESH VARSHNEY ETC ..<br />\n<br />\nTHE THE PEOPLE WARN DEEP STATE OPERATIVE ARNAB GOSWAMI-- THE PUNISHMENT FOR DOUBLE AGENTS ARE DOUBLE..<br />\n<br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..<br />\n<br />\nPUT ABOVE COMMENT IN WEBSITES OF--<br />\nARNAB GOSWAMI<br />\nREPUBLIC TV<br />\nRAJEEV CHANDRASHEKHAR<br />\nAJIT DOVAL<br />\nCBI<br />\nNIA<br />\nED<br />\nRAJNATH SINGH<br />\nHOME MINISTER<br />\nRSN SINGH<br />\nGD BAKSHI<br />\nPM MODI<br />\nPMO<br />\nCOL RATHORE<br />\nPRESIDENT OF INDIA<br />\nVP OF INDIA<br />\nAMIT SHAH<br />\nALL BJP SPOKESMEN<br />\nRAM MADHAV<br />\nKIRON KHER<br />\nMEENAKSHI LEKHI<br />\nSMRITI IRANI<br />\nSAMBIT PATRA<br />\nRSN SINGH<br />\nRSS<br />\nVHP<br />\nAVBP<br />\nCJI GOGOI<br />\nATTORNEY GENERAL<br />\nALL SUPREME COURT JUDGES<br />\nALL STATES HIGH COURT CHIEF JUSTICES<br />\nLAW MINISTER<br />\nLAW MINISTRY<br />\nSWAMY<br />\nGURUMURTHY<br />\n<br />\nWEBSITES OF DESH BHAKT LEADERS<br />\nSPREAD ON SOCIAL MEDIA EVERY WHICH WAY</div>\n</div>\n</li>\n</ol>\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br style=\"background-color: #cccccc; IS CAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL RIGHT WHEN HE SAYS \u2013 KING CHERAMAN PERUMAL OWNED THE SHIVA TEMPLE KAABALISHWARA AT MECCA OASIS WHICH ALSO DOUBLED UP AS A SPICE FREE TRADE CUSTOMS OUTPOST ..<br /><br />146 - IS CAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL RIGHT WHEN HE SAYS \u2013 KAABA AT MECCA , THE HOLIEST PLACE OF THE MUSLIMS AND THIS PLANETs FIRST MOSQUE IS THE NAME OF LORD SHIVA AS GOD WITH THE MATTED LOCKS WHICH IS THE SOURCE OF THE GANGES..<br /><br />147 - IS CAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL RIGHT WHEN HE SAYS \u2013 KAABALA ( KABBALAH ) OF JUDAISM IS JUST A CORRUPTION OF KAABA + ISHAWARA ( KAABALISHAWARA ) ROOTED IN EIN SOF, THE ENDLESS ONE..<br /><br />148 - IS CAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL RIGHT WHEN HE SAYS \u2013 KING CHERAMAN PERUMAL RUSHED TO MECCA ON BEING SUMMONED BY EMERGENCY PIGEON MESSAGE BY THE KERALA NAMBOODIRI ARYAN PRIEST OF THE SHIVA TEMPLE AT MECCA OASIS , BY SHIP TO SALALAH ( PORT AT DHOFAR, HIS OWN KINGDOM ) AND THEN BY CARAVAN ROUTE ..<br /><br />149 - IS CAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL RIGHT WHEN HE SAYS \u2013 DURING A FLOOD AT MECCA , THE SHIVA TEMPLE SHIVA LINGAM WAS SUBMERGED UNDER FIVE FEET OF WATER AND THE HINDU SON ( MOHAMMAD ) OF THE YOUNGER SEMITE NAMBOODIRI BROTHER IN CHARGE OF CUSTOMS/ TRADE , UPROOTED THE SHIVA LINGAM (BLASPHEMY ) AND FIXED IT ON THE SE CORNER OF THE TEMPLE STRUCTURE FIVE FEET ABOVE THE GROUND..<br /><br />150 - IS CAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL RIGHT WHEN HE SAYS \u2013 IS SANATANA DHARMA WE BUILD A TEMPLE OVER A SPOT WHERE A SHIVA LINGAM ( BLACK METEORITE DIVINE PHALLUS STONE WHICH PROVIDES THE DNA SEED ) IS FOUND, THE STONE CANNOT BE LIFTED OFF THE GROUND AND FIXED AT AN ALTERNATE SPOT..<br /><br />151 - IS CAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL RIGHT WHEN HE SAYS \u2013 KING CHERAMAN PERUMAL REPORTEDLY CONVERTED TO ISLAM AFTER MEETING MOHAMMAD , AND DECREED THAT HIS SHIVA TEMPLE AT KODUNGALLUR HIS CULTURAL CENTRE BE CONVERTED TO A MOSQUE BY PIGEON MESSAGE ..<br /><br />152 - IS CAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL RIGHT WHEN HE SAYS \u2013 KING CHERAMAN PERUMAL DIED ( REPORTEDLY WAS KILLED ) ON HIS WAY BACK TO CALICUT , INDIA AND HIS DEAD BODY IS BURIED AT A ISLAMIC DARGAH AT SALALAH OMAN MARKED AS THIYYAJUDDIN , KING OF HINDU THIYYA CLAN.<br /><br />153 - THESE UNGRATEFUL MUSLIMS NOW CALL HINDUS SAVAGES..<br /><br /><br />158 - IS CAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL RIGHT WHEN HE SAYS \u2013 THE VEDA SRUTI VERSES IN SANSKRIT HAD ITS OWN DIVINE MATH MULTIPLEX VERIFIERS .. VEDIC SRUTIS HAVE GOLDEN MEAN (1.618 ) , FIBONACCI SERIES , PASCALS TRIANGLE, LUCAS NUMBERS , SRI YANTRA ( GEOMETRY OF OM ), ULAM SPIRAL, PRIME NUMBER VERIFIER , ISOTOPE MAGIC EMBEDDED IN IT ..</span></b><br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\"><br />http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2019/02/sanatana-dharma-hinduism-exhumed-and.html</span><br />\n<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: blue;\">159- IS CAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL RIGHT WHEN HE SAYS \u2013 THE ORIGINAL KORAN STILL HAND MADE IN CHERAMAN PERUMAL MOSQUE LIES HIDDEN IN A FOXHOLE UNDER TIMBUCTOO DESERT SANDS SAFE FROM FRENCH JEW ROTHSCHILDs MERCENERIES WHO TRIED TO DESTROY THE BOOK SEVERAL TIMES BY BURNING DOWN THE LIBRARY AT MALI..</span></b><br />\n<br />\nLIES WONT WORK.. A BROWN HINDU BLOGGER IS IN TOWN..<br />\n<br />\nI WILL NOT REVEAL THE FURTHER DETAILS OF&nbsp;<b><span style=\"color: red;\">CODE 19&nbsp;</span></b>ENMESHED IN KORAN\u2014I WILL DO IT ONLY WHEN MY REVELATIONS REACH 98 %..<br />\n<br />\nIT SO HAPPENS THAT YOU TEACH SOME UNGRATEFUL BASTARD \u2013 AND LATER HE STARTS TEACHING YOU , WHAT HE LEARNT FROM YOU..<br />\n<br />\nCapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n</div>\n</li>\n</ol>\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; float: left; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n<img alt=\"\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-QSnd-Z8F7Kc/XFtPudWdwlI/AAAAAAABfq4/vxrkFOO7Iu8Mf6-OaPgw6FPpRDSmMgLdgCK4BGAYYCw/s35/capt%25252BajitC%25252Bvadakayil.JPG\" style=\"background: rgb(255, 255, 255); border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); box-shadow: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1) 1px 1px 5px; max-width: 36px; padding: 5px;\" /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. OR WHY HAJJ IS A EXPRESSION OF ARCHETYPAL PLANET VENUS ( SHUKRA GRAHA )..<br /><br />164 -- IS CAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL RIGHT WHEN HE SAYS \u2013 EVEN TODAY CHRISTIANS DO NOT KNOW WHY JUPITER ( BRIHASPATI ) IS A HOLY PLANET .. OR WHY THOR/ ZEUS ARE RELATED TO JUPITER / THURSDAY ..OR WHY THURSDAY OR THORS DAY ( BRIHASPATIWAR ) IS A HOLY DAY IN BIBLE..OR WHY THURDAY IS CALED BY GREEKS AS HEMERA DIOS ( DAY OF ZUES ) ..<br /><br />165 -- IS CAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL RIGHT WHEN HE SAYS \u2013 GREEKS LIFTED ZEUS / POSEIDON/ HADES FROM BRAHMA/ VISHNU / SHIVA AND HERA / HESTIA/ DEMETER FROM SARASWATI/ PARVATI/ LAXMI..<br /><br />166 -- IS CAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL RIGHT WHEN HE SAYS \u2013 THE ORIGINAL NAME OF RAMZAN WAS RAMA DYAN ( DAY TO WORSHIP RAMA )..<br /><br />167 -- IS CAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL RIGHT WHEN HE SAYS \u2013 CHRIST IS LIFTED FROM KRISHNA AS WS DECIDED IN 325 AD AT THE FIRST COUNCIL OF NICEA..</span></b><br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\"><br />http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/12/helena-mother-of-roman-emperor.html</span><br />\n<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: blue;\">168 -- IS CAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL RIGHT WHEN HE SAYS \u2013 JESUS (WHO NEVER EXISTED AND LIFTED FROM KERALA SAGE APOLLONIUS OF TYANA ) IS CONSIDERED AS DESCENDANT OF ABRAHAM .. ABRAHAM IS FATTHER OF ISRAELITES.. AND THE ANCESTOR OF MOHAMMAD ( IBRAHIM )..<br /><br />169 -- IS CAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL RIGHT WHEN HE SAYS \u2013 AMEN OF CHRISTIANITY AND SHALOM OF JUDAISM IS LIFTED FROM HINDU KING MANTRA OM.. SYMBOL OM WHEN SHOWN INTO THE MIRROR AND READ FROM RIGHT TO LEFT BECOMES NUMBER 786 WHICH IS PRINTED ON THE COVER OF EVERY KORAN AS BISMILLAH..<br /><br /><br />170\u2014 IS CAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL RIGHT WHEN HE SAYS \u2013 ADAM IS ADHAMA , EVE IS HAVYAVATI AND NOAH IS NYUHA AS MENTIONED IN BHAVISHYA PURANA , PRATISARGA KHAND..<br /><br />171- IS CAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL RIGHT WHEN HE SAYS \u2013 ADAM AND EVE STORY IS LIFTED FROM THE UPANISHADS PENNED 7000 YEARS AGO.. IN KORAN IT IS AT TIN.</span></b><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/09/sanatana-dharma-hinduism-exhumed-and.html</span><br />\n<br />\nLIES WONT WORK.. FYI<br />\n<br />\nhttps://assets.documentcloud.org/documents/5798075/Bjp-Election-2019-Manifesto-English.pdf<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n\"To ensure greater promotion and increase profitability under organic farming, we will take the following steps :<br />\n<br />\n1. We will promote chemical-free organic farming in an additional 20 lakh hectare of hilly, tribal and rainfed areas in the next 5 years.<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n2. Goshalas in the country will be linked to the promotion of organic farming.<br />\n<br />\n3. We will launch a dedicated e-commerce poal to enhance the availability of organic produce to the doorsteps of consumers.<br />\n<br />\n4. Promotion of organic eco-tourism in the vicinity of organic farming will also ensure additional income to the farmers. \"<br />\n<br />\nThe manifesto to mention about:<br />\n1. Warehouse Network across the Country - (Food Produce management<br />\n2. IT DOES NOT LIE..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\"><span style=\"color: red;\">https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654</span></span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Capt ajit vadakyil</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span class=\"comment-actions secondary-text\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: 16px;\"><span class=\"item-control blog-admin blog-admin pid-1783552029\" style=\"display: inline;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin-left: 36px; margin-top: 1em;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replybox-single\" id=\"c6373308942481921217-ce\" style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin-left: 48px; margin-top: 5px;\">\n</div>\n</li>\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"c8522441722171491944\" style=\"border-bottom: 0px; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 0.25em 0px 0px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. />\nPRASOON JOSHI<br />\nALL CONGRESS SPOKESMEN<br />\nRAHUL GANDHI<br />\nSONIA GANDHI<br />\nPRIYANKA GANDHI<br />\nJOHN DAYAL<br />\nSWARA TRRR BHASKAR ( OR IS IT PRRRR ? )<br />\nRANA AYYUB<br />\nSNEHLA RASHID<br />\nPAGALIKA GHOSE<br />\n<br />\nWEBSITES OF DESH BHAKT LEADERS<br />\nSPREAD ON SOCIAL MEDIA EVERY WHICH WAY</div>\n</div>\n</li>\n</ol>\n</div>\n</div>\n</li>\n</ol>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">INDIA INTRODUCED THE CONCEPT OF TILLING TO THIS PLANET<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">Tilling allows you to prepare a farming space fast.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">Tilling the soil &nbsp;helps enrich the toil by speeding up the decomposition of remaining crops, weeds and other organic matter that may be lying on the surface.&nbsp; It loosens and aerates the top layer of soil or horizon A, which facilitates planting the crop. Loosening the soil not only provides a good footing for newly germinated roots but it helps water, nutrients and oxygen reach those roots.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">Tilling breaks up hard soil and delivers nutrients deep into the soil. Plants need loose soil for their roots to grow and spread, and tilling is the most efficient way to break up a densely packed bed.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">Tilling mechanically destroys weeds.. With no-till a farmer has lost the ability to mechanically control weeds through tillage.&nbsp; Tilling or cultivating your garden helps tear weeds apart and break down their root systems.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">Without tillage, weeds have more time to establish themselves and grow.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">Tilling increases air in soil and stimulates the activity of aerobic bacteria. That helps break down organic matter more quickly, releasing heat as energy. Air pockets that are created by the deep loosening of soil facilitate air and water penetration for plants to use. Air penetration is also important to the micro-organisms in the soil that perform all kinds of important tasks creating nutrients for the plants<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\"><br /></span></div>\n<br style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px;\" />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">Compost, leaf litter, grass clippings and other organic amendments are powerful sources of nitrogen and carbon, two elements necessary for plant growth and good soil composition. Tilled soils have pockets that can secrete water but they also allow excess water to percolate down through soil which avoids sodden roots.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px;\" />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">SOMEONE ASKED ME\u2014 WHY PUT KERALA NENDRAN AND COCONUT WATER BANANA IN PACHGAVYA<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">WELL THEY ARE A GREAT SOURCE OF POTASSIUM<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px;\" />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">Potassium (K) is an essential nutrient for plant growth.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">It's classified as a macronutrient because plants take up large quantities of K during their life cycle. Potassium is associated with the movement of water, nutrients and carbohydrates in plant tissue. It\u2019s involved with enzyme activation within the plant, which affects protein, starch and adenosine triphosphate (ATP) production.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">The production of ATP can regulate the rate of photosynthesis. Potassium helps regulate the opening and closing of the stomata, which regulates the exchange of water vapor, oxygen and carbon dioxide. If K is deficient or not supplied in adequate amounts, it stunts plant growth and reduces yield.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">In the soil itself, potassium appears in three forms: (1) in the soil solution; (2) as the exchangeable ion K+ adsorbed to, or released from, the surfaces of clay particles; and (3) in organic matter. Potassium plays a most important role in regulating the water status of plants by lowering water potential.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px;\" />\n<br />\n<ol id=\"top-ra\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; list-style-type: none; padding: 0px;\">\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"c8565357787050294355\" style=\"border-bottom: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 0.25em 0px 0px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n<img alt=\"\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-QSnd-Z8F7Kc/XFtPudWdwlI/AAAAAAABfq4/vxrkFOO7Iu8Mf6-OaPgw6FPpRDSmMgLdgCK4BGAYYCw/s35/capt%25252BajitC%25252Bvadakayil.JPG\" style=\"background: rgb(255, 255, 255); border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); box-shadow: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1) 1px 1px 5px; max-width: 36px; padding: 5px;\" /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2019/03/india-must-revert-to-organic_26.html?showComment=1554545285678#c8565357787050294355\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">April 6, 2019 at 3:38 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nSOMEBODY ASKED ME\u2014WHAT IS THIS IR8 RICE YOU HAVE MENTIONED IN YOUR BLOG..<br />\n<br />\nWELL IT SACRIFICED QUALITY FOR QUANTITY.. THE NUTRITIONAL VALUE IS VERY POOR.<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2015/09/gm-ir8-rice-high-amylose-content.html</span><br />\n<br />\nIN KERALA ITSELF WE HAD MORE THAN 1.82 LAKH ( 180,000 ) VARIETIES OF RICE.. RICE LIKE NJAVARA WAS PREVENTIVE MEDICINE.<br />\n<br />\nTHE IR8 WAS A CONSPIRACY ON THE THIRD WORLD BY ROTHSCHILD USING HIS FRONTS\u2014THE FORD AND ROCKEFELLER FOUNDATIONS..<br />\n<br />\nFAMINE WAS DELIBERATELY CREATED AS A HEGELIAN DIALECTIC TO PUSH THESE USELESS VARIETIES OF RICE WHICH GIVE YOU BRAIN FOG AND REDUCED FERTILITY OF WOMEN..<br />\n<br />\nThe International Rice Research Institute (IRRI) is an international agricultural research and training organization with headquarters in Los Ba\u00f1os, Laguna in the Philippines and offices in seventeen countries with more than 1500 staff.<br />\n<br />\nTHE WHOLE IDEA WAS TO CONTROL FOOD .<br />\n<br />\nSTERILE / TERMINATOR SEEDS WAS THE FIRST STEP..<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2012/05/monsanto-and-farmer-suicides-in-india.html</span><br />\n<br />\nSO SO SO-- In 1960, the KOSHER DEEP STATE established and funded the IRRI, the International Rice Research Institute, in the Philippines with Dr. Robert Chandler as its director. Henry Beachell became IRRI's chief rice breeder.<br />\n<br />\nThey imported seeds for over 10,000 varieties of rice from around the world. Many of these were dwarf varieties to cross with taller varieties.<br />\n<br />\nIn 1962, Dr. Peter Jennings made 38 crosses of various varieties at IRRI. The eighth was between a Chinese dwarf variety known as Dee-geo-woo-gen (DGWG) and a tall variety from Indonesia, Peta. This eighth cross was promising, but only 130 seeds were produced. How those 130 seeds became the famous IR8 variety was a DELIBERATE process \u2013<br />\n<br />\nThe 130 seeds were planted in pots to produce the first generation (F1) of plants. All were tall.<br />\n<br />\nThe F1 seeds were planted and produced about 10,000 second-generation (F2) plants. One-quarter of those plants were dwarf. That meant that dwarfism was controlled by a single gene in the DGWG variety, making the job of producing a commercial variety a lot easier.<br />\n<br />\nAll of the tall plants from the F2 generation were discarded, and the short plants were planted to become the F3 generation.<br />\n<br />\nFrom the F3 plants, Beachell used his plant judging skills to select 298 individual plants. Seeds from each of those plants were planted in individual \"pedigree rows\" to produce the fourth (F4) generation.<br />\n<br />\nIn that F4 generation, Beachell again selected the best individual plants. In row 288, the third plant in looked the best to him. He dubbed it IR8-288-3 and this F5 plant became the source for the revolutionary variety that became known simply as IR8.<br />\n<br />\nBy 1980, IR36 resisted pests and grew fast enough to allow two crops a year instead of just one, doubling the yield. Less time in chemical laden soil means less quality.. And by 1990, using more advanced genetic manipulation techniques, IR72 was outperforming even IR36<br />\n<br />\nBy employing \"Terminator\" genes, seed manufacturers can exercise patent enforcement techniques not too different from software activation. You can grow the plants fine, but the engineered traits require chemical activation, thus enforcing annual license fees from farmers.. Because genetically engineered seeds are patented, the seed company can maintain strict control over how the seeds are used.<br />\n<br />\nCONTINUED TO 2--</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" style=\"margin-left: 36px; margin-top: 1em;\">\n<div class=\"comment-thread inline-thread\" id=\"c8565357787050294355-rt\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; margin: 8px 0px; padding: 0.5em 1em;\">\n<ol class=\"thread-chrome thread-expanded\" id=\"c8565357787050294355-ra\" style=\"list-style-type: none; padding: 0px;\">\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"c1585386215361953487\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 16px 0px 8px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2019/03/india-must-revert-to-organic_26.html?showComment=1554545489038#c1585386215361953487\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">April 6, 2019 at 3:41 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nCONTINUED FROM 1--<br />\n<br />\n<br />\nTHE GREEN REVOLUTION ELIMINATED MORE THAN 1.8 LAKH VARIETIES OF RICE IN KERALA ALONE.. NJAVARA RICE IS A SURVIVOR\u2014 PUT NOW EVEN THIS PRICELESS RICE IS GM..<br />\n<br />\nDESPITE RAPING INDIAN SOIL WITH GREEN REVOLUTION AND MAKING PRICELESS SEEDS EXTINCT, MS SWAMINATHAN IS STILL PRAISING HIS DESH DROHI GREEN REVOLUTION..<br />\n<br />\nPM MODI IS STILL SINGING THE PRAISES OF GM SEEDS.. HE HOPES TO GET THE NOBEL PRIZE SOON.. ALREADY HE IS \"CHAMPION OF EARTH\" FOR HIS SLIMY EFFORTS TOWARDS MOTHBALLING INDIAN COAL..<br />\n<br />\nIN A SCHOOL DEBATE WHEN I WAS 12 YEARS OLD, I TALKED ABOUT IR8 RICE AND CALLED IT A CONSPIRACY. NOT EVEN ONE SOUL IN THE HALL HEARD ABOUT IR8 RICE..<br />\n<br />\nThe taste and texture of the rice. IR8 was chalky and hardened after cooking: it may have been plentiful, but it wasn't nutritious or palatable.<br />\n<br />\nI COMMANDED SHIPS WITH FILIPINO CREW.. I HAVE TRIED A DELIBERATE EXPERIMENT\u2014JUST WITHHOLD RICE\u2014 AND THE FILIPINOS GET BRAIN FOGGY AND PANICKY..<br />\n<br />\nREASON?<br />\n<br />\nTHE USELESS GREEN REVOLUTION RICE WHICH WAS SHOVED DOWN THE THROATS OF PHILLIPINES.<br />\n<br />\nFOOD MUST NEVER GIVE \"WITHDRAWAL SYMPTOMS\"..<br />\n<br />\nTHIS PLANET MUST GO BACK TO ORGANIC AGRICULTURE..<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2019/03/india-must-revert-to-organic.html<br /><br />https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2019/03/india-must-revert-to-organic_26.html</span><br />\n<br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n<span class=\"comment-actions secondary-text\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" style=\"margin-left: 36px; margin-top: 1em;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replybox-single\" id=\"c1585386215361953487-ce\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; margin-top: 5px;\">\n</div>\n</li>\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"c1322674972773554399\" style=\"border-bottom: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 0.25em 0px 0px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2019/03/india-must-revert-to-organic_26.html?showComment=1554553519931#c6564427438866314912\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">April 6, 2019 at 5:55 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nSOMEBODY ASKED ME<br />\n<br />\nCAPTAIN, YOU SAID THAT THE WHITE MAN STOLE AGRICULTURE FROM VEGAN INDIA .. CAN YOU AUTHENTICATE IT..<br />\n<br />\nINDIA NEVER FACED FAMINE TILL THE WHITE INVADER CAME TO INDIA. WE PRODUCED PLENTIFUL FOOD..<br />\n<br />\nWE GAVE AWAY FOOD GRAINS FREE TO THE DESERT NATIONS FROM KERALA..WE TOOK MONEY ONLY FOR SPICES AND TRANSLATED KNOWLEDGE..<br />\n<br />\nTHERE ARE MANY WHITE MEN WHO STOLE AGRICULTURAL IDEAS AND SEEDS FROM INDIA..<br />\n<br />\nONE EXAMPLE ?<br />\n<br />\n<b style=\"font-size: 16px;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">A PORTUGUESE JEW NAMED GARCIA DE ORTA , BASED IN GOA WAS IN KERALA FOR YEARS SCROUNGING FOR NUGGETS OF KNOWLEDGE.. HE KNEW MALAYALAM.</span></b><br />\n<br />\nOne of his books is available in Indian libraries..<br />\n<br />\nHis book published in 1563 Col\u00f3quios dos simples e drogas da India, was a treatise on the medicinal and economic plants of India. A postal stamp of Garcia de Orta was released by Portugal in 1963..</div>\n<div>\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: medium;\">JEW GARCIA DE ORTA is the one who took Indian agricultural practices to the west..</span><span style=\"color: red; font-size: medium;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<br />\nNow the white man tries to prove that he taught India agriculture..<br />\n<br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n</li>\n</ol>\n<span style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">The Protection of Plant Variety and Farmers Right Act, 2001 (PPVFR Act) is an Act of the Parliament of India that was enacted to provide for the establishment of an effective system for protection of plant varieties, the rights of farmers and plant breeders, and to encourage the development and cultivation of new varieties of plants. This act received the assent of the President of India on the 30 October 2001.</span><br />\n<br style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px;\" />\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; clear: both; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/_HlTRSnr7zw/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/_HlTRSnr7zw?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<br style=\"background-color: #cccccc; A WAY FOR CORRUPT POLITICIANS TO MAKE MONEY</span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: 17.6px;\"><br /></span><span style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: 17.6px;\"></span><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: 17.6px;\">MOST OF INDIAs DAMS ARE MERE WHITE ELEPHANTS..</span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: 17.6px;\"><br /></span><span style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: 17.6px;\"></span><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: 17.6px;\">WE MUST HAVE THE CAPABILITY TO BUILD DREDGERS SUITABLE FOR DESILTING</span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: 17.6px;\"><br /></span><span style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: 17.6px;\"></span><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: 17.6px;\">REMOVED SILT CAN BE CONVERTED TO FANTASTIC ORGANIC FERTILIZER&nbsp; BY USING ORGANIC CATALYSTS..</span><br />\n<br style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px;\" />\n<br style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px;\" />\n<br style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px;\" />\n<br style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px;\" />\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: cyan;\"><b>ALREADY&nbsp; MODI IS \u201cCHAMPION EARTH\u201d FOR STEALTHILY\nMOTHBALLING INDIAs ENORMOUS COAL RESERVES..</b></span><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">WE ASK THE GOVT NOT TO\nALLOW SUBDIVISION AND FRAGMENTATION OF FERTILE CULTIVABLE LAND ..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;
