font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">THE MODI GOVT MUST HAVE\nA POLICY THAT LESS THAN A DECLARED AREA, THE LAND CANNOT BE SUBDIVIDED BETWEEN\nCHILDREN INHERITING THE JOINT PROPERTY..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">YOU CAN MAKE\nPROFIT&nbsp; BY DOING ORGANIC AGRICULTURE ON\nSMALL PIECES OF LAND.. ESPECIALLY IN MODERN TIMES ( LIKE IN KERALA ) WHEN LABOR\nCHARGES ARE TOO HIGH..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">INDIA MUST GO BACK FROM\nCHEMICAL FERTILIZER AGRICULTURE ( ICK STARTED BY GREEN REVOLUTION ) TO ORGANIC\nFARMING..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">THE IMMEDIATE NEED IS\nTO INCREASE THE THICKNESS OF OUR TOP SOIL WHICH IS NOW JUST ONE FOOT DEEP (\nBEFORE GREEN REVOLUTION IT WAS SIX FEET DEEP ).. THE REST OF THE PLANET HAS\nJUST COUPLE OF INCHES OF TOP SOIL.. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">WHAT HOLDS GOOD FOR\nHOLLAND AND ISRAEL ( WITH SHIT TOP SOIL ) DOES NOT HOLD GOOD FOR INDIA..</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The loss of soil\nnutrients and the biodiversity base is a result of continued over-exploitative\napproaches based on chemicals in contemporary chemical based industrial\nagriculture.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">INDIAs&nbsp; BEST BRAINS MUST\nBE DIVERTED TO ORGANIC AGRICULTURE TILL WE PHASE OUT GREEN REVOLUTION FULLY.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">WE NEED SEPARATE\nMINISTRIES FOR ORGANIC SOIL AND CLEAN GROUND WATER.&nbsp; RAI WATER HARVESTING MUST BE TAUGHT IN\nSCHOOLS AT PRIMARY LEVEL.. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">NCERT MUST\nCREATE EDUCATIONAL VIDEOS ..&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">I GIVE THEM PERMISSION TO DIP INTO MY BLOG POSTS\nWITHOUT MY PERMISSION.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">TO ALLOW RAIN WATER TO\nEVAPORATE IS A CRIME..&nbsp; FROM HENCEFORTH\nIT MUST BE PUNISHABLE.. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">ALLOWING WATER TO\nEVAPORATE FROM DAM RESERVOIRS IS MADNESS.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Soil is a living\nsystem. Organic farming builds living soils through providing locally adaptable\ncropping practices, including mixed cropping and crop rotations, thus enriching\nsoil nutrients. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Organic farming has\nevolved effective and varied organic manures, such as vermicompost, vermiwash,\npanchagavaya ghanamrit, jeevamirit, compost and green manures. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">These practices can lead\nto the rejuvenation of the soil flora and fauna, and soil fertility. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Use of heavy machinery\nin farming is leading to soil compaction, resulting in lower infiltration and\nrecharge of ground water and interrupting the flow of nutrients. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Protecting the soil\norganisms, soil texture, structure and porosity and health, requires reduction\nin mechanical power, especially tractors in tillage operations. Tilling need\nnot be very deep.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">IF BURNING CROP STUBBLE\n( BIOCHAR PRODUCTION ) &nbsp;IS CAUSING SMOG\nIN DELHI PRONE TO TEMPERATURE INVERSION \u2014SHIFT THE CAPITAL.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: purple;\">INDIA HAS THE POTENTIAL\n( AND THE SOIL ) TO EXPORT ORGANIC FOODS AND RAKE IN ENORMOUS FOREIGN\nEXCHANGE.. &nbsp;THE WORLD HAS WOKEN UP TO THE\nVILS OF CHEMICAL FERTILISERS AND PESTICIDES.<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: purple;\">SAME WAY \u2013<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><span style=\"color: purple;\">INDIA HAS THE POTENTIAL\n( AND THE HUMPED VEDIC COWS ) TO EXPOST A2 MILK AND RAKE IN ENNOURMOUS FOREIGN\nEXCHANGE .. THE WORLD HAS WOKEN UP TO THE TOXICITY OF HUMPLESS JERSEY COW\nMILK..</span></span><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Contrary to the popular\nmyth, organic farming produces more food per acre than monocultures and\nchemical farming. Since organic systems are based on crop diversity, they\nproduce the diverse nutrients needed for a balanced diet.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Organically-produced\nfood contains more nutrients, especially micro-nutrients and trace elements,\nthan chemically-produced food. Yield of a few monoculture crops is an\ninadequate assessment for nutritional security.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">For human nutrition,\nmicronutrient requirements are in amounts generally less than 100 milligrams\nper day, whereas macronutrients are required in gram quantities daily.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">AYURVEDA GIVES PRIMARY\nIMPORTANCE TO WHOLESOME VEGAN FOOD TO PREVENT DISEASES.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">AND DON\u2019T LISTEN TO\nPEOPLE WHO SAY THAT VEGANS DON\u2019T GET ENOUGH PROTEIN.. ELEPHANT IS A VEGAN.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Although there are\ndozens of different micronutrients that are all vital to overall health ( which\nyou don\u2019t get with chemical based farming ) , here are a few examples of\nmicronutrients that are found in many healthy whole food sources:--<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Vitamin A<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Vitamin C<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Vitamin D<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Vitamin E<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Vitamin K<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Thiamine<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Riboflavin<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Niacin<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Vitamin B6<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Folate<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Vitamin B12<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Pantothenic Acid<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Choline<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Betaine<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Calcium<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Iron<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Magnesium<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Phosphorus<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Potassium<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Sodium<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Zinc<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Copper<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Manganese<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Selenium<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Fluoride<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Micronutrients are\nessential because they protect our bodies from disease, slow the aging process\nand help every system in our bodies work properly. The long list of\nmicronutrients functions can range from supporting metabolism to fighting free\nradicals and promoting overall health.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The body uses dozens of\ndifferent micronutrients every single hour of every single day to keep us\nenergized, produce enzymes and hormones, and prevent nutritional deficiencies.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Specific micronutrient deficiencies can result in various problems like mental\nimpairment, poor digestion, thyroid problems and bone loss.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Among other roles, the\nmain jobs of micronutrients include:--<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">synthesizing DNA<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">facilitating growth<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">producing digestive\nenzymes<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">helping keep a strong\nmetabolism<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">breaking down carbs,\nfats and proteins into usable energy<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">aiding in bone\nmineralization<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">helping with hormone\nproduction<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">allowing cells to\nrejuvenate<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">slowing oxidation\ndamage or signs of aging caused by free radicals<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">allowing muscles to\nmove and helping with tissue repair<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">protecting the brain<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">So what are\nmacronutrients, and what are the differences between macronutrients vs.\nmicronutrients? Macronutrients are essentially the way we classify the calories\nfound in foods into one of three groups: carbohydrates, proteins or fats.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u201cMacro\u201d means big, so it makes sense that the official macronutrients\ndefinition encompasses any substance required in relatively large amounts by\nhumans. On the other hand, \u201cmicro\u201d means small, which represents the fact that\nwe need micronutrients like vitamins and minerals in much smaller quantities.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Each food that we eat has a proportion of macronutrients, and the one with the\nhighest percentage is often how we classify the food. For example, grains have\na high percentage of carbohydrate molecules, so we commonly refer to grains as\n\u201ccarbs\u201d instead of fats or proteins, even though many grains contain a small\namount of each.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Many micronutrients are\nconsidered essential nutrients, which means they are not made within the body.\nWe must get these micronutrients from foods, otherwise we risk micronutrient\ndeficiencies, such as iron deficiency, low potassium, low vitamin B12 or\nmagnesium deficiency.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">There are &nbsp;13 different types of vitamins, all of which\nhave their own important roles in body, including protecting against oxidative\nstress, slowing the aging process and preventing cancer.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">BEFORE THE GREEN\nREVOLUTION CANCER CASES ( ALO DOWN SYNDROME/ AUTISM ) IN INDIA WERE\nNEGLIGIBLE..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Minerals play a big\nrole in bone development, brain health, cellular function and metabolism, and\nhumans need at least 18 different minerals to function properly. These include\nmacro-minerals that we usually think of as \u201celectrolytes,\u201d such as calcium,\nmagnesium, potassium and sodium, plus other trace minerals that we need in\nsmaller quantities like copper, iodine, iron, manganese, selenium and zinc.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Micronutrients of all\nkinds are important co-factors in DNA synthesis and metabolism, as they are\nfrequently involved in modulating enzymes that help us absorb other nutrients\nand turn them into fuel for the body. Zinc, for example, is a co-factor for\nover 100 enzymes. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Selenium, on the other\nhand, is an important mineral for metabolism that is involved in the production\nof the enzyme glutathione peroxidase, also known as the master antioxidant.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">No single type of food\ncontains all the micronutrients we need, which is why variety is key. The focus\nshould be on anti-inflammatory foods, meaning those that are fresh and found in\nnature, including all types of colorful vegetables, fruits, beans nuts, whole\ngrains, and quality animal foods like seafood and eggs.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It\u2019s best to get your\nvitamins and minerals through whole food sources, as these foods supply a\nwealth of micronutrients and macronutrients to help optimize your health.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The\nnutrients found in these foods can also be absorbed more easily ( VITAMIN\nTABLETS FROM EVIL PHARMA CANT DO THIS ) , ensuring that your body is able to\nuse them more efficiently to maximize the potential health benefits.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">DOCTORS LOVE THE GREEN\nREVOLUTION\u2014THEY SING ALL THE WAY TO THE KOSHER BANK.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The complex mixture of\nmicronutrients found naturally in a diet high in fruit and vegetables is likely\nmore effective than large doses of a small number of micronutrients.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Micronutrients are\nessential to many aspects of health and play a central role in nearly every\nbodily function.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">While a comprehensive micronutrients list would be too long to\ninclude here, below are some examples that illustrate the importance of\nmicronutrients and the crucial roles that they play in the body:--<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Potassium: lowers blood\npressure, helps combat heart disease<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Vitamin A: antioxidant\nthat fights free radicals, supports skin and eye health, fights cancer by\nblocking DNA mutations in cancerous cells<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Vitamin B12: helps\nproduce hemoglobin, which carries oxygen throughout the body, and fights\nfatigue<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Vitamin C: improves\nimmune function, prevents oxidative stress, fights cancer and prevents common\nillnesses of the skin, eyes, etc.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Vitamin D: promotes\nhealthy bone metabolism, helps prevent depression, may have anti-cancer\nproperties<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Vitamin E: acts as an\nantioxidant, protects cell membranes, protects heart health<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Vitamin K: critical in\nblood clotting, protects against heart disease, osteoporosis and other types of\ncancer<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Zinc: boosts the immune\nsystem, supports brain function, improves heart health<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Iodine: important for\nfetal development and thyroid health<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Beta-carotene: turns\ninto antioxidant vitamin A in the body, strengthens the immune system and\nmucous membranes<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Calcium: maintains bone\nstrength, acts as an antacid, regulates high blood pressure<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Choline: prevents fat\naccumulation in the liver, promotes brain development, helps improve liver\nfunction<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Chromium: removes sugar\nfrom the bloodstream and converts into energy, helps control blood sugar in\nindividuals with type 2 diabetes<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Copper:\nanti-inflammatory, helps combat arthritis, known as a brain stimulant<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Flavonoid\n(antioxidants): reduces the risk of cancer, asthma, stroke and heart disease;\nfights free radical damage, protects brain health<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Carotenoid\n(antioxidants): protects and preserves eye health, fights macular degeneration\nand cataracts<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Folate: plays a central\nrole in fetus development and cervical cancer prevention, contains\nantidepressant properties<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Iron: helps transport\noxygen to the entire body, prevents anemia and low energy<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Manganese: improves\nbone density, helps combat free radicals, regulates blood sugar, regulates\nmetabolism and inflammation<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Riboflavin (vitamin\nB2): helps prevent cervical cancer, fights headaches and migraines, can help\ntreat acne, muscle cramps, carpal tunnel and fatigue<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Selenium: has\nantioxidant properties, reduces the risk of prostate cancer, aids in the\ntreatment of asthma, arthritis and infertility<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Because each and every\nmicronutrient is essential to health, a deficiency in any vitamin or mineral can\ncome with some serious side effects and consequences. Although the exact\nmicronutrients deficiency symptoms can vary based on which vitamin or mineral\nyou may be lacking, some of the most common symptoms that can indicate there\nmay be a problem include: <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Fatigue<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Weakness<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Dry skin<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Impaired immunity<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Bleeding gums<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Anemia<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Vision problems<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Easy bruising<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Memory loss ( CHOOTIYA DHAKKANS ) <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Muscle cramps<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">On a well-rounded and\nbalanced diet, most people can meet their micronutrient needs through food\nsources alone<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<b style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><br /></b>\n<b style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><br /></b>\n<b style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><br /></b>\n<b style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><br /></b>\n<b style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><br /></b>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; \"IS CAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL RIGHT WHEN HE SAYS BLAH BLAH BLAH \".<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2019/04/repeated-blasphemy-against-hindu-gods.html<br /><br PLANETs SECOND OLDEST MOSQUE IS THE CHERAMAN PERUMAL MOSQUE AT KODUNGALLUR OWNED BY THE CALICUT THIYYA KING CHERAMAN PERUMAL ..<br /><br />145 - IS CAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL RIGHT WHEN HE SAYS \u2013 KING CHERAMAN PERUMAL OWNED THE SHIVA TEMPLE KAABALISHWARA AT MECCA OASIS WHICH ALSO DOUBLED UP AS A SPICE FREE TRADE CUSTOMS OUTPOST ..<br /><br />146 - IS CAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL RIGHT WHEN HE SAYS \u2013 KAABA AT MECCA , THE HOLIEST PLACE OF THE MUSLIMS AND THIS PLANETs FIRST MOSQUE IS THE NAME OF LORD SHIVA AS GOD WITH THE MATTED LOCKS WHICH IS THE SOURCE OF THE GANGES..<br /><br />147 - IS CAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL RIGHT WHEN HE SAYS \u2013 KAABALA ( KABBALAH ) OF JUDAISM IS JUST A CORRUPTION OF KAABA + ISHAWARA ( KAABALISHAWARA ) ROOTED IN EIN SOF, THE ENDLESS ONE..<br /><br />148 - IS CAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL RIGHT WHEN HE SAYS \u2013 KING CHERAMAN PERUMAL RUSHED TO MECCA ON BEING SUMMONED BY EMERGENCY PIGEON MESSAGE BY THE KERALA NAMBOODIRI ARYAN PRIEST OF THE SHIVA TEMPLE AT MECCA OASIS , BY SHIP TO SALALAH ( PORT AT DHOFAR, HIS OWN KINGDOM ) AND THEN BY CARAVAN ROUTE ..<br /><br />149 - IS CAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL RIGHT WHEN HE SAYS \u2013 DURING A FLOOD AT MECCA , THE SHIVA TEMPLE SHIVA LINGAM WAS SUBMERGED UNDER FIVE FEET OF WATER AND THE HINDU SON ( MOHAMMAD ) OF THE YOUNGER SEMITE NAMBOODIRI BROTHER IN CHARGE OF CUSTOMS/ TRADE , UPROOTED THE SHIVA LINGAM (BLASPHEMY ) AND FIXED IT ON THE SE CORNER OF THE TEMPLE STRUCTURE FIVE FEET ABOVE THE GROUND..<br /><br />150 - IS CAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL RIGHT WHEN HE SAYS \u2013 IS SANATANA DHARMA WE BUILD A TEMPLE OVER A SPOT WHERE A SHIVA LINGAM ( BLACK METEORITE DIVINE PHALLUS STONE WHICH PROVIDES THE DNA SEED ) IS FOUND, THE STONE CANNOT BE LIFTED OFF THE GROUND AND FIXED AT AN ALTERNATE SPOT..<br /><br />151 - IS CAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL RIGHT WHEN HE SAYS \u2013 KING CHERAMAN PERUMAL REPORTEDLY CONVERTED TO ISLAM AFTER MEETING MOHAMMAD , AND DECREED THAT HIS SHIVA TEMPLE AT KODUNGALLUR HIS CULTURAL CENTRE BE CONVERTED TO A MOSQUE BY PIGEON MESSAGE ..<br /><br />152 - IS CAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL RIGHT WHEN HE SAYS \u2013 KING CHERAMAN PERUMAL DIED ( REPORTEDLY WAS KILLED ) ON HIS WAY BACK TO CALICUT , INDIA AND HIS DEAD BODY IS BURIED AT A ISLAMIC DARGAH AT SALALAH OMAN MARKED AS THIYYAJUDDIN , KING OF HINDU THIYYA CLAN.<br /><br />153 - IS CAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL RIGHT WHEN HE SAYS \u2013 THIS PLANETs FIRST PRISTINE KORAN WAS COMPILED AT KODUNGALLUR CHERAMAN PERUMAL MOSQUE A YEAR AFTER THE DEATH OF MOHAMMAD BY SEMITE YOUNGER BROTHERS OF NAMBOODIRIS UNDER THE CHARGE OF MOHAMMADs FRIEND AND DISCIPLE HINDU CONVERT MALIK BIN DINAR \u2026</span></b><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2009/07/vedic-practises-in-mecca-ajit-vadakayil.html</span><br />\n<br />\nCAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL<br />\n..</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" style=\"margin-left: 36px; margin-top: 1em;\">\n<div class=\"comment-thread inline-thread\" id=\"c6043198391169861581-rt\" THESE UNGRATEFUL MUSLIMS NOW CALL HINDUS SAVAGES..<br /><br /><br />158 - IS CAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL RIGHT WHEN HE SAYS \u2013 THE VEDA SRUTI VERSES IN SANSKRIT HAD ITS OWN DIVINE MATH MULTIPLEX VERIFIERS .. A BROWN HINDU BLOGGER IS IN TOWN..<br />\n<br />\nI WILL NOT REVEAL THE FURTHER DETAILS OF&nbsp;<b><span style=\"color: red;\">CODE 19&nbsp;</span></b>ENMESHED IN KORAN\u2014I WILL DO IT ONLY WHEN MY REVELATIONS REACH 98 %..<br />\n<br />\nIT SO HAPPENS THAT YOU TEACH SOME UNGRATEFUL BASTARD \u2013 AND LATER HE STARTS TEACHING YOU , WHAT HE LEARNT FROM YOU..<br />\n<br />\nCapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" style=\"margin-left: 36px; margin-top: 1em;\">\n<div class=\"comment-thread inline-thread\" id=\"c7822148748057008874-rt\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; margin: 8px 0px; padding: 0.5em 1em;\">\n<ol class=\"thread-chrome thread-expanded\" id=\"c7822148748057008874-ra\" style=\"list-style-type: none; padding: 0px;\">\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"c806970617106005461\" style=\"border-bottom: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 16px 0px 0px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. IS CAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL RIGHT WHEN HE SAYS THAT- WHEN THE WHITE INVADER CAME TO INDIA THERE WAS NOT A SINGLE BUDDHIST IN INDIA..&nbsp;</span></span><br />\n<div>\n<span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></div>\n<span style=\"color: blue;\"></span><br />\n<div>\n<span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></div>\n<span style=\"color: blue;\"><span style=\"font-weight: bold;\">25\u2026 IS CAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL RIGHT WHEN HE SAYS \u2013 GANDHI CONDUCTED THE LONGEST EXPERIMENT EVER.. HIS EXPERIMENTS WITH TRUTH LASTED DECADES, NOT YEARS , MONTHS, DAYS, HOURS OR MINUTES...</span></span><br />\n<div>\n<span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></div>\n<span style=\"color: blue;\"><span style=\"font-weight: bold;\">26 \u2026 IS CAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL RIGHT WHEN HE SAYS \u2013 THE BRITISH INVADER BUILT RAILWAYS IN INDIA TO CART AWAY INDIAs WEALTH , AND CONVERT INDIA FROM THE RICHEST TO THE POOREST NATION IN 200 YEARS FLAT..</span></span><br />\n<br />\nCONTINUED TO 2--</div>\n</li>\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"c1795692814197496308\" style=\"border-bottom: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 0.25em 0px 0px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; font-size: 16px; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" style=\"font-size: 16px; margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. UNDER \"IS CAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL RIGHT WHEN HE SAYS BLAH BLAH BLAH \".<br />\n<br />\nhttps://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2019/03/questions-from-capt-ajit-vadakayil.html<br />\n<br />\nNEW QUESTIONS \u2013<b><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br />57 -- IS CAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL RIGHT WHEN HE SAYS \u2013 QUORA CEO ADAM D ANGELO IS A RABID ANTI-HINDU ANTI-INDIA RACIST WHO ALLOWS FOUL INNUENDO ON HINDUS AND INDIA....<br /><br />58 -- IS CAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL RIGHT WHEN HE SAYS \u2013 LORD KRISHNA DID NOT DEFLOWER 16,000 VIRGIN MILKMAIDS OF BRINDAVAN, RATHER IT IS AN ALLEGORY FOR 1000 PETALLED SAHASRARA CHAKRA WITH 16 KALAS, MAKING 16000 DHATUS..<br /><br />59 - IS CAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL RIGHT WHEN HE SAYS \u2013 VISHNU/ SHIVA / BRAHMA DID NOT SCREW EACH OTHERS WIVES LAXMI/ PARVATI/ SARASWATI BEHIND THEIR BACKS, BECAUSE ALL SIX ARE COSMIC ALLEGORIES ON MACRO AND MICRO SCALE..<br /><br />60-- IS CAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL RIGHT WHEN HE SAYS \u2013 BRAHMA DID NOT HAVE INCEST WITH HIS OWN DAUGHTER SARASWATI BECAUSE BOTH ARE COSMIC ALLEGORIES , WITH SARASWATI BEING THE MIGHTY QUASAR HAVING ONE TRILLION TIMES MORE BRILLIANCE THAN THE SUN..<br /><br /><br />61-- IS CAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL RIGHT WHEN HE SAYS \u2013 GODDESS KALI, WIFE OF SHIVA IS THE MIGHTY BLACK HOLE WHICH CAN DEVOUR ENTIRE GALAXIES IN SECONDS, NOT AN ISLAMIC ISIS TERRORIST AS PORTRAYED BY RABIDLY ANTI-HINDU TEESTASETALVAD ..<br /><br />62- IS CAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL RIGHT WHEN HE SAYS \u2013 MANU WAS A NOBLE MAHARISHI WHO WROTE THE FIRST LAWS OF THE PLANET IN SANSKRIT 10,300 YEARS AGO , NOT A BIGOT WHO TORTURED SHUDRAS , AS CASTE SYSTEM WAS CREATED BY THE WHITE INVADER REPLACING VARNAS ..</span></b><br />\n<br />\nCapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n</div>\n</li>\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"c2058712178715605270\" ADI SHANKARACHARYA BORN 4000 YEARS AGO WAS AN ARYAN\u2026</span></div>\n<span style=\"color: blue;\">\n</span>\n<br />\n<div>\n<span style=\"color: blue;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-weight: 700;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<span style=\"color: blue;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-weight: bold;\">108-- IS CAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL RIGHT WHEN HE SAYS- ARYAN IS A REVERED TITLE , AND ANCIENT ARYAN KERALA NAMBOODIRIS WERE VISITING PROFESSORS ON DEPUTATION FROM KODUNGALLUR UNIVERISTY TO FOREIGN UNIVERSITIES AND INDIAN UNIVERSITIES.. QUORA QUESTIONS UNDER \"IS CAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL RIGHT WHEN HE SAYS BLAH BLAH BLAH \".<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2019/04/repeated-blasphemy-against-hindu-gods.html<br /><br />https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2019/04/questions-from-capt-ajit-vadakayil.html</span><br />\n<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: blue;\">119-- IS CAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL RIGHT WHEN HE SAYS - AS PER VARNA SYSTEM OF SANATANA DHARMA , BRAHMINS WERE ABSOLUTELY FORBIDDEN FROM BEING RULERS OR WARRIORS OR OWNING LAND ? ..&nbsp;</span></b><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2011/07/untouchables-capt-ajit-vadakayil.html</span><br />\n<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: blue;\">120- IS CAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL RIGHT WHEN HE SAYS \u2013 THE ONLY EXCEPTION FOR BRAHMINS OWNING LANDS WAS CREATED BY THE SIXTH AVATAR OF VISHNU , PARASHURAMA 6000 YEARS AGO, WHEN HE DECRIED THAT KERALA BRAHMIN NAMBOODIRI CLAN ELDEST ARYAN BROTHER MUST OWN ALL LAND ..WITH PRIMARY BONAFIDE MOTIVE OF PREVENTING SUBDIVISION AND FRAGMENTATION OF FERTILE LAND ..</span></b><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2011/10/worst-racists-on-planet-earth-capt-ajit.html</span><br />\n<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: blue;\">121- - IS CAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL RIGHT WHEN HE SAYS \u2013 WITH ELDEST BROTHER KERALA NAMBOODIRI HOLDING ALL LAND AND ALL KNOWLEDGE ( ORAL AND WRITTEN OF 4 VEDAS 108 UPANISHADS ) THEY BECAME THE WORST RACISTS ON PLANET EARTH \u2026AND WITH EXTREME MONOPOLIZED POWER BECAME SEXUALLY DECADENT FROM 4000 BC TO 2000 BC ..<br /><br />122- IS CAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL RIGHT WHEN HE SAYS \u2013 A KERALA NAMBOOODIRI NAMED ADI SHANKARACHARYA CUT THE STRENGTH OF HIS OWN CLAN 4000 YEARS AGO , BY CREATING 4 MUTTS IN 4 CORNERS OF INDIA ( OUTSIDE KERALA ) EACH UNDER A NAMBOODIRI PONTIFF , AND DISTRIBUTING THE 4 VEDAS AND 108 UPANISHADS TO THESE 4 MUTTS..</span></b><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2014/01/my-visit-to-sringeri-mutt-exhuming.html</span><br />\n<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: blue;\">123- IS CAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL RIGHT WHEN HE SAYS \u2013 WHEN THE WHITE INVADER CAME TO INDIA THERE WERE ONY 4 ORIGINAL MUTTS , BUT BY THE TIME HE LEFT INDIA IN 1947, HE CREATED MORE THAN 1000 FAKE MUTTS WITH HOMOSEXUAL UNMARRIED CRYPTO JEW PONTIFFS CLAIMING TO BE SEMEN RETAINING BRAHMACHARIS , TO DIVIDE AND RULE BY HARASSING POOR HINDUS..</span></b><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2013/06/kanchi-mutt-creation-of-white-invader.html</span><br />\n<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: blue;\">124- IS CAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL RIGHT WHEN HE SAYS \u2013 IN SANATANA DHARMA NO MAN COULD DO A YAGNA IF HE WAS UNMARRIED OR A WIDOWER..IN AS MUCH AS KERALA NAMBOODIRI ELDEST ARYAN BROTHER WITH SWASTIKA SYMBOL WERE ALLOWED 4 WIVES BY PARASHURAMA ..&nbsp;</span></b><br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\"><br />http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2013/06/kanchi-mutt-creation-of-white-invader.html</span><br />\n<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: blue;\">125- IS CAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL RIGHT WHEN HE SAYS \u2013 THE YOUNGER SEMITE KERALA NAMBOODIRI BROTHERS WITH SIX POINTED STAR SYMBOL COULD NOT MARRY AT ALL , AND THEY COULD ONLY HAVE SEX AND PROCREATE BY A PRACTICE KNOWN AS SAMBANDHAM..WHERE HE DOES NOT CARE FOR HIS OFFSPRING ( NAIRS ) AT ALL..<br /><br />126 - IS CAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL RIGHT WHEN HE SAYS \u2013 JEW ROTHSCHILD WHO RULED INDIA MADE BRAHMACHARYA ( SEMEN RETENTION ) A VIRTUE BY USING HIS FREEMASON STOOGES LIKE VIVEKANANDA AND GANDHI..THE IDEA WAS TO CONVERT ALL HINDU MUTT PONTIFFS TO ANAL SEX RECEIVING MEAN NATURED CRYPTO JEWS..<br /><br />127 - IS CAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL RIGHT WHEN HE SAYS \u2013 BRAHMACHARYA WAS ALLOWED ONLY IN THE FIRST ASHRAMA ( STUDENT STAGE TILL AGE 25 ) BEFORE MARRIAGE ( VANAPRASTA TILL AGE 50 ) TO PREVENT UNMARRIED FORNICATION..<br /><br />128 - IS CAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL RIGHT WHEN HE SAYS \u2013 BRAHMACHARYA IN SANATANA DHARMA HAS NOTHING TO WITH SEMEN RETENTION OR ABSTAINING FROM SEX ..RATHER BRAHMACHARYA IS ABOUT SELF RESTRAINT AND HARNESSING THE ENERGY OF OUR SENSES..<br /><br />129 - IS CAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL RIGHT WHEN HE SAYS \u2013 KAMA HAS NOTHING TO DO WITH LUST OR SEX.. KAMA PURUSHARTHA IS NOT LUST BUT DESIRABLE ACTION.. KAMASUTRA WAS A CULTURAL DOCUMENT AND HAD NO SEXUAL DEBAUCHERY IN IT..</span></b><br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2014/07/kamasutra-by-vatsayana-immoral-sexual.html</span><br />\n<br />\n<br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" style=\"margin-left: 36px; margin-top: 1em;\">\n<div class=\"comment-thread inline-thread\" id=\"c504096484603829518-rt\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; margin: 8px 0px; padding: 0.5em 1em;\">\n<ol class=\"thread-chrome thread-expanded\" id=\"c504096484603829518-ra\" style=\"list-style-type: none; padding: 0px;\">\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"c8857187050702542361\" style=\"border-bottom: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 16px 0px 0px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2019/04/repeated-blasphemy-against-hindu-gods.html?showComment=1554595790410#c3869650405109780026\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">April 7, 2019 at 5:39 AM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nALL RIGHT--<br />\n<br />\nTIME FOR NEW QUORA QUESTIONS UNDER \"IS CAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL RIGHT WHEN HE SAYS BLAH BLAH BLAH \".<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2019/04/repeated-blasphemy-against-hindu-gods.html<br /><br />https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2019/04/questions-from-capt-ajit-vadakayil.html</span><br />\n<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: blue;\">130- IS CAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL RIGHT WHEN HE SAYS \u2013 GERMAN PEPPER TRADER JEW ROTHSCHILD , THE OWNER OF SHIPPING COMPANY EAST INDIA COMPANY, CARRIED A SHIPLOAD OF BENE ISRAEL JEWS FROM KERALA AND DUMPED THEM OFF THE KONKAN COAST WHERE THEY WADED ASHORE AND CLIMED TO BE SHIP WRECKED TO PREVENT DEPORTATION..THESE WERE THE FIRST CHITPAVAN JEWS..<br /><br />131- IS CAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL RIGHT WHEN HE SAYS \u2013 OVER TIME CHITPAVAN JEWS PROCREATED WITH LOCALS AND WERE CONVERTED TO \u201cCHITPAVAN BRAHMINS \u201c.. OVER TIME THESE FAKE MEAN BRAHMINS WITH PALE EYES WERE CONVERTED TO HUGE LAND OWNERS, WARRIOR CHIEFS AND PESHWA RULERS BY JEW ROTHSCHILD..<br /><br />132- IS CAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL RIGHT WHEN HE SAYS \u2013 YOU CANNOT POINT OUT ONE SINGLE INSTANCE SINCE ANTIQUITY OF KERALA NAMBOODIRI BRAHMINS BEING RULERS OR WARRIOR CHIEFS.. HOWEVER THEY COULD BE KINGS ADVISORS ( SHUKRACHARYA ) OR EVEN KING MAKERS ( CHANAKYA ) WITHOUT WIELDING INORDINATE POWER..</span></b><br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\"><br />http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2014/08/chanakya-taxila-university-professor.html<br /><br />http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2011/09/why-kerala-does-not-celebrate-diwali-or.html</span><br />\n<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: blue;\">133- IS CAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL RIGHT WHEN HE SAYS \u2013 THIYYAS OF KERALA WERE RULERS AND KALARI WARRIORS BEFORE THE WHITE INVADER CAME TO INDIA .. THE ANCIENT DANAVA CIVILIZATION KINGS ( WHICH PRECEEDED THE VEDIC CIVILIZATION BY MILLINIUMS ) LIKE MAHABALI WERE THIYYAS .. THE CHERA KINGDOM KINGS LIKE CHERAMAN PERUMAL WERE THIYYAS..<br /><br />134- IS CAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL RIGHT WHEN HE SAYS \u2013 KERALA NAMBOODIRIS WERE THE SANSKRIT AND VEDA ORAL ROUTE KNOWING CREAM OF THE THIYYAS , WHO WERE MATH AND ASTRONOMY PROFESSORS OF THIS PLANETs OLDEST KODUNGALLUR UNIVERSITY \u2013 WHO WERE SENT ON DEPUTATION BY THIYYA KINGS ABROAD AND TO INDIAN UNIVERSITIES LIKE TAXILA/ SARADA/ NALANDA/ SARASWATI DHAR..</span></b><br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2017/05/land-of-punt-ophir-and-sheba-is-north.html</span><br />\n<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: blue;\">135- IS CAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL RIGHT WHEN HE SAYS \u2013 ROTHSCHILD CONVERTED RULERS THIYYAS TO COCONUT TREE CLIMBING TODDY TAPPING MONKEYS ..AND HEY PRESTO - CRYPTO JEW VARMAS WITH PALE EYES BECAME THE NEW KERALA RULING CLAN..<br /><br />136- IS CAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL RIGHT WHEN HE SAYS \u2013 MAHARS WERE RULING CLASS OF MAHARASHTRA , AS THE NAME ITSELF ALLUDES.. EMPEROR SHIVAJI WAS A MAHAR..<br /><br />137- IS CAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL RIGHT WHEN HE SAYS \u2013 ROTHSCHILD CONVERTED RUERS MAHARS TO SHIT HOUSE CLEANING SCAVENGERS .. AND HEY PRESTO\u2014CHITPAVAN JEWS \u2013 NAY -BRAHMINS WITH PALE EYES BECAME THE NEW PESHWA RULING CLAN ..<br /><br />138- IS CAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL RIGHT WHEN HE SAYS \u2013 JEW ROTHSCHILD WRESTED MOGHUL KINGDOMS AWAY BY USING PESHWA RULERS AND MAHAR WARRIORS ..THE WHITE INVADER DID NOT FIGHT ONE SINGLE BATTLE FIGHTING THE POWERFUL MUSLIM INVADER KINGDOWMS ..<br /><br />139- IS CAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL RIGHT WHEN HE SAYS \u2013 ROTHSCHILD PROVIDED THE MARATHA ARMY OF PESHWAS WITH LON RANGE GUNS AND LOGISTICS.. TILL THEY SNATCHED AWAY ALL MUSLIM KINGDOMS.. LATER THESE KINGDOMS WERE HANDED OVER TO ROTHSCHILD ON A GOLDEN PLATTER AND CHITPAVAN BRAHMIN PESHWAS WERE RETIRED FOREVER..<br /><br />139- IS CAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL RIGHT WHEN HE SAYS \u2013ROTHSCHILD WEAKENED THE MIGHTY MOGHUL EMPERORS BY CONVERTING THEM SURREPTITIOUSLY TO JEWS.. THE LAST 80% OF MOGHUL EMPERORS AFTER HUMAYUN WERE DECADENT JEWS PRETENDING TO BE MUSLIMS ..</span></b><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/03/fatawa-e-alamgiri-kosher-document-of.html</span><br />\n<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: blue;\">140- IS CAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL RIGHT WHEN HE SAYS \u2013 EVERY MAJOR MUSLIM KINGDOM IN 1947 WERE RULED BY JEWS PRETENDING TO BE MUSLIMS ..TIPU SULTAN WAS A JEW, NIZAM OF HYDERABAD WAS A JEW..ALMOST ALL MUSLIM LEADERS OF INDIAN NATIONAL CONGRESS WERE CRYPTO JEWS..JINNAH WAS A JEW ..</span></b><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2013/04/razakers-of-mim-operation-polo-to-annex.html</span><br />\n<br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" style=\"margin-left: 36px; margin-top: 1em;\">\n<div class=\"comment-thread inline-thread\" id=\"c3869650405109780026-rt\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; margin: 8px 0px; padding: 0.5em 1em;\">\n<ol class=\"thread-chrome thread-expanded\" id=\"c3869650405109780026-ra\" style=\"list-style-type: none; padding: 0px;\">\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"c4145427583296629038\" style=\"border-bottom: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 16px 0px 0px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. WAHABBI/ SALAFI FUNDS ARE JEWISH.</span></b><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2011/07/cracked-heels-and-prayer-marks-capt.html</span><br />\n<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: blue;\">142- IS CAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL RIGHT WHEN HE SAYS \u2013 ALMOST ALL MAJOR WARS AFTER THE BATTLE OF PLASSEY IN 1757 WERE ALL ON PAPER ONLY.. THE BATTLE OF KOREGAON WHICH IS BEING USED BY FOREIGN FORCES AND JNU NAXALS TO WEDGE AWAY DALITS EVER HAPPENED ..</span></b><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2011/07/back-swing-of-john-galt-capt-ajit.html</span><br />\n<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: blue;\">143- IS CAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL RIGHT WHEN HE SAYS \u2013 THE SEPOYs MUTINY OF 1857 WHERE ROTHCHILD STOPPED ALL PRETENSES OF BEING A PEPPER TRADER AND TOOK OVER AS RULER OF INDIA , WAS CREATED , CONTROLLED AND EXTINGUISHED BY JEW ROTHSCHILD ON HIS OWN TIME TABLE\u2026</span></b><br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\"><br />http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2011/02/murky-truths-of-sepoys-mutiny-1857.html</span><br />\n<br />\n<br />\nWHY DOES CAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL WRITE ALL THIS?<br />\n<br />\n<br />\nBECAUSE IF HE DOES NOT EXHUME THESE SHOCKING TRUTHS, IT WILL REMAIN BURIED TILL THE SUN GOES SUPERNOVA.. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2019/04/india-must-revert-to-organic.html?showComment=1554769637973#c6043198391169861581\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">April 9, 2019 at 5:57 AM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nALL RIGHT--<br />\n<br />\nTIME FOR NEW QUORA QUESTIONS UNDER \"IS CAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL RIGHT WHEN HE SAYS BLAH BLAH BLAH \".<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2019/04/repeated-blasphemy-against-hindu-gods_9.html<br /><br />https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2019/04/questions-from-capt-ajit-vadakayil.html</span><br />\n<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: blue;\">144- IS CAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL RIGHT WHEN HE SAYS \u2013 THIS PLANETs SECOND OLDEST MOSQUE IS THE CHERAMAN PERUMAL MOSQUE AT KODUNGALLUR OWNED BY THE CALICUT THIYYA KING CHERAMAN PERUMAL ..<br /><br />145 - IS CAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL RIGHT WHEN HE SAYS \u2013 KING CHERAMAN PERUMAL OWNED THE SHIVA TEMPLE KAABALISHWARA AT MECCA OASIS WHICH ALSO DOUBLED UP AS A SPICE FREE TRADE CUSTOMS OUTPOST ..<br /><br />146 - IS CAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL RIGHT WHEN HE SAYS \u2013 KAABA AT MECCA , THE HOLIEST PLACE OF THE MUSLIMS AND THIS PLANETs FIRST MOSQUE IS THE NAME OF LORD SHIVA AS GOD WITH THE MATTED LOCKS WHICH IS THE SOURCE OF THE GANGES..<br /><br />147 - IS CAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL RIGHT WHEN HE SAYS \u2013 KAABALA ( KABBALAH ) OF JUDAISM IS JUST A CORRUPTION OF KAABA + ISHAWARA ( KAABALISHAWARA ) ROOTED IN EIN SOF, THE ENDLESS ONE..<br /><br />148 - IS CAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL RIGHT WHEN HE SAYS \u2013 KING CHERAMAN PERUMAL RUSHED TO MECCA ON BEING SUMMONED BY EMERGENCY PIGEON MESSAGE BY THE KERALA NAMBOODIRI ARYAN PRIEST OF THE SHIVA TEMPLE AT MECCA OASIS , BY SHIP TO SALALAH ( PORT AT DHOFAR, HIS OWN KINGDOM ) AND THEN BY CARAVAN ROUTE ..<br /><br />149 - IS CAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL RIGHT WHEN HE SAYS \u2013 DURING A FLOOD AT MECCA , THE SHIVA TEMPLE SHIVA LINGAM WAS SUBMERGED UNDER FIVE FEET OF WATER AND THE HINDU SON ( MOHAMMAD ) OF THE YOUNGER SEMITE NAMBOODIRI BROTHER IN CHARGE OF CUSTOMS/ TRADE , UPROOTED THE SHIVA LINGAM (BLASPHEMY ) AND FIXED IT ON THE SE CORNER OF THE TEMPLE STRUCTURE FIVE FEET ABOVE THE GROUND..<br /><br />150 - IS CAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL RIGHT WHEN HE SAYS \u2013 IS SANATANA DHARMA WE BUILD A TEMPLE OVER A SPOT WHERE A SHIVA LINGAM ( BLACK METEORITE DIVINE PHALLUS STONE WHICH PROVIDES THE DNA SEED ) IS FOUND, THE STONE CANNOT BE LIFTED OFF THE GROUND AND FIXED AT AN ALTERNATE SPOT..<br /><br />151 - IS CAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL RIGHT WHEN HE SAYS \u2013 KING CHERAMAN PERUMAL REPORTEDLY CONVERTED TO ISLAM AFTER MEETING MOHAMMAD , AND DECREED THAT HIS SHIVA TEMPLE AT KODUNGALLUR HIS CULTURAL CENTRE BE CONVERTED TO A MOSQUE BY PIGEON MESSAGE ..<br /><br />152 - IS CAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL RIGHT WHEN HE SAYS \u2013 KING CHERAMAN PERUMAL DIED ( REPORTEDLY WAS KILLED ) ON HIS WAY BACK TO CALICUT , INDIA AND HIS DEAD BODY IS BURIED AT A ISLAMIC DARGAH AT SALALAH OMAN MARKED AS THIYYAJUDDIN , KING OF HINDU THIYYA CLAN.<br /><br />153 - IS CAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL RIGHT WHEN HE SAYS \u2013 THIS PLANETs FIRST PRISTINE KORAN WAS COMPILED AT KODUNGALLUR CHERAMAN PERUMAL MOSQUE A YEAR AFTER THE DEATH OF MOHAMMAD BY SEMITE YOUNGER BROTHERS OF NAMBOODIRIS UNDER THE CHARGE OF MOHAMMADs FRIEND AND DISCIPLE HINDU CONVERT MALIK BIN DINAR \u2026</span></b><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2009/07/vedic-practises-in-mecca-ajit-vadakayil.html</span><br />\n<br />\nCAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL<br />\n..</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replybox-single\" id=\"c6043198391169861581-ce\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; margin-top: 5px;\">\n</div>\n</li>\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"c7822148748057008874\" style=\"border-bottom: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 0.25em 0px 0px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n<img alt=\"\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-QSnd-Z8F7Kc/XFtPudWdwlI/AAAAAAABfq4/vxrkFOO7Iu8Mf6-OaPgw6FPpRDSmMgLdgCK4BGAYYCw/s35/capt%25252BajitC%25252Bvadakayil.JPG\" style=\"border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); max-width: 36px;\" /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. IS CAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL RIGHT WHEN HE SAYS \u2013 SIMPLEX CODE PRIME NUMBER 19 WAS ENMESHED INTO KORAN VERSES BY HINDU SAGES FROM KOUNGALLUR UNIVERSITY TO PREVENT FUDGING LATER BY JEWISH / CHRISTIAN ENEMIES OF ISLAM.. THESE UNGRATEFUL MUSLIMS NOW CALL HINDUS SAVAGES..<br /><br /><br />158 - IS CAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL RIGHT WHEN HE SAYS \u2013 THE VEDA SRUTI VERSES IN SANSKRIT HAD ITS OWN DIVINE MATH MULTIPLEX VERIFIERS .. VEDIC SRUTIS HAVE GOLDEN MEAN (1.618 ) , FIBONACCI SERIES , PASCALS TRIANGLE, LUCAS NUMBERS , SRI YANTRA ( GEOMETRY OF OM ), ULAM SPIRAL, PRIME NUMBER VERIFIER , ISOTOPE MAGIC EMBEDDED IN IT ..</span></b><br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\"><br />http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2019/02/sanatana-dharma-hinduism-exhumed-and.html</span><br />\n<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: blue;\">159- IS CAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL RIGHT WHEN HE SAYS \u2013 THE ORIGINAL KORAN STILL HAND MADE IN CHERAMAN PERUMAL MOSQUE LIES HIDDEN IN A FOXHOLE UNDER TIMBUCTOO DESERT SANDS SAFE FROM FRENCH JEW ROTHSCHILDs MERCENERIES WHO TRIED TO DESTROY THE BOOK SEVERAL TIMES BY BURNING DOWN THE LIBRARY AT MALI..</span></b><br />\n<br />\nLIES WONT WORK.. A BROWN HINDU BLOGGER IS IN TOWN..<br />\n<br />\nI WILL NOT REVEAL THE FURTHER DETAILS OF&nbsp;<b><span style=\"color: red;\">CODE 19&nbsp;</span></b>ENMESHED IN KORAN\u2014I WILL DO IT ONLY WHEN MY REVELATIONS REACH 98 %..<br />\n<br />\nIT SO HAPPENS THAT YOU TEACH SOME UNGRATEFUL BASTARD \u2013 AND LATER HE STARTS TEACHING YOU , WHAT HE LEARNT FROM YOU..<br />\n<br />\nCapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" style=\"margin-left: 36px; margin-top: 1em;\">\n<div class=\"comment-thread inline-thread\" id=\"c7822148748057008874-rt\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; margin: 8px 0px; padding: 0.5em 1em;\">\n<ol class=\"thread-chrome thread-expanded\" id=\"c7822148748057008874-ra\" style=\"list-style-type: none; padding: 0px;\">\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"c806970617106005461\" style=\"border-bottom: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 16px 0px 0px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. RADHA THE MISTRESS OF KRISHNA NEVER EXISTED...<br />\n<br />\nCAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL HAS SEEN MOST OF THE AKSHARDHAM TEMPLES IN INDIA AND ABROAD --WHICH YOU PM MODI , HAVE NOT !<br />\n<br />\nSANATANA DHARMA DOES NOT ALLOW OPULENCE IN A TEMPLE..<br />\n<br />\nSWAMINARAYAN TEMPLES OR AKSHARDHAM TEMPLES ARE PART OF THE FAKE BHAKTI MOVEMENT CREATED BY JEW ROTHSCHILD..<br />\n<br />\nSANATANA DHARMA ALLOWS ONLY SHRADDHA, NEVER BHAKTI..<br />\n<br />\nWE DO NOT ALLOW ROTHSCHILDs GHANSHAM PANDE TO STAND ON THE SAME PEDESTAL AS LORD KRISHNA ..<br />\n<br />\nIN ANTWERP SWAMINNARAYAN TEMPLES ARE THE BASE OF CRYPTO JEWS INDIAN DIAMOND TRADERS --ESPECIALLY GANDHIs CLAN OF KATHIWARI JAIN JEWS..EXAMPLE IS JEW NIRAV MODI ..<br />\n<br />\nPALANPURI JAINS AND RAJASTHANI MARWARIS IN THE DIAMOND BUSINESS USE THESE TEMPLES TO DO DO QUIET BUSINESS..<br />\n<br />\nDUBAI LIKE ANTWERP IS NOW A DIAMOND CENTRE ..TO MAKE IT EASY FOR CROOKS LIKE JEW NIRAV MODI..<br />\n<br />\nJew Rothschild used this fellow Ghanshyam Pande to do propaganda for his COOKED up CHITPAVAN BRAHMIN NAY JEW gods ( Vittala/ Vithoba / Panduranga ) of his town Pandharpur..<br />\n<br />\nSwaminarayan was propped up by JEW Rothschild and Rothschild\u2019s Opium drug running Parsi / Rajasthani crypto Jew Marwari agents..<br />\n<br />\nRothschild\u2019s media gave bull that Swaminarayan knew the 4 Vedas and 108 Upanishads by the age of seven...<br />\n<br />\nThe SHIKSHAPATRI is a religious text consisting of two hundred and twelve verses, written in Sanskrit by Lord Swaminarayan ( sic ) in 1826 AD\u2014 but hey, Ghansham Pande never knew Sanskrit...<br />\n<br />\nRothschild\u2019s agent SIR John Malcolm ( Governor of Bombay ) met Swaminarayan in Feb, 1830 and Rothschild\u2019s media did great propaganda that this book SHIKSHAPATRI was presented to him ...<br />\n<br />\nThey did propaganda that this book is a prized item at the Bodleian Library of the University of Oxford. This book was translated by Rothschild into almost all major languages of this planet including Hebrew ...<br />\n<br />\nJEW Rothschild built the nine mandirs in Gujarat ( land donated ) : Ahmedabad, Mooli, Bhuj, Vadtal, Jetalpur, Dholera, Dholka, Junagadh and Gadhada...<br />\n<br />\nSwaminarayan ( Ghansham Pande ) was cultivated by Rothschild \u2014to create fissures in Hinduism...<br />\n<br />\nON THE HOUR OF MODI TAKING THE PM CHAIR , HE PRAYED TO GHANSHYAM PANDEs CHARAN KAMAL..</div>\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<b><span style=\"color: blue;\">CAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL ASKS MODI-- DO YOU WANT THE KING OF UAE ( AND THE UAE PRESS ) TO BE INFORMED THAT THE SWAMINARAYAN TEMPLE IS NOT A HINDU TEMPLE--BEFORE YOU REACH UAE FOR RECEIVING THE FAALTHU AWARD ??</span></b></div>\n<br />\nYOUR CALL !<br />\n<br />\nMODI IS LIKE THE SCHOOL BOY WHO POINTS OUT TO A GLITZY BOLLYWOOD ACTRESS ON PARENTS DAY AND TELLS HIS FRIENDS \"THAT IS MY MOTHER \" AND REVELS IN THE WOW WAAAAAH WAAAAAAH !<br />\n<br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n.</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" style=\"margin-left: 36px; margin-top: 1em;\">\n<div class=\"comment-thread inline-thread\" id=\"c6582998733167319364-rt\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; margin: 8px 0px; padding: 0.5em 1em;\">\n<ol class=\"thread-chrome thread-expanded\" id=\"c6582998733167319364-ra\" style=\"list-style-type: none; padding: 0px;\">\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"c816384584624693027\" style=\"border-bottom: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 16px 0px 0px;\"><div class=\"comment-block\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. TODAY WE ARE NO 3 IN GDP\u2014 BOTH NOMINAL AND PPP .. font-size: 16px;\"><b>TOE RINGS</b></span> ARE BASED ON AYURVEDA MARMA POINTS..<br />\n<br />\nIn Genesis 24:22, Abraham secures Rebekah (daughter of Bethuel, the son that Milkah bore to Nahor.) as a wife for his son Isaac \u2013 Rebekah was a Hindu and Abraham gave her a <span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><b>nose ring</b></span> (SHANF ) as a wedding present.<br />\n<br />\nA nose ring is NOT a fashion statement in Hinduism.<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2012/07/brahma-and-sarawati-abraham-and-sara.html</span><br />\nIn Sanatana Dharma Parvati, Saraswati and Lakshmi are always depicted with Mukkuthi ( nose stud )<br />\n<br />\nIn Hinduism a girl\u2019s nose is pierced (at PHANA MARMA where the path of pingala nadi goes up on the way to the Ajna Chakra ).once she is \u201cof marriageable age\u201d and marks her as ready for a husband -- after her FIRST MENSES.<br />\n<br />\nCertain severe gynecological complaints could be cured by cauterizing the appropriate parts of the nose.<br />\n<br />\nHot temper in a girl and menses problems are an indicator that nose needs piercing in a teenaged girl , and was always done by a Ayurveda doctor who knew the marma.</div>\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\">In South India they pierce the right nostril ( correct MARMA spot to eliminate nagging ) , while in North India they wrongly pierce the left nostril .</span></div>\n<br />\nThis practice of DEVADASIS piercing the opposite left side was caused by the white invader.<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2014/02/devadasi-system-immoral-lie-of-temple.ht</span><br />\n<br />\nPingala Nadi is connected to the right nostril ( for right handers )<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: blue;\">Pingala nadi is associated with masculine energy- feeling hot, quick temper and easily angered, itching body, dry skin and throat, excessive appetite, excessive sexual energy..</span><br />\n<br />\nNose piercing makes the female\u2019s menstrual problems lesser. You know how much old women suffer at the PMS stage.<br />\n<br />\nThe nasal passages of women swell, and occasionally bleed, during menstruation.<br />\n<br />\nNose piercing makes the woman more fertile as per 6200 year old Ayurveda ( Charaka Samhita ) and reduces water retention( Phana Marma ).<br />\n<br />\nI DARE ANY HYPNOTIST TO MESMERIZE A WOMAN WHO WEARS A DIAMOND MUKKUTHI ( NOSE RING )<br />\n<br />\nWE ASK NSA CHIEF AJIT DOVAL, HOME MINISTER RAJNATH SINGH AND <span style=\"color: red;\"><b>MUSLIM LOVER SUSHMA SWARAJ </b></span>( MINISTER OF EXTERNAL AFFAIRS ) TO TAKE NOTE.. QUORA IS RABIDLY ANTI-HINDU AND ANTI-INDIA..<br />\n<br />\nWE ASK ANURAG THAKUR AND THE PARLIAMENTARY COMMITEE TO SUMMON QUORA CHIEF ANGELO D ADAMS.. Europe regularly fines Google for monopoly.<br />\n<br />\nIf Trump starts his own social media website, this will be the permanent death of Deep State Social Media and a genuine place where freedom of speech is guaranteed. This will also help him win the 2020 elections.<br />\n<br />\nBest regards<br />\n<br />\n<br /></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" style=\"margin-left: 36px; margin-top: 1em;\">\n<div class=\"comment-thread inline-thread\" id=\"c7280356535083978289-rt\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; margin: 8px 0px; padding: 0.5em 1em;\">\n<ol class=\"thread-chrome thread-expanded\" id=\"c7280356535083978289-ra\" style=\"list-style-type: none; padding: 0px;\">\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"c3267513939611935904\" style=\"border-bottom: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 16px 0px 0px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; font-size: 16px; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n<img alt=\"\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-QSnd-Z8F7Kc/XFtPudWdwlI/AAAAAAABfq4/vxrkFOO7Iu8Mf6-OaPgw6FPpRDSmMgLdgCK4BGAYYCw/s35/capt%25252BajitC%25252Bvadakayil.JPG\" style=\"border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); max-width: 36px;\" /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" style=\"font-size: 16px; margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt.
