Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2019/03/questions-from-capt-ajit-vadakayil.html?showComment=1553855580308#c8987937231440286340\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">March 29, 2019 at 4:03 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">SOME ONE ASKED \u2013CAN YOU GIVE ONE EXAMPLE OF \u201c </span><b style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px;\"><span style=\"color: red;\">MOST WERE HIGHLY TECHNICAL WHERE I PREDICTED DISASTERS .. MY DETRACTOR BOSSES CALLED MY TONGUE \"BLACK\".</span></b><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">.\u201d</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">February 21, 2017 at 11:00 AM</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">DIGRESSION:</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">SUBJECT: LOCKING STABLE DOORS AFTER THE HORSES HAVE BOLTED ??</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">I was a very successful Captain at sea as I did something which nobody did or even dreamt of at sea .</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">I did PREDICTIVE MAINTENANCE at sea\u2014an unknown concept.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">When Capt Ajit Vadakayil predicts , you know how effective it can be.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">I treated every machinery like a human body-- which is the most complicated machine.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: 16px;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2010/12/predictive-maintenance-on-chemical.html</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">I ignored the company\u2019s peabrained PMS ( Planned maintenance programme ) . This made my bosses very unhappy. But then I have always worked for my ship- never to keep my bosses happy. And my bosses knew that I run a good ship.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: 16px;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/07/draw-diagram-marine-two-stroke-main.html</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">I checked the emissions from the main air compressor in the engine room and found it had Lub Oil carryover. Then I monitored the compressor for a few days and found it was running 18 hours a day struggling to charge air bottles , when a healthy compressor must work less than 3 hours ..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">I had a site inspection of the main air compressors in the Engine room and found it was below the water level during loaded passage and that it was next to the shipside with the HP ( high pressure ) part facing the hull.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">I sent an email to the company\u2014in New York\u2014all pea brained white men in the office. .</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">I demanded a 24 HOUR BLACKOUT AT THE BERTH IN BROWNSVILLE USA after cargo discharge .</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">The company threw up .</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">After all this demand was coming from a DECK BOY not the Chief Engineer.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">I told them \u2013 \u201cListen, I am getting off at Brownsville USA with my family as my contract is over . I am doing this for the next captain whose will NOT have a technical brain\u201d</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">The company replied that one day of idling after cargo discharge ( veg oils ) is unimaginable\u2014there will be much of financial loss.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Then I held a SAFETY COMMITTEE MEETING the same day</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">I explained the scenario to all the engineers . None of them had the cerebral wherewithal to understand why I wanted INSTANT REPAIRS</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">I made the MINUTES OF THE MEETING ( process verbal ) \u2013got it signed by all officers and crew SAFETY REPS .</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">The last line at the bottom was from Captain\u2014</span><br />\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">NEVER LOCK THE STABLE DOORS AFTER THE HORSES HAVE BOLTED !</span></span></b><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">This report was FAXED.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">All in the company read this\u2014even the women.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">They all knew me well as a Captain par excellence . The PRESIDENT who knew me ( my fan ) got involved .</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">They sort of kept it on the back burner as the white skinned Engineer Technical bosses did not agree ( more out of jealousy ).</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">This is despite me warning\u2014if what I fear happens , we will not have time to launch our life boats. The engine room will lose its reserve buoyancy and the ship will sink in a jiffy with all souls</span></div>\n<div style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\">Three days later I was woken up at 3 PM ( after noon nap ) by a mighty explosion \u2013the whole ship rocked.</span></div>\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\"><br /></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">I ran down to the engine room telephoning Chief Engineer who was also sleeping to follow me to the starboard side at the main air compressor.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">The heavy compressor block has shattered and huge heavy pieces of steel projectiles destroyed everything in its path.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">LUCKILY THE HP SIDE FACING THE HULL WAS INTACT AS THE COMPRESSOR EXPLODED FROM THE LP SIDE.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">A FINE SPRAY OF LUB OIL HAS A LOWER IGNITION POINT THAT GASOLENE\u2014HARDLY ANYBODY KNOWS THIS</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Within two minutes the Chief Engineer arrived at the spot.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">CONTINUED TO 2--</span><br />\n<br /></div>\n</li>\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"c347909003908982121\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; border-bottom: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 16px; font-size: 16px; margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2019/03/questions-from-capt-ajit-vadakayil.html?showComment=1553855614896#c347909003908982121\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">March 29, 2019 at 4:03 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil February 21, 2017 at 11:02 AM</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">CONTINUED FROM 1-</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">I told him I WANT TO INSPECT THE INTER COOLER PRESSURE RELIEF TEFLON ALUMINIUM BURSTING DISC</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Then I went up to my cabin as send a terse message to the company in New York --THE HORSES HAVE BOLTED \u2013and came down</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">The pressure relief disc had ruptured . As I had predicted the spiral coil has got a hole, as black carbon absorbs and emits heat.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Despite this lessened pressure the damage caused by flying steel projectiles inboard was unimaginable\u2014they had smashed up heavy pipelines</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">If you have a air gun, you put a lead pellet , pump it up and then shoot \u2014how far does it go. Well this compressor produced 30 times that pressure</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Then I get a call from the radio officer SIR ALL AT NEWYORK WANT TO HEAR YOUR VOICE URGENTLY \u2013 I HAVE TOLD THEM CAPTAIN IS IN THE ENGINE ROOM AFTER A MIGHTY EXPLOSION</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">I went up and told them NO WE ARE NOT IN THE LIFEBOATS \u2014talk to you later . I let them suffer. They all knew that their ASSES ARE ON THE LINE</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">To cut a long story short \u2013the ship was granted a 24 hour stay at an idle berth ( with blackout ) at Brownsville USA.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">I signed off with my wife and two sons , went to New York for de-briefing and had a two day holiday at New York .</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">We went up the World Trade Centre \u2013first time for my younger son\u2014but my wife and elder son had been up several times before.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Repairs?</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">All 5 valves on the pipelines connecting the two huge main air compressor bottles were renewed . All were leaking.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">The compressors were not cutting off ( to take rest ) as both air bottles were running down together and the compressors were struggling to charge them back to the highest pressure ( cut in / cutout limits )</span></div>\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"color: purple; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: large;\"><br /></span></div>\n<span style=\"color: purple; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: large;\"></span><br />\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"color: purple; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: large;\">So my compressors were like 45 years old , though the ship was just nine years old.</span></div>\n<span style=\"color: purple; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: large;\">\n</span>\n<span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: 16px;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/10/naive-sailor-main-air-compressors-capt.html</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">WHEN I SAID , I WAS 100% COMPETENT AT SEA \u2013 EVEN MY MOST VICIOUS DETRACTORS DARE NOT DISAGREE.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">WHEN SUCH A THING HAPPENS YOU BECOME A LIVING LEGEND</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">BECAUSE NO SHIP CAPTAIN KNOWS A SHIT ABOUT ENGINEERING</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">ALL THIS WOULD HAVE BEEN PART OF MY BOOK \u201cGAMES CAPTAIN PLAYED \u201c .. IT WOULD HAVE BEEN TOO EXPLOSIVE ..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">THIS INCIDENT WHICH WOULD WOW EVERY ENGINEER -- WOULD HAVE NOT BEEN IN THE TOP HUNDRED.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2019/03/holi-2019-capt-ajit-vadakayil.html?showComment=1553915458895#c6920176576817398017\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">March 30, 2019 at 8:40 AM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nI WANT MY READERS TO BE AWARE OF A TOOL OF THE KOSHER DEEP STATE , <span style=\"color: blue;\"><b>WIKIPEDIA , WHICH IS RABIDLY ANTI-HINDU AND ANTI-INDIA.</b></span>. WIKIPEDIA IS GUILTY OF BLASPHEMY MOST FOUL AGAINST HINDUISM..<br />\n<br />\nEXAMPLE NO 1 --<br />\n<br />\nASHWAMEDHA YAGNA IS NOT A BLOOD SACRIFICE , BUT A VOTE OF CONFIDENCE..<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2014/09/ashwamedha-yagam-bloodless-sacrifice.html</span><br />\n<br />\nCHECK OUT WHAT WIKIPEDIA WROTE--<br />\n<br />\nQUOTE: The queens walk around the dead horse reciting mantras. The chief queen then has to mimic copulation with the dead horse, while the other queens ritually utter obscenities ..The human sacrifice, the Purushamedha, followed a similar format, but included a man with the animals to be sacrificed.Once he had been killed, the queen lay with his corpse.The mock bestiality ( sexual intercourse with animals ) and necrophilia ( sexual attraction to dead animals ) involved in the ritual caused considerable consternation among the scholars first editing the Yajurveda. Griffith (1899) omits verses VSM 23.20\u201331 (the ritual obscenities), protesting that they are \"not reproducible even in the semi-obscurity of a learned European language\" UNQUOTE<br />\n<br />\nSO WE HINDU ARE SAVAGES, RIGHT?<br />\n<br />\nEXAMPLE NO 2 --<br />\n<br />\nCONSTRUCTION OF SHIVAs DAMARU..<br />\n<br />\nQUOTE: Fashioned out of a human cranium, the drum is comprised of two skulls: a boy of sixteen and a girl of twelve . Monkey skins are stretched tightly over the skulls.<br />\nOne side is smeared with sperm, and the other side is decorated with a lotus blossom coated with a twelve year old girl's menstrual blood.UNQUOTE<br />\n<br />\nMIND YOU SHIVA IS A COSMIC ALLEGORY.. DAMARU IS SACRED FOR HINDUS AS SHIVA BEAT IN THE THE SANSKRIT ALPHABETS WITH HIS DAMARU..<br />\n<br />\nEXAMPLE NO 3---<br />\n<br />\nEFFEMINATE HOMOSEXUAL DEVDUTT PATTANAIK IS TOUTED BY WIKIPEDIA AS THE NO 1 EXPERT ON SANATANA DHARMA , THOUGH HE DOES NOT KNOW THE BASICS .. HE IS QUOTES OFTEN BY WIKIPEDIA..<br />\n<br />\nCHECK OUT WHAT DEVDUTT PATTANAIK ALLOWED IN CAHOOTS WITH SUNDAY MID DAY NEWS PAPER..IT IS A FOUL COMMENT WHICH WAS DELIBERATELY OKAYED AND PUBLISHED ..<br />\n<br />\nHERE SHIVA HAD ANAL SEX WITH BULL NANDI AND WHEN THE TURN OF NANDI CAME TO HAVE ANAL SEX WITH SHIVA , HE RAN AND HID INSIDE THE SANCTUM..AND SINCE THE DOORWAY WAS TOO SMALL FOR NANDI , THE BULL STILL WAITS OUTSIDE \" COME OUT YOU BASTARD I WILL SHOW YOU \"..<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2014/01/nandi-bull-vahana-and-gatekeeper-of.html</span><br />\nWE HINDUS HAVE BEEN TOO TOLERANT..<br />\n<br />\nI WANT YOU TO WARN WIKIPEDIA CEO AND ANAL SEX LOVER DEVDUTT PATTANAIK NOT TO ENGAGE IN BLASPHEMY..<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2019/03/questions-from-capt-ajit-vadakayil.html</span><br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" style=\"margin-left: 36px; margin-top: 1em;\">\n<div class=\"comment-thread inline-thread\" id=\"c6920176576817398017-rt\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; margin: 8px 0px; padding: 0.5em 1em;\">\n<ol class=\"thread-chrome thread-expanded\" id=\"c6920176576817398017-ra\" style=\"list-style-type: none; padding: 0px;\">\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"c410113588488442095\" style=\"border-bottom: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 16px 0px 0px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. I KNOW AS I HAVE CARRIED STOLEN VENEZEULAN OIL ON SHIPS I COMMANDED FROM ST CROIX, BONAIRE, CURACAO ETC ..<br />\n<br />\nCHAVEZ CHANGED ALL THAT..HE NATIONALISED OIL.. VENEZUELA HAS THIS PLANETs NO 1 PROVEN RESERVES OF OIL..<br />\n<br />\nThe sale of crude petroleum accounts for 96 % of international trade, but employs only 0.9 % of the workforce..<br />\n<br />\nIn 1994, JEW Luis Giusti, a former Shell executive, was appointed president of PDVSA, a post he held until 1999.<br />\n<br />\nDuring his five year stint, he signed major contracts with KOSHER OIL COMPANIES-- Exxon Mobil, ConocoPhillips, Chevron, Total, BP, Statoil and other transnational corporations, with extremely favorable conditions for the international companies, including royalties of only 1%, a minority stake for PDVSA, very little income tax and a commitment to arbitrate disputes before KOSHER panels in New York.<br />\n<br />\nIn 2000, Giusti joined the Shell board of directors \u2013 perhaps a reward for his loyal service in leading the so-called \u201cGeneration of Shell\u201d who protected the interests of transnational KOSHER energy companies, to the detriment of Venezuelan sovereignty.<br />\n<br />\nWith this kind of neoliberal give-away as background, in 1992, a group of young nationalist idealists attempted to overthrow the widely unpopular government of President JEW Carlos Andreas Perez.<br />\n<br />\nParatrooper Commander Hugo Chavez, part of a powerful nationalist tendency within the armed forces, led the rebellion. He was sentenced to prison, then pardoned in 1994 by Perez\u2019s successor, JEW Rafael Caldera. Chavez ran for president in 1998, at a time when nearly 83 % of the population lived in poverty-- when the people are supposed to live like the Kuwaitis..<br />\n<br />\nHe won the election in a landslide and immediately declared the Bolivarian revolution (Simon Bolivar led the 19th century independence movements in Venezuela, Bolivia, Columbia, Ecuador, Peru and Panama, winning liberation from Spanish control).<br />\nChavez wasted no time in promulgating a new constitution that formed the basis of popular socialist-type reforms-- which did not allow JEWS to steal oil..<br />\n<br />\nIn 2001, the Chavez administration passed a new hydrocarbon law mandating majority State control of all future contracts, plus higher royalties. Wealthy JEW elites living on the east side of Caracas, in coordination with Rothschilds media, immediately launched a campaign to discredit Chavez.<br />\n<br />\nIn 2002, the elite alliance mounted a coup in coordination with a small sector of the military leadership bribed by JEWS.<br />\n<br />\n<br />\nCONTINUED TO 2-</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" style=\"margin-left: 36px; margin-top: 1em;\">\n<div class=\"comment-thread inline-thread\" id=\"c6307909899585361609-rt\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; margin: 8px 0px; padding: 0.5em 1em;\">\n<ol class=\"thread-chrome thread-expanded\" id=\"c6307909899585361609-ra\" style=\"list-style-type: none; padding: 0px;\">\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"c3845928240823075012\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 16px 0px 8px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n<img alt=\"\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-QSnd-Z8F7Kc/XFtPudWdwlI/AAAAAAABfq4/vxrkFOO7Iu8Mf6-OaPgw6FPpRDSmMgLdgCK4BGAYYCw/s35/capt%25252BajitC%25252Bvadakayil.JPG\" style=\"border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); max-width: 36px;\" /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2019/03/holi-2019-capt-ajit-vadakayil.html?showComment=1553956813074#c3845928240823075012\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">March 30, 2019 at 8:10 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nCONTINUED FROM 1--<br />\n<br />\nCoup leaders kidnapped President Chavez and suspended the National Assembly, but the coup lasted only 48 hours. A million people from popular barrios in Caracas and other cities surrounded the national palace, forcing the coup leaders to hastily abandon the country-- KOSHER LUNGI UTHAKKE BHAGA !<br />\n<br />\nBribed ( by JEWS ) PDVSA officials played a leading role in the next significant attack on Chavez \u2013 a three-month work stoppage that nearly shut down the oil industry beginning in December 2002.<br />\n<br />\nThis was a battle over control of petroleum, with PDVSA executives aligned with international oil companies seeking to maximize production, while the State promoted maximization of income for social programs<br />\n<br />\nThe Confederation of Venezuelan Workers (CTV) led by its president, Carlos Ortega ( under kosher payroll ) , was key to the work stoppage.<br />\n<br />\nOf 35,000 permanent PDVSA employees affiliated with the union, half walked off the job, mostly managers and highly trained specialists, forcing a dramatic decrease in oil production and economic losses of some 11 billion USD billion.<br />\n<br />\nThe CTV was a historically corrupt, thoroughly undemocratic JEW controlled union allied with company executives in JEW payroll.<br />\n<br />\nIn 2004, the opposition mounted a recall election against Chavez. He won handily with nearly 60% of the vote.<br />\n<br />\nWith renewed political clout, the Chavez administration increased petroleum royalties from 1% to 16.6%. In 2005 elections for the National Assembly, opposition candidates boycotted rather than suffering an embarrassing defeat.<br />\n<br />\nChavez supporters won an overwhelming majority, giving Chavez the political power to formally declare a national socialist project focused on literacy, health care, and jobs, and an international fight against KOSHER neoliberalism, particularly in Latin America.<br />\n<br />\nIn 2006, Venezuela\u2019s oil minister, Rafael Ramirez, ordered pre-existing partnerships with foreign companies to comply with the 2001 law, including a minimum 51% Venezuelan ownership and higher royalties.<br />\n<br />\nTwenty six oil companies quickly negotiated accords that included compensation, but Exxon Mobil and ConocoPhillips led by the KOSHER DEEP STATE took their cases to international KANGAROO COURT arbitration. They demanded cash compensation according to market value, while Venezuela offered compensation based on book value.<br />\n<br />\nChavez utilized oil wealth to lift millions of Venezuelans out of poverty and launch popular education, health care and housing programs. By 2015, Venezuela boasted the most equitable distribution of wealth in Latin America.. Chavez increased the education budget dramatically..<br />\n<br />\nIn 2011 Chavez was diagnosed with cancer. Despite his weakened condition, he campaigned vigorously for the presidency in 2012 and won re-election in October with 55% of the vote in a six candidate race.<br />\n<br />\nChavez passed away in March 2013. During his last public speech, he called on the people of Venezuela to elect Nicolas Maduro, a former bus driver who served as his trusted vice president, as the next president. Maduro won the April presidential election that same year, beating business candidate JEW Henrique Capriles .<br />\n<br />\nJEW Obama armtisted the JEW Al Saud King to keep oil prices low to damage the economies of Russia, Iran and, particularly, Venezuela. In exchange, the US would support Saudi interests in Syria.<br />\n<br />\nMaduro lacked the charisma of Chavez, and with declining petroleum income, the Obama administration saw an opening to regain control of Venezuelan oil. The Saudis cooperated by maintaining high levels of production..<br />\n<br />\nObama announced the first sanctions regime in 2015, declaring Venezuela a \u201cthreat to national security\u201d and targeting a small number of patriotic Venezuelan officials who could nobe bribed . Sanctions increased dramatically under the Trump administration.<br />\n<br />\nCONTINUED TO 3-</div>\n</div>\n</li>\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"c3652978829032127055\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 0.25em 0px 8px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n<img alt=\"\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-QSnd-Z8F7Kc/XFtPudWdwlI/AAAAAAABfq4/vxrkFOO7Iu8Mf6-OaPgw6FPpRDSmMgLdgCK4BGAYYCw/s35/capt%25252BajitC%25252Bvadakayil.JPG\" style=\"border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); max-width: 36px;\" /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. The actions froze 7.2 billion USD of Venezuelan assets in the US, including all income from PDVSA\u2019s US subsidiary Citgo, which operates three refineries in Texas.<br />\n<br />\nOstensibly the funds are held for future use by self-appointed \u201cpresident\u201d JEW Guaido..<br />\n<br />\nUS sanctions also block international assets, including $1.2 billion in Venezuelan gold frozen in the Bank of England.<br />\n<br />\nWith the US as Venezuela\u2019s principle oil customer, the embargo is expected to cost $11 billion during 2019 in lost exports, though the Maduro administration is quickly re-routing most of those exports to India ( with Modi shitting green peas in his KOSHER langot ) , China and Russia..<br />\n<br />\nSanctions have turned the crisis into a humanitarian catastrophe\u2026<br />\n<br />\nSTARVING PEOPLE ( SMALL BABIES INCLUDED ) IS A WAR CRIME..<br />\n<br />\nCAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL WILL SOON DECIDE IF DONALD TRUMP MUST BE ADDED TO THE INTERNATIONAL DATABASE OF WAR CRIMINALS.. IN 14 YEARS INDIA WILL BE THIS PLANETs NO 1 SUPERPOWER.<br />\n<br />\nThe current battle for control of Venezuela is a battle for oil (led by the US and Venezuelan JEW elites), versus national sovereignty and the right to experiment with a more equitable socialist system that distributes petroleum wealth to the masses.<br />\n<br />\nCentral to this struggle is the propaganda war, waged in the US via Rothschild monopolised mainstream media.And central to their argument is a LYING claim that Maduro is an illegitimate dictator. All this when ExPresident Jimmy Carter applauded Venezuela\u2019s electoral system, including use of electronic voting machines, as exemplary in the world..<br />\n<br />\nThe current socialist President, Nicolas Maduro, won the 2018 presidential election with 68% of the ballots, or 5.8 million votes. Opposition candidate Henri Falcon came in second with 1.8 million votes. Just under half the country\u2019s eligible voters participated in the election, giving Maduro active support from about 30% of the population.<br />\n<br />\nSince the opposition could not win the election, JEW Juan Guaido swore himself in as president on January 23, 2019. Less than 16% of the Venezuelan population knew JEW Guaido\u2019s name before his self-appointment, and he had never run for election at any level.<br />\nGuaido is a member of the KOSHER CONTROLLED Popular Will party, which holds only 14 of 167 seats in the National Assembly..the Constituent National Assembly is dominated by Maduro PATRIOT allies.<br />\n<br />\nThe KOSHER DEEP STATE convinced Trump to bring in JEW Elliot Abrams ( special envoy in charge of Venezuela ) , an expert in regime changes by deceit and violence. Blackouts in Venezuela is JEW Elliott Abram's gift to Venezuelan people.<br />\n<br />\nAbrams has a long and dubious history as part of the Iran-Contra scandal, for which he was convicted of lying to Congress, and supporter of Guatemala\u2019s notorious dictator JEW Efrain Rios Montt.<br />\n<br />\nAbrams was a key architect of the Iraq war and a staunch defender of the El Mozote massacre in El Salvador in which US-supported troops slaughtered 600 civilians.<br />\n<br />\nThe strategy began at the information level, filling the mainstream media with lies: Maduro was a dictator, human rights abuser, incompetent administrator, and corrupt leader.<br />\n<br />\nThe claim that Maduro is a dictator is particularly laughable. With the exception of one state-run TV station, almost every other major media outlet ( BENAMI like in India )in Venezuela is privately owned and closely aligned with JEW Guaido.<br />\n<br />\nThey publish and broadcast freely every day, without censorship. Guaido freely travels around the country, even making a week-long trip through Latin America, claiming to be president. He is now back in Venezuela making speeches, organizing rallies, and lobbying various interest groups.<br />\n<br />\nCONTINUED TO 4--</div>\n<span class=\"comment-actions secondary-text\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" style=\"margin-left: 36px; margin-top: 1em;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replybox-single\" id=\"c3652978829032127055-ce\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; margin-top: 5px;\">\n</div>\n</li>\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"c7302269833080468472\" style=\"border-bottom: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 0.25em 0px 0px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n<img alt=\"\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-QSnd-Z8F7Kc/XFtPudWdwlI/AAAAAAABfq4/vxrkFOO7Iu8Mf6-OaPgw6FPpRDSmMgLdgCK4BGAYYCw/s35/capt%25252BajitC%25252Bvadakayil.JPG\" style=\"border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); max-width: 36px;\" /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. US media quickly picked up the story, followed immediately by outrage from the US political class.<br />\n<br />\nThe story of humanitarian aid was itself a sham. The Trump administration reportedly sent about 18 million USD in food and medicine, a pittance in comparison to the economic damage caused by US sanctions estimated at more than 32 billion USD<br />\n<br />\nIn between the food was VERY THIN METAL WIRES which opposition forces used in the past at demonstrations to decapitate pro-Maduro citizen militias who often travel on small motorcycles..<br />\n<br />\nColectivos, part of the civil militias, are mobile popular forces from the most pro-Chavista barrios. They are widely feared in wealthier neighborhoods where they often arrive on small motorcycles to dismantle road blockades or disarm thugs. This civil-military alliance is key to the defense of socialism in a hostile world<br />\n<br />\nOver the following weeks, Maduro and Guaido called for a series of competing rallies, mostly in Caracas.<br />\n<br />\nTHE KOSHER MEDIA SHOWED THE LARGE MADURO CROWDS AS JEW GUIADOs CROWDS BY PHOTOSHOPPING FLAGS.<br />\n<br />\nConstant threats of US military intervention fell PHUTTTT on its face when Putin sent his nuclear submarines to prowl off Panama Canal.<br />\n<br />\nTwo power stations in Caracas blew up from unknown causes. Most speculation centered on the Guri dam, source of 70% of the country\u2019s electrical power and a relatively easy target for a sophisticated cyber-attack.<br />\n<br />\nThe Maduro administration certainly gains nothing from keeping the population in the dark, while the US may have hoped to spark a general uprising by creating a national crisis. Guaido may have already implicitly accepted responsibility when he declared, \u201cthe lights will come back on when the usurper Maduro is overthrown.\u201d<br />\n<br />\nThe 500,000 strong Venezuelan military, steeped in powerful nationalism from the days of Chavez, is unified in its support of Maduro and in opposition to US imperialism.<br />\n<br />\nINDIA WILL SUPPORT MADURO ALONG WITH PUTIN..<br />\n<br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n,,</div>\n</div>\n</li>\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"c7302269833080468472\" style=\"border-bottom: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 0.25em 0px 0px;\"><div>\n<br /></div>\n</li>\n</ol>\n</div>\n</div>\n</li>\n</ol>\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<ol id=\"top-ra\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; list-style-type: none; padding: 0px;\">\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"c2936212270533481317\" style=\"border-bottom: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 0.25em 0px 0px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n<img alt=\"\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-QSnd-Z8F7Kc/XFtPudWdwlI/AAAAAAABfq4/vxrkFOO7Iu8Mf6-OaPgw6FPpRDSmMgLdgCK4BGAYYCw/s35/capt%25252BajitC%25252Bvadakayil.JPG\" style=\"border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); max-width: 36px;\" /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. HIS SON POISONED HIM AND BAPTIZED HIS DEAD BODY TO KICK START MASS CONVERSIONS TO CHRISTIANITY..</span></div>\n<span style=\"color: blue;\">\n</span>\n<br />\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"color: blue;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">I HAD PREDICTED THAT AFTER LIBYA , THE ISLAMIC MERCENARIES IN THE PAYROLL OF JEW WOULD DECIMATE IRAQ AND SYRIA .. WRITTEN ABOUT IT SEVERAL TIMES.. THAT THOUSAND OF ISLAMIC SUICIDE BOMBERS WILL NOT KILL A SINGLE JEW..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">I AM VINDICATED..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: 16px;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2011/10/ethnic-cleansing-of-blackskinned-people.html</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">ROTHSCHILD GREW OPIUM IN INDIA AND SOLD IT IN CHINA.. HOW DID HE DO THAT WHEN THE CHINESE EMPEROR AND THE CHINESE PEOPLE DID NOT WANT OPIUM?&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">ROTHSCHILD CREATED THE CHINESE MAFIA.. THE SHIPPING UNIT OF THIS MAFIA HAD ROTHSCHILDs SHIPS WITH LONG RANGE GUNS..</span><br />\n<br />\n<div style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"color: purple; font-size: large;\">WE ASK AJIT DOVAL -- DO NOT ALLOW LONG RANGE NATO SNIPER GUNS ( ISIS GUNS ) IN KASHMIR ..</span><span style=\"color: purple; font-size: large;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\"><br /></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">WE ASK THAT IMA AND COURSES FOR TOP GENERALS MUST INCLUDE WORLD INTRIGUE..&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">WE NEED THINKING GENERALS NOT \"GREASE AND TACKLE \" GENERALS WHO SACRIFICE THEIR JAWANS CHARGING UP ROCKY HILLOCKS HOLLERING \"YEH DIL MAAANGE MORE\"..</span><br />\n<br />\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<b style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif;\"><span style=\"color: magenta;\">CHANAKYA NITI SAYS \" WARS MUST BE WON EVEN BEFORE THEY ARE FOUGHT \".</span></b></div>\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">THIS MOTTO WAS LATER LIFTED BY SUN TZU AND PATENTED IN HIS OWN NAME..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">CHANAKYA IS THE FATHER OF INDIA-- NOT ROTHSCHILDS AGENT GANDHI WHO SUBSTITUTED THE WORD \"INDIGO\" FOR \"OPIUM\"..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: 16px;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2014/08/chanakya-taxila-university-professor.html</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">ALEXANDER THE GREAT WAS SCREWED BY CHANAKYA.. HISTORY DOES NOT RECORD THIS..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: 16px;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2010/05/alexander-great-and-king-porus-hidden.html</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">MUCH BEFORE JAICHAND, THE KING OF AMBI COMPROMISED THE BOLAN AND KHYBER PASSES..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: 16px;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2010/11/first-supari-and-turning-point-of.html</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">KHWAJAH MOINUDDIN CHISTI IS THE REASON WHY INDIA BECAME SLAVES TO THE ISLAMIC INVADER.. THE HORSES AND ELEPHANTS OF PRITHVI RAJ CHAUHAN WERE SLEEPING ON THE DAY OF THE BATTLE..&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">-- AND VOTE KA BHOOKA MODI GOES TO AJMER TO LAY CHADDAR ON THE DARGAH..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\"><b><span style=\"color: blue;\">WE ASK NCERT TO TEACH TRUE HISTORY.. WIKIPEDIA AND QUORA EXIST TO PROPAGATE KOSHER&nbsp; DEEP STATE VERSION OF HISTORY..</span></b></span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: 16px;\">https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2019/03/questions-from-capt-ajit-vadakayil.html</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">capt ajit vadakayil</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">..</span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin-left: 36px; margin-top: 1em;\">\n<div class=\"comment-thread inline-thread\" id=\"c1644335749269801818-rt\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; margin: 8px 0px; padding: 0.5em 1em;\">\n<ol class=\"thread-chrome thread-expanded\" id=\"c1644335749269801818-ra\" style=\"list-style-type: none; padding: 0px;\">\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"c9088752113024171932\" style=\"border-bottom: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 16px 0px 0px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">ROTHSCHILD ( WHO RULED INDIA ) CREATED COMMUNISM TO DELETE GOD FROM THE EQUATION..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">WE KNOW WHAT COMMUNISM DID TO THIS PLANET ...</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">WE KNOW WHAT NAXALS AND JNU DID TO INDIA..IN CAHOOTS WITH COLLEGIUM JUDICIARY AND BENAMI MEDIA...</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">AS LONG AS DESH DROHIS HAVE THE SUPPORT OF THE ILLEGAL COLLEGIUM JUDICIARY AND BENAMI MEDIA ( IN DEEP STATE PAYROLL ) , INDIA CANNOT BECOME THIS PLANETs NO 1 SUPERPOWER IN 14 YEARS..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">THE FOUNDER OF INDIAN COMMUNISM MN ROY HAD A JEWESS HONEYPOT WIFE EVELYN TRENT..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">KARL MARX WAS A COUSIN OF JEW ROTHSCHILD..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">MARX/ STALIN/ LENIN/ ENGELS WERE ALL JEWS..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">GOOD PARENTING MUST NOT REMOVE SPIRITUALITY OF SANATANA DHARMA FROM THE EQUATION..THIS IS DIFFERENT FROM THE DOGMA OF SINGLE HOLY BOOK, SINGLE MESSIAH RELIGIONS..&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<b style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px;\"><span style=\"color: magenta;\">HINDUS ARE ALLOWED ONLY SHRADDHA --NEVER BHAKTI..</span></b><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">THE BHAKTI MOVEMENT AND ALL ITS DASA HEROES WERE CREATED BY JEW ROTHSCHILD..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">The word BHAKTI does not appear in the Vedas.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">All BHAKTI insertions in Vedas , Bhagawad Gita and Upanishads have been done by the EVIL white invader-- to DIVIDE AND RULE ..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">SHRADDHA means faith, but in the sense of an INNER SOUL VOICE / CONSCIENCE -based conviction, not just a mere unquestioning belief to BULLSHIT dogma ..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">HINDUS ARE ASKED TO APPLY THEIR CONSCIENCE .</span><br />\n<br />\n<b style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px;\"><span style=\"color: purple;\">BHAGAWAD GITA PROPAGATED ONLY SHRADDHA - NEVER BHAKTI...</span></b></div>\n<div style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\">Shraddha is not blind faith, but enlightened faith based on verification ..The word FAITH scares a Hindu...</span></div>\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\"><br /></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">The Bhagavad Gita says that a person is what their SHRADDHA is \u2013that says it all.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: 16px;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/01/sanatana-dharma-hinduism-exhumed-and.html</span><br />\n<br />\n<b style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">QUESTION NO 55 TO QUORA WAS DELETED..<br /><br />55- - IS CAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL RIGHT WHEN HE SAYS \u2013 SANATANA DHARMA ALLOWS ONLY SHRADDHA OF SPIRITUALITY AND NEVER BHAKTI OF DOGMA BASED SINGLE MESSIAH , SINGLE HOLY BOOK RELIGIONS..<br /><br />WHY ?</span></b><br />\n<span style=\"color: red; text-decoration-line: none;\">March 31, 2019 at 11:46 AM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">https://www.quora.com/Why-has-Shiva-not-been-spotted-yet-by-satellites-Did-he-run-away-from-Kailash-after-being-captured-by-China</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">THE WHOLE THING BOILS DOWN TO FEAR..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">THE WHITE MAN KNOWS THAT IN ANOTHER 14 YEARS INDIA WILL BE THIS PLANETs NO 1 SUPERPOWER..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">THEY ARE TAKEN ABACK THAT THE POOREST NATION IN 1947 ( YEAR OF INDEPENDENCE ) AFTER 800 YEARS OF SLAVERY COULD BECOME THE RICHEST NATION AGAIN BY 2033 AD..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">IN 1975 WE HAD A SHIPBOARD PARTY..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">A CATHOLIC GOAN RADIO OFFICER WHO LOOKED LIKE A ADIVASI SERVANT ( CHOOTIYA BUGGER ) WAS GOING ON AND ON ABOUT INDIA BEING A USELESS PLACE TO LIVE..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">HIS WIFE WAS FAIR ATTRACTIVE AND HALF PORTUGUESE-- A KIND LADY.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">AT THAT TIME I DECLARED \" INDIA WILL BE THIS PLANETs NO 1 SUPERPOWER IN 50 YEARS \"..&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">I WAS KNOWN TO DISH OUT FAR FETCHED STUFF -- BUT THIS WAS TOO MUCH..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">THE RADIO OFFICER FELL ON THE CARPET AND ROLLED AROUND IN SARCASM..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">CAPTAIN ASKED ME \" AJIT, CAN YOU ELABORATE \"..</span></div>\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">I REPLIED \" WHEN ALL NATIONS WERE DISTANT FROM EACH OTHER IN ANCIENT TIMES -- INDIA WAS THIS PLANETs NO 1 CIVILIZATION -- THAT IS WHY ! .. DURING 800 YEARS OF SLAVERY WE COULD NOT BE OURSELVES \"</span></div>\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2017/05/land-of-punt-ophir-and-sheba-is-north.html</span></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">LATER THE RADIO OFFICERS WIFE TOLD ME-- SHE FELT PROUD BY MY STATEMENT ..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">TODAY WHEN I LOOK BACK--</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">I WAS RIGHT..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">WE LOST TEN YEARS UNDER THE ITALIAN WAITRESS .. THIS RABIDLY ANTI-HINDUS MAFIA WOMAN WOULD HAVE KILLED GANGES IN ANOTHER 5 YEARS IF WE HAD NOT KICKED HER OUT IN 2014 ..JUST AN EXAMPLE..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">SHE DOES NOT KNOW THAT THE GLORY OF ANCIENT ROME IS 100% HINDU..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">WIKIPEDIA , QUORA, OUR OWN COLLEGIUM JUDICIARY, OUR OWN BENAMI MEDIA , JNU COMMIES --ARE IN THE BUSINESS OF MAKING THE INDIAN SELF LOATHING AND FIGHT WITH EACH OTHER , DRIVING WEDGES AMONGST US..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">A BROWN BLOGGER IS IN TOWN -- HE WONT ALLOW THIS.. HE KNOWS THE TRAITORS FROM WITHIN..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\"><span style=\"color: red;\">https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2019/03/questions-from-capt-ajit-vadakayil.html</span></span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">QUORA THOUGH THEY CAN SHUT ME DOWN BY ALLOWING VICIOUS PERSONAL ATTACKS ON MY MENTAL HEALTH AND FOUL SEXUAL INNUENDO ON MY WIFE..</span><br />\n<br />\n<div style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; text-align: left;\">\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\">BUT CAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL THANKS QUORA-- ALL THOSE WHO HAVE THROWN SHIT ON INDIA , HAVE LEFT THEIR \" DIGITAL TRACE \" -- THEY HAVE BEEN PROFILED IN OUR NATIONAL DATABASE OF TRAITORS.. EVEN THEIR DESCENDANTS ARE SCREWED..</span></b></div>\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-weight: 700;\"><br /></span></div>\n<span style=\"color: red;\"></span><br />\n<div style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; font-weight: bold; text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"color: red;\">SOMETIMES YOU LAY THE BAIT -- THE FASTEST WAY IS TO GIVE YOUR ENEMIES AN OPPORTUNITY TO ATTACK YOU, LIKE IN THE MOVIE BELOW-- DONT GO TO THEM, ALLOW THEM TO COME TO YOU ENMASSE.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<span style=\"color: red;\">\n</span>\n<br />\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"color: red;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; I said USA is doing good and there is nothing to worry but he denied that. Then he spoke of china - I responded saying I dont have anything against the chinese they are good people but china's economy numbers arent right there are several ghost cities, Map of electricity of India shows that India is more lit than China. He started saying mean things about India like how poor india is, people on top of train roofs, how a certain indian he met smelt of curry etc. I was so shocked at the tone and the manner that he spoke, so if he said good things about India I should be denying it saying west was better then he would be happy in a la-la land I guess. MOHAMAMD ALI JAUHAR WAS A JEW WHO WAS BURIED IN JERUSALEM.. I HAVE SEEN HIS KOSHER GRAVE..<br />\n<br />\nJEW MOHAMMAD ALI JAUHAR AND JEW GANDHI CAME TO KERALA TO WHIP UP THE KHILAFAT MOVEMENT IN SUPPORT OF THE JEWISH TURKISH OTTOMAN SULTAN.. THE LAST 70% OF THE OTTOMAN SULTANS OF TURKEY WERE JEWS PRETENDING TO BE MUSLIMS..<br />\n<br />\nTHIS WAS A SLIMY MOVEMENT TO DRIVE A WEDGE BETWEEN MUSLIMS AND HINDUS OF KERALA..<br />\n<br />\nTHIS LED TO THE MOPLAH REVOLT..<br />\n<br />\nThe Kerala half breed Muslims ( mappilas ) turned against the North Kerala Hindus and drove away one lakh hindus ( official estimate ) as there was no water to drink.<br />\n<br />\nCountless Hindus were beheaded and every well, pond, river and water body was full of rotting corpses . All Hindu lands were usurped by the Muslims .<br />\n<br />\nThe mappilas stocked their mosques with food , water , long spears and khilafat swords -and this was NO knee jerk attack, but a pre-meditated and long planned one .<br />\n<br />\nThe MALABAR SPECIAL POLICE was formed by the British --who were angry as some white women and children were murdered by the mappilas .<br />\n<br />\nThis unit of 800 police were DESH BHAKTS , all KALARI EXPERTS all more than 6 feet in height and well built .<br />\n<br />\nAlong with the nippy Gurkha regiment ( all shorties ) they ran after the poor mapplias with swords and kurkhris and captured all of the MOPLAH REVOLT mutineers .<br />\n<br />\nthe british took revenge for the murder of the whites --<br />\n<br />\nOn 20th Nov 1921, they packed up a train compartment full of the worst mappilas and most of them died on the passage from Tanur Kerala to Podanur Tamil Nadu jail .<br />\n<br />\nWhen the compartment was opened the mappila prisoners had clawed and eaten each other-- due to a type of wet paint inside the compartment --they went berserk due to the fumes and lack of oxygen .<br />\n<br />\nRETRIBUTION OF THE MOST SEVERE KIND .<br />\n<br />\nBefore the birth of Islam all Kerala mappilas were Hindus.. They ran the spice caravan route from Salalah to Mecca to Jerusalem..<br />\n<br />\nAfter the birth of Islam the mappilas metamorphosed to offsprings of foreign Muslim man and local Hindu women .. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2019/03/holi-2019-capt-ajit-vadakayil.html?showComment=1553735564266#c3539463605542549296\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">March 28, 2019 at 6:42 AM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">WE THE PEOPLE OF INDIA, WARN THE CHIEF ELECTION COMMISSIONER AND THE ELECTION COMMISSION-- \"DO NOT EXCEED YOUR LIMITS \"..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">WE WARN THE CEC AND EC -- DO NOT TRY TO SNATCH AWAY THE FUNDAMENTAL RIGHTS OF THE PEOPLE OF INDIA..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">AN EXAMPLE WILL BE CEO OF KERALA TR MEENA ( WHO HAS NO STATUTORY POWERS ) BANNING PEOPLE FROM REFERRING TO THE EXCESSES COMMITTED BY ATHEIST COMMIE CM PINARAYI VIJAYAN.. SABARIMALA EPISODE IS NO 1 ELECTION ISSUE IN KERALA AND WE WONT ALLOW CEC TO FLUSH THAT ISSUE DOWN THE TOILET ..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">FIRST THINGS FIRST-- THE CEC AND EC MUST THEMSELVES ADHERE TO A CODE OF CONDUCT..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">IN THE 2014 LOK SABHA ELECTIONS PRANNOY JAMES ROY ( WITH AN IRISH MOTHER ) WAS SPEARHEADING THE CONSPIRACY TO USE SOME LOOPHOLE AND BAN MODI FROM CONTESTING THE ELECTIONS..</span></div>\n<div style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"color: red;\"><b>MODI CAME OUTSIDE THE POLLING BOOTH AFTER VOTING AND TOOK A SELFIE .. IMMEDIATELY DESH DROHI NDTV ( BACKED BY PAKISTANI ISI ) STARTED A CAMPAIGN THAT MODI MUST BE DISQUALIFIED BY THE CEC..</b></span></div>\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">AT THAT TIME I TOLD MY WIFE \" NDTV WILL GIVE INDIAN OF THE YEAR AWARD TO CEC\"..AND THEN I SAT IN THE LAWN DOING SOME GARDENING..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">WITHIN AN HOUR , I HEAD MY WIFE CRYING \"OH SHIT!\"..&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">I KNEW THAT SOMETHING MAJOR HAS HAPPENED AS THE PREVIOUS AND ONLY TIME TIME SHE SHOUTED LIKE THIS WAS WHEN RAJIV GANDHI WAS ASSASSINATED..&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">OUR SHIP WAS IN DALIAN CHINA, AND THE PREVIOUS DAY I HAD PREDICTED THAT LTTE WILL TRY AND KILL RAJIV GANDHI WHILE HE IS CAMPAIGNING IN TAMIL NADU..</span><br />\n<br />\n<div style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; text-align: left;\">\n<b><span style=\"color: blue;\">SHE CAME RUNNING TO ME AND SAID \" NOT ONLY CEC, NDTV HAS GIVEN THE INDIAN OF THE YEAR AWARD TO THE WHOLE OF THE EC\"..</span></b></div>\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-weight: 700;\"><br /></span></div>\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-weight: bold;\"></span><br />\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-weight: bold;\">AND LATER WE GOT TO SEE THE AWARD FUNCTION WHERE PRANNOY JAMES ROY ( WITH A BEAMING BARKHA DUTT BY HIS SIDE, AND THE ENTIRE EC IN LINE) , HELD UP THE HAND OF CEC VS SAMPATH AS IF HE WAS A CHAMPION BOXER..</span></div>\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-weight: bold;\">\n</span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">NOTE\u2014VS SAMPATH WAS A STOOGE OF THE ITALIAN WAITRESS ..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: large;\">Brushing aside L K Advani's suggestion for a collegium to decide on appointment of CEC , the UPA government went ahead and named the 1973-batch IAS officer of Andhra Pradesh cadre.- with Italian poodle President Pratibha Patil cleared his appointment within hours\u2026</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">OUR COURSE THE EFFORT OF TRAITOR PRANNOY JAMES ROY TO DISQUALIFY MODI DID NOT BEAR FRUIT..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">NOW THE SAME THING IS HAPPENING OVER MODIs BROADCAST TO THE NATION ABOUT THE SATELLITE BUSTING ASAT MISSILE..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">MODI IS PM AND THE SPACE MINISTER.. IF HE CANNOT NOT ANNOUNCE , WHO ELSE CAN ?</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">The Election Commission of India, is a constitutional body responsible for administering elections in India according to the rules and regulations mentioned in the Constitution of India.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">CEC HAS NO POWERS TO AMEND THE CONSTITUTION AND SNATCH AWAY THE FUNDAMENTAL RIGHTS OF WE THE PEOPLE IN THE GARB OF ENSURING MODEL CODE OF CONDUCT....</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">BE WARNED .. RETRIBUTION WILL BE MOST SEVERE TO \" MUNGERILAL KE RANGEEN SAPNE \" TYPE STUPID MOVES ....</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">capt ajit vadakayil</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">..</span><br />\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin-left: 36px; margin-top: 1em;\">\n<div class=\"comment-thread inline-thread\" id=\"c3539463605542549296-rt\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; margin: 8px 0px; padding: 0.5em 1em;\">\n<ol class=\"thread-chrome thread-expanded\" id=\"c3539463605542549296-ra\" style=\"list-style-type: none; padding: 0px;\">\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"c9197325037121020155\" style=\"border-bottom: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 16px 0px 0px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt.
