BABY<br />\nSALVE BABY<br />\nFALI BABY<br />\nKATJU BABY<br />\nKIRON KHER<br />\nMEENAKSHI LEKHI<br />\nSMRITI IRANI<br />\nARUN SHOURIE<br />\nSRI SRI RAVISHANKAR<br />\nSADGURU JAGGI VASUDEV<br />\nBABA RAMDEV<br />\nGEN GD BAKSHI<br />\nSAMBIT PATRA<br />\nRSN SINGH<br />\nALL CONGRESS SPOKESMEN<br />\nRAHUL GANDHI<br />\nSONIA GANDHI<br />\nPRIYANKA GANDHI<br />\n<br />\nWEBSITES OF DESH BHAKT LEADERS<br />\nSPREAD ON SOCIAL MEDIA EVERY WHICH WAY</div>\n</div>\n</li>\n</ol>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">While the development\nof top soil is Considered a slow millennial process, losses of top soil by\nerosion&nbsp; can be more rapid devastating\nand dramatic. Top soil erosion losses&nbsp; can\neasily overrun the natural capacity to generate fertile top soil.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">While erosion has been viewed as a physical\nprocess, everything in&nbsp; the soil is\naffected by the life within it. Indeed soil organic matter is&nbsp; the signature of life activity in the soil\nitself.&nbsp;&nbsp; The living ability of microbes\ncan greatly augment physical and chemical processes&nbsp; without the intervention of biological forces.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">During the 1930\u2019s in the United States the Great Depression coincided with\nmassive soil erosion known as the Great Dust bowl ecosystem analysis shows that\nprimary plant productivity increases in relation to increase of mycorrhizal\nfungi measured in glomalin related soil protein content as well as mycorrhizal&nbsp; colonization values.. .&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The microbial world is co-dependent with the\nplant \u2013 together they can both thrive. Every 27 tonnes of carbon sequestered\nbiologically in soil represents 100 tonnes of carbon dioxide removed from the\natmosphere. As a bonus, it also enables more reliable and profitable production\nof nutritious food..&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A biology-friendly approach to crop production \u2013 and carefully\nplanned grazing of pastures and rangeland - would enable agricultural land to &nbsp;become a net carbon sink (that is, soil\nsequestering more carbon than it was losing).&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In one thimbleful of healthy\nsoil, you can find several MILES of fungal filaments, all releasing powerful\nenzymes that help dissolve tightly bound soil nutrients, such as organic\nnitrogen, phosphorus, and iron.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Indeed, the top 6 inches of soil are the most\nprecious yet least understood ecosystem on Earth. To fully appreciate its\nimportance to our survival, you need to understand the role carbon plays in\nmaintaining the ecological balance.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Importantly, carbon-rich organic matter is\nwhat gives soil its water-retention capacity, its structure and fertility, so\nit\u2019s really imperative to add organic matter back into the soil. Nitrogen\napplied in excess of crop demand is lost through volatilization,\ndenitrification and leaching.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Fertilizer N (urea) application beyond\nrecommended rates enhances crop succulence, thus making the plants prone to\ndisease and pest infestation, and to lodging. Nitrogen, phosphorus and\npotassium are the three major nutrients required for healthy plant growth.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Cow\nurine contains significant amounts of both nitrogen and potassium. In 24 hours\na cow or buffalo can give 6 litres of urine. If a farmer can have 2 cows or buffaloes\ninhis house it gives 4380 litres of urine in one year which equals 65 kg nitrogen;\nthat amount of nitrogen equals to 136 kg urea.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">If cow urine is used in field\ncontinuously for three years then there will be no need of chemical fertilizer.\nLosses of nitrogen from the soil/plant system not only reduce soil fertility\nand plant yield but Ammonia emissions into the atmosphere contribute to acid\nrain and represent an indirect source of nitrous oxide greenhouse gas\nemissions.. Nitrate contamination of drinking water supplies can cause health\nrisks..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Excess applied N ( Urea\n)) can be lost to the environment through nitrous oxide (N 2 O) emissions,\nwhich contribute to global warming..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Once in the nitrate form,\nthe nitrogen is subject to loss. Nitrate moves freely throughout the soil\nprofile with moisture. In coarse-textured, well-drained soils, nitrate can\nleach below the root zone and become unavailable to the crop.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Nitrate is also\nsubject to denitrification, a biological process that converts nitrate to a gas\nthat is lost to the atmosphere. This occurs in waterlogged soils. Another\nnitrogen loss avenue is volatilization\u2014the loss of free ammonia to the\natmosphere. This process has several steps.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">First, an enzyme (urease) in the\nsoil and organic residue act on urea and convert it to an unstable form, which\ncan quickly change to ammonia and carbon dioxide. With ideal conditions, this\nunstable form is converted to ammonium and is available for plant take-up.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">However, when\nconditions are less than ideal, the ammonia can be lost into the atmosphere.\nFactors that influence this process are urease activity, temperature, soil\nmoisture, application method, soil pH and cation exchange capacity, a measure\nof the soil\u2019s ability to hold positively charged ions.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The greatest potential\nfor loss occurs when there are high amounts of residue on the soil surface and\nthe nitrogen source is applied on top of the field.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Your body creates\nammonia when it breaks down protein from foods. Ammonia contains nitrogen,\nwhich mixes with other elements in your body, including carbon, hydrogen, and\noxygen, to form urea.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Urea is a waste product that is excreted by the kidneys\nwhen you urinate. The urine urea nitrogen test determines how much urea is in\nthe urine to assess the amount of protein breakdown.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The test can help\ndetermine how well the kidneys are functioning and whether your intake of\nprotein is too high or low. Additionally, it can help diagnose whether you have\na problem with protein digestion or absorption from the gut.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Purines are\nnitrogen-containing compounds, which are made inside the cells of your body\n(endogenous).<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Or it comes from\noutside of your body, from intake of foods containing purine (exogenous).&nbsp; Purines are components of nucleosides, the\nbuilding blocks of DNA and RNA.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2014/08/uric-acid-oxidation-of-purines-capt.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2014/08/uric-acid-oxidation-of-purines-capt.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Relatively low price of\nN fertilizers ( urea )&nbsp; &nbsp;facilitates overuse. An attempt to overcome\nthe problem is the use of slow-release N fertilizers or the combined use of\nurea and nitrification inhibitors (Ca). ...<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When manure and urine\nmix, ammonia is formed. If it is released into the air, it can precipitate in\nnature, causing large amounts of nitrogen to end up on the ground.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Organic crops perform\nbetter in weak-acidic to weak-alkaline soils\u2014soils with pH between 5.5 and 8.0.\nThis happens because of the difficulty in managing phosphorus in organic\nsystems. Under strong alkaline and acidic conditions, phosphorus is less readily\navailable to plants as it forms insoluble phosphates<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Bone meal is a mixture\nof finely and coarsely ground animal bones and slaughter-house waste products.\nIt is used as an organic fertilizer for plants and as a nutritional supplement\nfor animals. As a slow-release fertilizer, bone meal is primarily used as a\nsource of phosphorus and protein.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">As a fertilizer, the N-P-K\n(Nitrogen-Phosphorus-Potassium) ratio of bone meal can vary greatly, depending\non the source. From a low of 3-15-0 to as high as 2-22-0. , though some steamed\nbone meals have N-P-Ks of 1-13-0..&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Plants can only get phosphorus from bone\nmeal if the soil pH is below 7.0 (acidic soil).. Organic fertilizers usually\nrequire the use of a variety of fungi in the soil to make the nutrients in the\nfertilizer bioavailable to the plant.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">For plants needing phosphorus, the fungi\nmycorrhiza penetrate the roots and break down the compounds containing the\nphosphorus for easier absorption and utilization, and in turn the plants supply\nthe mycorrhizae with amino acids and sugars..</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Fish Meal (FM) has been used for\nmilliniums in India hundreds of years as an organic fertilizer. It is high in\nnitrogen and phosphorus, and also contains important trace elements making it\nan excellent broad-based organic fertilizer. Mix it thoroughly into the four\ninches of the soil. Bone meal is a slow-release form of phosphorus (P) that may\nbe expressed as phosphate or phosphorus.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Phosphorus as a percentage is 2.3\ntimes higher than numbers shown for phosphate, so 10 per cent phosphate is the\nsame as 23 per cent phosphorus. The calcium infusion from bone meal helps\nplants develop strong and healthy cells and seeds. It also strengthens the\nstems and aids in the development of new shoots in perennial crops and shrubs.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Plants use calcium from bone meal and other sources to produce cell walls and\nroot ends. Calcium deficiency shows itself in the roots, leaves and fruits of\nplants, although it may be hard to detect if it is only affecting the roots.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">All plants need\nphosphorus, which bone meal supplies, especially when developing roots. It is\none of the three essential macronutrients, along with nitrogen and potassium.\nAdequate amounts of phosphorus in the soil are essential for optimal crop\nyields.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Cow dung is high in organic materials and rich in nutrients. It\ncontains about 3 percent nitrogen, 2 percent phosphorus, and 1 percent\npotassium (3-2-1 NPK). Too much phosphorus will continue to promote root\ngrowth, but in excess, it interferes with the roots\u2019 relationships with\nmycorrhizal fungi.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Without the mycorrhizal fungi, the roots have a more\ndifficult time developing and using the nutrients that surround it.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-zpw3toQ2_iQ/XKdAmZVrfYI/AAAAAAABgjA/svNcMmbLsI0Zsegs31Ofi8EF6qkeW3NVgCLcBGAs/s1600/Jaivik-Bharat-FSSAbI-launches-one-nation-one-food-law.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"1093\" data-original-width=\"1428\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-zpw3toQ2_iQ/XKdAmZVrfYI/AAAAAAABgjA/svNcMmbLsI0Zsegs31Ofi8EF6qkeW3NVgCLcBGAs/s1600/Jaivik-Bharat-FSSAbI-launches-one-nation-one-food-law.jpg\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Food Safety and\nStandards (Organic Foods) Regulations, 2017 recognize already established two\nsystems of certification i.e. Participatory Guarantee System (PGS) implemented\nby Ministry of Agriculture and Farmers Welfare and National Programme for\nOrganic Production (NPOP) implemented by Ministry of Commerce and Industry.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Which food products can\nbe labelled as \u2018Organic \u2018?<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Under NPOP system:<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">-- In case of single\ningredient product where all requirements been met as per the&nbsp; specified standards can be labelled as\n\u2018Organic\u2019.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">-- In case of multi\ningredient product where min. 95% of ingredients are of&nbsp; certified origin, can be labelled as \u2018Certified\nOrganic\u2019.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Under PGS-India system:<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">-- In case of single\ningredient product where all requirements have been met, may&nbsp; be labelled as \u2018PGS- Organic\u2019.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">-- In case of multi\ningredient product where min. 95% of ingredients are organic, it&nbsp; may be labelled as \u2018PGS- Organic\u2019.</span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The consumer shall look\nfor Food Safety and Standard Authority of India\u2019s organic<span style=\"mso-spacerun: yes;\">&nbsp; </span>logo (Jaivik Bharat) and FSSAI Logo License\nnumber. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">THERE IS LOT OF\nBRAINWASH FROM WHITE JEWS THAT INDIA MUST NOT TILL OUR SOIL..&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: x-large;\"><b style=\"background-color: white;\">FUCK OFF YOU CUNTS !</b></span><span style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">YOU YOUR NO TILL\nAGRICULTURE IN ISRAEL WHERE YOU HAVE SHIT SOIL WITH ONLY A COUPLE OF INCHES OF\nTOP SOIL \u2014 WE DON\u2019T NEED IT IN INDIA.. OUR TOP SOIL IS THICK ENOUGH AND WE DO\nSHALLOW TILLING ..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">INDIA INTRODUCED THE\nCONCEPT OF TILLING TO THIS PLANET<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Tilling allows you to\nprepare a farming space fast.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Tilling the soil &nbsp;helps enrich the toil by speeding up the\ndecomposition of remaining crops, weeds and other organic matter that may be\nlying on the surface.&nbsp; It loosens and\naerates the top layer of soil or horizon A, which facilitates planting the\ncrop. Loosening the soil not only provides a good footing for newly germinated\nroots but it helps water, nutrients and oxygen reach those roots.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Tilling breaks up hard\nsoil and delivers nutrients deep into the soil. Plants need loose soil for\ntheir roots to grow and spread, and tilling is the most efficient way to break\nup a densely packed bed.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Tilling mechanically destroys weeds.. With\nno-till a farmer has lost the ability to mechanically control weeds through\ntillage.&nbsp; Tilling or cultivating your\ngarden helps tear weeds apart and break down their root systems.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Without\ntillage, weeds have more time to establish themselves and grow.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Tilling increases air\nin soil and stimulates the activity of aerobic bacteria. That helps break down\norganic matter more quickly, releasing heat as energy. Air pockets that are\ncreated by the deep loosening of soil facilitate air and water penetration for\nplants to use. Air penetration is also important to the micro-organisms in the\nsoil that perform all kinds of important tasks creating nutrients for the plants<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Compost, leaf litter,\ngrass clippings and other organic amendments are powerful sources of nitrogen\nand carbon, two elements necessary for plant growth and good soil composition. Tilled\nsoils have pockets that can secrete water but they also allow excess water to\npercolate down through soil which avoids sodden roots.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">SOMEONE ASKED ME\u2014 WHY PUT\nKERALA NENDRAN AND COCONUT WATER BANANA IN PACHGAVYA<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">WELL THEY ARE A GREAT\nSOURCE OF POTASSIUM<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Potassium (K) is an\nessential nutrient for plant growth.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It's classified as a macronutrient because\nplants take up large quantities of K during their life cycle. Potassium is\nassociated with the movement of water, nutrients and carbohydrates in plant\ntissue. It\u2019s involved with enzyme activation within the plant, which affects\nprotein, starch and adenosine triphosphate (ATP) production.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The production of\nATP can regulate the rate of photosynthesis. Potassium helps regulate the\nopening and closing of the stomata, which regulates the exchange of water\nvapor, oxygen and carbon dioxide. If K is deficient or not supplied in adequate\namounts, it stunts plant growth and reduces yield.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In the soil itself,\npotassium appears in three forms: (1) in the soil solution; (2) as the\nexchangeable ion K+ adsorbed to, or released from, the surfaces of clay\nparticles; and (3) in organic matter. Potassium plays a most important role in\nregulating the water status of plants by lowering water potential.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<ol id=\"top-ra\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; list-style-type: none; padding: 0px;\">\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"c8565357787050294355\" style=\"border-bottom: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 0.25em 0px 0px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n<img alt=\"\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-QSnd-Z8F7Kc/XFtPudWdwlI/AAAAAAABfq4/vxrkFOO7Iu8Mf6-OaPgw6FPpRDSmMgLdgCK4BGAYYCw/s35/capt%25252BajitC%25252Bvadakayil.JPG\" style=\"border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); max-width: 36px;\" /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2019/03/india-must-revert-to-organic_26.html?showComment=1554545285678#c8565357787050294355\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">April 6, 2019 at 3:38 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nSOMEBODY ASKED ME\u2014WHAT IS THIS IR8 RICE YOU HAVE MENTIONED IN YOUR BLOG..<br />\n<br />\nWELL IT SACRIFICED QUALITY FOR QUANTITY.. THE NUTRITIONAL VALUE IS VERY POOR.<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2015/09/gm-ir8-rice-high-amylose-content.html</span><br />\n<br />\nIN KERALA ITSELF WE HAD MORE THAN 1.82 LAKH ( 180,000 ) VARIETIES OF RICE.. RICE LIKE NJAVARA WAS PREVENTIVE MEDICINE.<br />\n<br />\nTHE IR8 WAS A CONSPIRACY ON THE THIRD WORLD BY ROTHSCHILD USING HIS FRONTS\u2014THE FORD AND ROCKEFELLER FOUNDATIONS..<br />\n<br />\nFAMINE WAS DELIBERATELY CREATED AS A HEGELIAN DIALECTIC TO PUSH THSE USELESS VARIETIES OF RICE WHICH GIVE YOU BRAIN FOG AND REDUCED FERTILITY OF WOMEN..<br />\n<br />\nThe International Rice Research Institute (IRRI) is an international agricultural research and training organization with headquarters in Los Ba\u00f1os, Laguna in the Philippines and offices in seventeen countries with more than 1500 staff.<br />\n<br />\nTHE WHOLE IDEA WAS TO CONTROL FOOD .<br />\n<br />\nSTERILE / TERMINATOR SEEDS WAS THE FIRST STEP..<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2012/05/monsanto-and-farmer-suicides-in-india.html</span><br />\n<br />\nSO SO SO-- In 1960, the KOSHER DEEP STATE established and funded the IRRI, the International Rice Research Institute, in the Philippines with Dr. Robert Chandler as its director. Henry Beachell became IRRI's chief rice breeder.<br />\n<br />\nThey imported seeds for over 10,000 varieties of rice from around the world. Many of these were dwarf varieties to cross with taller varieties.<br />\n<br />\nIn 1962, Dr. Peter Jennings made 38 crosses of various varieties at IRRI. The eighth was between a Chinese dwarf variety known as Dee-geo-woo-gen (DGWG) and a tall variety from Indonesia, Peta. This eighth cross was promising, but only 130 seeds were produced. How those 130 seeds became the famous IR8 variety was a DELIBERATE process \u2013<br />\n<br />\nThe 130 seeds were planted in pots to produce the first generation (F1) of plants. All were tall.<br />\n<br />\nThe F1 seeds were planted and produced about 10,000 second-generation (F2) plants. One-quarter of those plants were dwarf. That meant that dwarfism was controlled by a single gene in the DGWG variety, making the job of producing a commercial variety a lot easier.<br />\n<br />\nAll of the tall plants from the F2 generation were discarded, and the short plants were planted to become the F3 generation.<br />\n<br />\nFrom the F3 plants, Beachell used his plant judging skills to select 298 individual plants. Seeds from each of those plants were planted in individual \"pedigree rows\" to produce the fourth (F4) generation.<br />\n<br />\nIn that F4 generation, Beachell again selected the best individual plants. In row 288, the third plant in looked the best to him. He dubbed it IR8-288-3 and this F5 plant became the source for the revolutionary variety that became known simply as IR8.<br />\n<br />\nBy 1980, IR36 resisted pests and grew fast enough to allow two crops a year instead of just one, doubling the yield. Less time in chemical laden soil means less quality.. And by 1990, using more advanced genetic manipulation techniques, IR72 was outperforming even IR36<br />\n<br />\nBy employing \"Terminator\" genes, seed manufacturers can exercise patent enforcement techniques not too different from software activation. You can grow the plants fine, but the engineered traits require chemical activation, thus enforcing annual license fees from farmers.. Because genetically engineered seeds are patented, the seed company can maintain strict control over how the seeds are used.<br />\n<br />\nCONTINUED TO 2--</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" style=\"margin-left: 36px; margin-top: 1em;\">\n<div class=\"comment-thread inline-thread\" id=\"c8565357787050294355-rt\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; margin: 8px 0px; padding: 0.5em 1em;\">\n<ol class=\"thread-chrome thread-expanded\" id=\"c8565357787050294355-ra\" style=\"list-style-type: none; padding: 0px;\">\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"c1585386215361953487\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 16px 0px 8px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2019/03/india-must-revert-to-organic_26.html?showComment=1554545489038#c1585386215361953487\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">April 6, 2019 at 3:41 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nCONTINUED FROM 1--<br />\n<br />\n<br />\nTHE GREEN REVOLUTION ELIMINATED MORE THAN 1.8 LAKH VARIETIES OF RICE IN KERALA ALONE.. NJAVARA RICE IS A SURVIVOR\u2014 PUT NOW EVEN THIS PRICELESS RICE IS GM..<br />\n<br />\nDESPITE RAPING INDIAN SOIL WITH GREEN REVOLUTION AND MAKING PRICELESS SEEDS EXTINCT, MS SWAMINATHAN IS STILL PRAISING HIS DESH DROHI GREEN REVOLUTION..<br />\n<br />\nPM MODI IS STILL SINGING THE PRAISES OF GM SEEDS.. HE HOPES TO GET THE NOBEL PRIZE SOON.. ALREADY HE IS \"CHAMPION OF EARTH\" FOR HIS SLIMY EFFORTS TOWARDS MOTHBALLING INDIAN COAL..<br />\n<br />\nIN A SCHOOL DEBATE WHEN I WAS 12 YEARS OLD, I TALKED ABOUT IR8 RICE AND CALLED IT A CONSPIRACY. NOT EVEN ONE SOUL IN THE HALL HEARD ABOUT IR8 RICE..<br />\n<br />\nThe taste and texture of the rice. IR8 was chalky and hardened after cooking: it may have been plentiful, but it wasn't nutritious or palatable.<br />\n<br />\nI COMMANDED SHIPS WITH FILIPINO CREW.. I HAVE TRIED A DELIBERATE EXPERIMENT\u2014JUST WITHHOLD RICE\u2014 AND THE FILIPINOS GET BRAIN FOGGY AND PANICKY..<br />\n<br />\nREASON?<br />\n<br />\nTHE USELESS GREEN REVOLUTION RICE WHICH WAS SHOVED DOWN THE THROATS OF PHILLIPINES.<br />\n<br />\nFOOD MUST NEVER GIVE \"WITHDRAWAL SYMPTOMS\"..<br />\n<br />\nTHIS PLANET MUST GO BACK TO ORGANIC AGRICULTURE..<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2019/03/india-must-revert-to-organic.html<br /><br />https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2019/03/india-must-revert-to-organic_26.html</span><br />\n<br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n<span class=\"comment-actions secondary-text\"><span class=\"item-control blog-admin blog-admin pid-1783552029\" style=\"display: inline;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" style=\"margin-left: 36px; margin-top: 1em;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replybox-single\" id=\"c1585386215361953487-ce\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; margin-top: 5px;\">\n</div>\n</li>\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"c1322674972773554399\" style=\"border-bottom: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 0.25em 0px 0px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Walking from village to village, Chitpavan Jew nay Brahmin Vinobha Bhave accumulated more than 5.1 million acres of fertile land .<br />\n<br />\nOne of Vinoba Bhave's followers, Jayaprakash Narayan ( on official record as a CIA spook ) , together with a former Chief Justice of the Bombay High Court, V.M. BY USING ORGANIC CATALYSTS..</span><br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/BwUC8EgRi9o/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/BwUC8EgRi9o?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; ORGANIC&nbsp; PESTICIDE OF HUMPED COW URINE AND NEEM LEAVES</b><br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/KyYvSYsxxW0/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/KyYvSYsxxW0?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<ol id=\"top-ra\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; list-style-type: none; padding: 0px;\">\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"c3539463605542549296\" style=\"border-bottom: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 0.25em 0px 0px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; font-size: 16px; margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2019/03/holi-2019-capt-ajit-vadakayil.html?showComment=1553735564266#c3539463605542549296\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">March 28, 2019 at 6:42 AM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">WE THE PEOPLE OF INDIA, WARN THE CHIEF ELECTION COMMISSIONER AND THE ELECTION COMMISSION-- \"DO NOT EXCEED YOUR LIMITS \"..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">WE WARN THE CEC AND EC -- DO NOT TRY TO SNATCH AWAY THE FUNDAMENTAL RIGHTS OF THE PEOPLE OF INDIA..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">AN EXAMPLE WILL BE CEO OF KERALA TR MEENA ( WHO HAS NO STATUTORY POWERS ) BANNING PEOPLE FROM REFERRING TO THE EXCESSES COMMITTED BY ATHEIST COMMIE CM PINARAYI VIJAYAN.. SABARIMALA EPISODE IS NO 1 ELECTION ISSUE IN KERALA AND WE WONT ALLOW CEC TO FLUSH THAT ISSUE DOWN THE TOILET ..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">FIRST THINGS FIRST-- THE CEC AND EC MUST THEMSELVES ADHERE TO A CODE OF CONDUCT..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">IN THE 2014 LOK SABHA ELECTIONS PRANNOY JAMES ROY ( WITH AN IRISH MOTHER ) WAS SPEARHEADING THE CONSPIRACY TO USE SOME LOOPHOLE AND BAN MODI FROM CONTESTING THE ELECTIONS..</span></div>\n<div style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif;\">\n<span style=\"color: red;\"><b>MODI CAME OUTSIDE THE POLLING BOOTH AFTER VOTING AND TOOK A SELFIE .. IMMEDIATELY DESH DROHI NDTV ( BACKED BY PAKISTANI ISI ) STARTED A CAMPAIGN THAT MODI MUST BE DISQUALIFIED BY THE CEC..</b></span></div>\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">AT THAT TIME I TOLD MY WIFE \" NDTV WILL GIVE INDIAN OF THE YEAR AWARD TO CEC\"..AND THEN I SAT IN THE LAWN DOING SOME GARDENING..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">WITHIN AN HOUR , I HEAD MY WIFE CRYING \"OH SHIT!\"..&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">I KNEW THAT SOMETHING MAJOR HAS HAPPENED AS THE PREVIOUS AND ONLY TIME TIME SHE SHOUTED LIKE THIS WAS WHEN RAJIV GANDHI WAS ASSASSINATED..&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">OUR SHIP WAS IN DALIAN CHINA, AND THE PREVIOUS DAY I HAD PREDICTED THAT LTTE WILL TRY AND KILL RAJIV GANDHI WHILE HE IS CAMPAIGNING IN TAMIL NADU..</span><br />\n<br />\n<div style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif;\">\n<b><span style=\"color: blue;\">SHE CAME RUNNING TO ME AND SAID \" NOT ONLY CEC, NDTV HAS GIVEN THE INDIAN OF THE YEAR AWARD TO THE WHOLE OF THE EC\"..</span></b></div>\n<div>\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-weight: 700;\"><br /></span></div>\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-weight: bold;\">AND LATER WE GOT TO SEE THE AWARD FUNCTION WHERE PRANNOY JAMES ROY ( WITH A BEAMING BARKHA DUTT BY HIS SIDE, AND THE ENTIRE EC IN LINE) , HELD UP THE HAND OF CEC VS SAMPATH AS IF HE WAS A CHAMPION BOXER..</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">NOTE\u2014VS SAMPATH WAS A STOOGE OF THE ITALIAN WAITRESS ..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: large;\">Brushing aside L K Advani's suggestion for a collegium to decide on appointment of CEC , the UPA government went ahead and named the 1973-batch IAS officer of Andhra Pradesh cadre.- with Italian poodle President Pratibha Patil cleared his appointment within hours\u2026</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">OUR COURSE THE EFFORT OF TRAITOR PRANNOY JAMES ROY TO DISQUALIFY MODI DID NOT BEAR FRUIT..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">NOW THE SAME THING IS HAPPENING OVER MODIs BROADCAST TO THE NATION ABOUT THE SATELLITE BUSTING ASAT MISSILE..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">MODI IS PM AND THE SPACE MINISTER.. IF HE CANNOT NOT ANNOUNCE , WHO ELSE CAN ?</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">The Election Commission of India, is a constitutional body responsible for administering elections in India according to the rules and regulations mentioned in the Constitution of India.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">CEC HAS NO POWERS TO AMEND THE CONSTITUTION AND SNATCH AWAY THE FUNDAMENTAL RIGHTS OF WE THE PEOPLE IN THE GARB OF ENSURING MODEL CODE OF CONDUCT....</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">BE WARNED .. RETRIBUTION WILL BE MOST SEVERE TO \" MUNGERILAL KE RANGEEN SAPNE \" TYPE STUPID MOVES ....</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">capt ajit vadakayil</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">..</span><br />\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin-left: 36px; margin-top: 1em;\">\n<div class=\"comment-thread inline-thread\" id=\"c3539463605542549296-rt\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; margin: 8px 0px; padding: 0.5em 1em;\">\n<ol class=\"thread-chrome thread-expanded\" id=\"c3539463605542549296-ra\" style=\"list-style-type: none; padding: 0px;\">\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"c9197325037121020155\" style=\"border-bottom: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 16px 0px 0px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. DO THEY HAVE CORE VALUES ?</span><div>\n<br /></div>\n<span style=\"font-weight: bold;\">10\u2026 IS CAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL RIGHT WHEN HE SAYS-- MODERN ECONOMICS IS PSEUDOSCIENCE ?</span><div>\n<br /></div>\n<span style=\"font-weight: bold;\">11\u2026 IS CAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL RIGHT WHEN HE SAYS -- UNDERWATER METHANE LEAKS INTO GULF STREAM KICK STARTED ARCTIC ICE MELT AND GLOBAL WARMING ?</span><div>\n<br /></div>\n<span style=\"font-weight: bold;\">12\u2026 IS CAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL RIGHT WHEN HE SAYS- DEEP SPACE NUCLEAR EXPLOSION STARFISH PRIME CAUSED A HOLE IN THE OZONE LAYER ?</span><div>\n<br /></div>\n<span style=\"font-weight: bold;\">13. \u2026 IS CAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL RIGHT WHEN HE SAYS - AT PARIS COP21 AND KATOWICE24, GOOD GAS CO2 WAS PROJECTED AS VILLAIN WHILE BAD GREENHOUSE GASES WERE KICKED UNDER THE DEEP STATE CARPET ?</span><div>\n<br /></div>\n<span style=\"font-weight: bold;\">14 \u2026 IS CAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL RIGHT WHEN HE SAYS-- ALBERT EINSTEIN LIFTED ALL HIS AWARD WINNING THEORIES FROM THE ANCIENT VEDAS ?</span><div>\n<br /></div>\n<span style=\"font-weight: bold;\">15\u2026 IS CAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL RIGHT WHEN HE SAYS \u2013 ISAAC NEWTON LIFTED HIS CALCULUS FROM THE ANCIENT KERALA SCHOOL OF MATH, INDIA?</span><div>\n<br /></div>\n<span style=\"font-weight: bold;\">16. .. IS CAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL RIGHT WHEN HE SAYS-- EVERY VESTIGE OF ANCIENT KNOWLEDGE TILL THE WHITE INVADER CAME TO INDIA WAS LIFTED FROM INDIA..</span><div>\n<br /></div>\n<div>\n<br /></div>\n<span style=\"font-weight: bold;\">19 \u2026 IS CAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL RIGHT WHEN HE SAYS-- ANCIENT GREEK KNOWLEDGE SUDDENLY DRIED UP LIKE WATER IN THE HOT DESERT SANDS WHEN THE PLANETs OLDEST UNIVERSITY AT KODUNGALLUR KERALA, INDIA, BLACKBALLED GREEKS FOR STEALING KNOWLEDGE AND PATENTING IT IN THEIR OWN NAMES.</span><div>\n<br /></div>\n<span style=\"font-weight: bold;\">20 . ..
